An la she ge biyu:[Yige xinshi he yige bu xinyang zhe], yige shi shou guanzhi de nuli [bu xinyang zhe], ta buneng ziyou chuli renhe shi; ling yige shi wo ciyu jiamei jiyang zhe [xinshi], ta keyi anzhong he gongkai shiyong [ziji de shou ci wu]. Zhe liang ren shi yiyang de ma? Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la. Dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.

An la she ling yige biyu: You liang geren, qizhong yige shi yaba [bu xinyang zhe], ta buneng ziyou chuli renhe shi, fan chengle ta de zhuren de leizhui, wulun pai ta qu nali, ta dou zuo bu hao; ling yige shi quan ren zhuchi gongdao bing zunxing zhengdao zhe [zhu][xinshi]. Zhe liang ren shi yiyang de ma?
Tiandi jian de yiqie wei jian zhi wu dou shi an la de. Fuhuo shijian de lailin, youru zhuanshun zhi jian [zhu], huo geng kuai. An la dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.
An la shi nimen cong nimen de mu fu zhong chusheng,[na shi] nimen shenme ye bu zhidao. Ta [an la] wei nimen chuangzao er [tingjue] mu [shijue] xin [siwei], yibian nimen gan'en.
Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian tiankong zhong fucong [an la zhi ming] de niao lei ma? Wei an la caineng kongzhi tamen [pingheng feixing]. Dui xinyang de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

An la yi nimen de jia zuo nimen de anju zhi suo, yi shengchu de pige zuo nimen de fangwu [zhangpeng], nimen zai qianyi he dingju shi hui gandao qingbian. Ta yi mianyangmao, luotuo mao, shan yang mao gong nimen bianzhi zhuangshi wu [yiwu yu ditan deng] he zhanshi de xiangshou.

An la cong ta de chuangzao wu ci gei nimen zhebi, yi qun shan zuo nimen de duobi chu, yi yifu gong nimen fangshu [yuhan], yi kuijia gong nimen fangshen. Ta ruci wancheng ta dui nimen de enhui, yibian nimen guishun [yisilan jiao].
Jiaru tamen beili, name, ni [mu sheng] de zeren zhishi mingbai di chuanda [zhu][qishi].
Tamen renshile an la de enhui, dan tamen rengran fouren ta, tamen da duoshu ren shi wang'enfuyi de.
Zai na ri, wo jiang cong mei ge minzu zhong renming yi wei zuozheng zhe [ji renming mei ge minzu de shizhe], ranhou, bu xinyang zhe ji buneng zuo renhe bianjie, ye bude zai qiu zhu en.
Dang bu yi zhe kanjian xingfa shi,[na shi] tamen [suo shou de xingfa] ji bu hui bei jianqing, ye bu hui bei huanxing.

Dang bai ouxiang zhe kanjian tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang shi, tamen jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Zhexie shi women de ouxiang, shi women cengjing she ni er qiqiu de.” Ci shi naxie ouxiang jiang fanbo tamen shuo:“Nimen que shi shuohuang zhe.”
Zai na ri, tamen jiang xiang an la biaoshi qufu, tamen suo niezao de ouxiang jiang paoqi tamen er xiaoshi.
Fan bu xinyang bing fang'ai [bieren zunxing] an la zhi dao zhe, wo jiang yin tamen suo zuo de e xing er shi tamen shou jiabei de xingfa.

Zai na ri, wo jiang cong mei ge minzu zhong renming yi wei zuozheng zhe lai fanzheng tamen, wo jiang rang ni [mu sheng] lai fanzheng zhexie ren. Wo yi jiang shi ni zhe bu chanming wanshi wanwu de jingdian [“gulanjing”], shi dui guishun zhe [musilin] de yindao, ci min he xixun.

An la dique mingling renmen gongzheng [ru chongbai du yi de an la deng], xingshan [zhu][ru luxing dui an la de yiwu deng], zhouji qinshu; ta jinzhi renmen jianyin, zuo'e he pohai. Ta quan jie nimen, yibian nimen jieshou quangao.
Nimen dang luxing dui an la de xu yue. Nimen ji yi an la zuowei nimen de baozheng zhe, nimen zai dingli jianshi de mengyue hou jiu bu gai huiyue. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quanzhi de.

Nimen buyao xiang nage nuren yiyang, ta ba ziji fang hao de sha you chai kaile. Nimen yi shiyan zuowei nimen jian huxiang qizha de shouduan, yimian yizu ren bi ling yizu ren [renkou] geng duo. An la jin yi ci kaoyan nimen. Fuhuo ri, ta bi wei nimen chanming nimen suo fenqi de [xinshi xinyang an la ji qi shizhe mu sheng, buxinyang zhe ze fouren an la ji qi shizhe mu sheng, zhe jiushi tamen zai jinshi suo fenqi de].

Jiaru an la yiyu, ta bi shi nimen chengwei yige minzu, dan ta yu shi shei mi wu, jiu shi shei mi wu; yu yindao shei zunxing zhengdao, jiu yindao shei zunxing zhengdao. Nimen bi jiang bei shenwen nimen cengjing suo zuo de.

Nimen buyao yi shiyan zuowei nimen jian huxiang qizha de shouduan, yimian zhan wen zhihou you shizu. Nimen jiang yin fang'ai bieren zunxing an la zhidao er changshi eguo, nimen bi shou zhongda de xingfa.
Nimen buyao yi dui an la de xu yue huanqu disu de daijia [zhu], zai an la na li you dui nimen zui hao de, jiaru nimen zhidao.
Fanshi nimen suo yongyou de, dou shi yao xiaoshi de; fanshi an la suo yongyou de, dou shi yongheng de. Wo bi jiang yi jianren zhe suo zuo de zui hao shangong baochou tamen [houshi jin leyuan].
Wulun nannu, shei xinyang bing xingshan, wo bi shi ta [zai jinshi]guo shang meiman de shenghuo, wo bi jiang yi tamen suo zuo de zui hao shangong baochou tamen [houshi jin leyuan].
Dang ni yao songdu “gulanjing” shi, ni dang qiu an la baohu, mian zao bei quzhu de emo de qinrao.
Emo dui xinyang bing xinlai tamen de zhu [an la] de ren que shi wunengweili de.
Ta de quanli zhi xianyu yu ta wei you zhe, yiji gei ta [an la] shezhi huoban zhe.

Dang wo jiang shi [“gulanjing” de] yi jie jing wen tihuan ling yi jie jing wen shi, an la zui zhidao tasuo jiang shi de. Tamen [buxinyang zhe] shuo:“Ni [mu sheng] zhishi yige weizao zhe.” Bu, tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhi dao.
Ni shuo:“Shengling [zhu][ji bu li lei tianshi] yi cong ni de zhu yi zhenli jiang shi “gulanjing”, yibian shi xinshimen [de xinyang] jianding, shi dui guishun zhe [musilin] de yindao he xixun.”

Wo que zhi tamen [bu xinyang zhe] hui shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing”] zhishi yige fanren [zhu] chuanshou ta [mu sheng] de.” Tamen suo zhi di nage ren jiang de shi waiguo hua, er zhe bu “gulanjing” que shi mingbai de alabo yu.
Fan bu xinyang an la de jixiang zhe, an la jue bu yindao tamen. Tamen bi shou tongku de xingfa.
Wei bu xinyang an la de jixiang zhe cai hui niezao huangyan, zhexie ren que shi shuohuang zhe.

Shei zai xinyang an la hou you biaoshi bu xin——chufei ta shi bei po xuancheng bu xin, er qi neixin shi duxin de, dan shei ziyuan bu xinyang, tamen bi zao an la de qian nu, bi shou zhongda de xingfa [zhu].
Zhe shi yinwei tamen xi'ai jinshi sheng yu houshi [zhu]. An la jue bu yindao bu xinyang de minzhong.
Zhexie ren jiushi bei an la fengbile xin ermu di ren, zhexie ren que shi diaoyiqingxin de ren.
Wuyi, tamen zai houshi que shi sunshi zhe.
Ranhou, fan shou pohai hou qianyi zhe, ranhou [wei an la zhi dao] fendou bing jianren zhe, cihou, ni de zhu dui tamen que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de [zhu].
Zai na ri, mei ren dou jiang wei ziji bianjie, mei ren dou jiang huode ziji [zai chenshi] suo zuo shan e ying de de baochou, bu shou kuidai.

An la she ge biyu: Yige chengshi [mai jia] yuan shi anquan de, shi feichang manzu de, fengfu de jiyang [shangpin] cong ge fang yun lai, dan ta [mai jia de jumin] gufule an la de enhui [zhu], yinci, an la yin tamen suo zuo de e xing [fouren mu sheng deng] shi tamen changshile hanjian de jihuang he kongju.
Chuzi tamen ben zu de yi wei shizhe [mu sheng] que yi lailin tamen, dan tamen fouren ta, suoyi, xingfa zai tamen xing bu yi shi chengzhile tamen.
Fanshi an la ci gei nimen de, nimen dang chi hefa er jiamei de. Nimen dang ganxie an la de enhui, jiaru nimen zhi chongbai ta.

Ta zhi jinzhi nimen chi: Zi si wu, xieye, zhurou he nian fei an la zhi ming er zai de. Dan ruoshi pobudeyi er bingfei xiang weikang, qie wei chaoyue fadu zhe, name,[chi zhexie jinwu meiyou zuiguo]. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Nimen buyao yong nimen de she wangyan:“Zhe shi hefa de, na shi feifa de.” Yibian nimen jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan. Fan jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan zhe shi jue bu hui chenggong de [zhu].
Na zhishi duanzan de xiangle, tamen bi shou tongku de xingfa.

Duiyu youtai jiaotu, ci [“gulanjing” de shengchu zhang jiang shi] qian, wo ceng jinzhi tamen shiyong wo xiang ni [mu sheng] ti dao di naxie dongxi. Wo meiyou kuidai tamen, er shi tamen shi ziji shou sun.
Ranhou, fan yin wuzhi er zuo'e, ranhou huiguo zi xin zhe, cihou, ni de zhu dui tamen que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Yi bu la xin que shi [lingdao zhe de] yige biaoshuai, ta fucong an la, xinyang zhengjiao [yisilan jiao]. Ta bushi bai ouxiang zhe.
[Yi bu la xin] chang ganxie ta [an la] de enhui [zhu]. Ta [an la] te xuan ta [yi bu la xin] bing yindao ta zou zhengdao.
Zai jinshi, wo ciyu ta xingfu; zai houshi, ta bi zai shanren zhi lie.
Ranhou, wo qishi ni [mu sheng]:“Ni dang zunxing yi bu la xin de zongjiao——zhengjiao [yisilan jiao], ta bushi bai ouxiang zhe.”
Anxiri zhishi wei dui ci fenqi zhe guiding de. Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu bi jiang wei tamen panjue tamen suo fenqi de.

Ni dang yi zhihui [“gulanjing”] heshan yan quan ren zunxing ni de zhu de dao, ni dang yi zui hao de fangshi tong tamen bianlun. Ni de zhu zui zhidao shei beilile ta de dao, ye zui zhidao shei shi zunxing zhengdao zhe [zhu].
Jiaru nimen yao baofu [diren huo chouren], nimen jiu yi nimen suo bei shanghai de chengdu jinxing baofu. Dan jiaru nimen jianren, na dui jianren zhe shi zui hao de [zhu].
Ni [mu sheng] dang jianren, ni de jianren bi huo an la de xiangzhu. Ni buyao wei tamen [bai ouxiang zhe] youchou, buyao wei tamen suo gao de yinmou kunao.
An la dique yu jingwei zhe he xingshan zhe tong zai.

Zanmei ta [an la] chaojue! Shi ta zai yiye zhi jian ba ta de puren [mu sheng] cong [mai jia de] jin si dai dao wo ceng zai zhouwei ci fu de [yelusaleng de] yuan si, yibian wo zhaoshi ta [mu sheng] wo de yixie jixiang. Ta [an la] que shi quan wen de, quan shi de.
Wo ceng ciyu mu sa jingdian, bing shi ta chengwei yiselie de houyi de zhinan [qie mingling shuo]:“Nimen zhi neng yi wo wei baohu zhe.
Wo ceng shi qi yu nu ha [zhu] yiqi cheng chuan zhe de houyi a! Ta [nu ha] que shi yige hui gan'en de puren.”
Wo ceng zai jingdian zhong dui yiselie de houyi panjue:“Nimen bi jiang zai guonei liang ci zuoluan, nimen bi jiang kuangwang zi da.”
Dang liang ci zuoluan di yi ci de yue qi lailin shi, wo paiqian wo qiangda er ling rensheng wei de puren qu chengzhi nimen. Tamen roulinle nimen de jiayuan. Zhe shi yige yao luxing de xu yue.
Ranhou, wo wei nimen huifule fanji tamen de youshi. Wo yi caifu he ernu zizhu nimen, bing shi nimen renli zengduo.

[Wo shuo]:“Jiaru nimen xingshan, nimen jiang zi shou qi yi; jiaru nimen zuo'e, nimen jiang zi shou qi hai.” Dang di er ci zuoluan de yue qi lailin shi,[wo rang nimen de diren] shi nimen choumeikulian, yibian tamen xiang shang ci qinru [yelusaleng de] qingzhensi nayang zaici qinru qizhong, yibian tamen chedi cuihui tamen suo zhengfu de yiqie.

[Wo zai “tao la te” zhong shuo]:“Yexu nimen de zhu hui ci min nimen, danshi, jiaru nimen zai zuoluan, wo ye jiang huifu wo [chengzhi nimen] de xingfa.” Wo yi shi huo yu chengwei bu xinyang zhe de jianyu.
Zhe bu “gulanjing” que shi dao ren yu zui wanmei jingdi de, bing xiang xingshan de xinshi baoxi, tamen bi jiang huode zhongda de baochou [leyuan];
fan bu xinyang houshi zhe, wo yi wei tamen zhunbeile tongku de xingfa [huo yu].
Ren [xiang an la] qiqiu zaihuo jiu xiang qiqiu xingfu yiyang, ren zong shi jizao de.

Wo ba zhouye she wei liang zhong jixiang: Dang wo mo qu ye de jixiang shi, wo shi zhou de jixiang chengwei mingliang de, yibian nimen xunqiu nimen de zhu de enhui, yibian nimen zhidao nianshu he jisuan. Wo yi qingchu chanming wanshi wanwu.
Wo yi ba mei geren de xingwei xi zai ta de bozi shang, fuhuo ri, wo jiang xiang ta chushi yige zhang ben, ta jiang kan dao na zhang ben bei zhankai.
[You hua sheng dui ta shuo]:“Ni nian ni de [gongguo de] jilu ba! Jintian, ni zuyi zuo ni ziji de qingsuan ren.”

Shei zunxing zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru qitu, shei zi shou qi hai. Yige fu zui zhe bu fudan bieren de zui'e. Zai wo paiqian yi wei shizhe [jinggao] qian, wo bu hui chengfa renhe ren [huo chengshi de jumin].

Dang wo jueding huimie yige chengshi [de jumin] shi, wo shouxian mingling chengzhongguo fuyu shenghuo de ren fucong wo, dan tamen beini er xing, tamen ying shou xingfa de panjue. Wo chedi huimiele tamen.
Zai nu ha zhihou, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai. Ni de zhu zugou che zhi he quan shi ta de pu renmen de zui'e.

Fan yao jinshi duanzan de xiangshou zhe, wo jiu zai jinshi ba wo suo yiyu de ciyu wo suo yiyu zhe, ranhou, wo jiang yi huo yu [de xingfa] chengzhi ta. Ta jiang shou qianze, zao qi juedi bei gan ru huo yu zhong.
Fan yao houshi bing wei ci er nuli fendou de xinshi [zhu], zhexie ren de nuli bi jiang dedao [an la de] hui ci.
Wo yi ni de zhu de shangci zizhu suoyou ren——zhexie ren [yao jinshi zhe] he naxie ren [yao houshi zhe], ni de zhu de shangci shi wufa zuzhi de.
Ni dang guancha wo [zai jinshi] ruhe shi tamen yibufen ren you yu ling yibufen ren, houshi que shi pinji zuigao he zui shou youdai de.
[Ren a!] Ni buyao ji bai an la, you bai qita shenling [ci jie jing wen de rencheng daici sui zhi mu sheng, dan qi hanyi ze zhi quan renlei], yimian ni chengwei shou qianze de, zao yiqi de.

Ni de zhu mingling: Nimen zhi neng chongbai ta. Nimen dang xiaojing fumu, jiaru ta lia zhong de yi wei huo liang wei yu ni yiqi shenghuo dao gaoling, name, ni ji buyao dui ta lia shuo bu limao dehua, ye buyao he ze ta lia. Ni dang dui ta lia shuo xiaojing dehua.
Ni dang gongjing de fushi ta lia. Ni dang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni ci min ta lia, youru ta lia zai wo younian shi yangyu wo yiyang.”
Nimen de zhu zui zhidao nimen xinzhong suo xiang de. Jiaru nimen shi shanliang de, name, ta dui chang huizui zhe [zhu] que shi zui kuanshu de.
Ni dang ba qinqi, pinmin he luxing zhe ying de de shi gei tamen, dan buyao huihuo,
yinwei huihuo zhe que shi emo de xiongdi, emo dui ta de zhu [an la] zong shi wang'enfuyi de.

Jiaru ni [mu sheng] yin xiwang huode ni de zhu jiang shi de enhui hou zai shi gei tamen [qinqi, pinmin he luxing zhe], name, ni dang dui tamen shuo wenhe dehua [ru: Ruguo an la ciyu wo, wo jiu zeng yu nimen].
Ni ji buyao bashou shu zai bozi shang [linse], ye buyao wu jiezhi de shen kai [huihuo], yimian ni chengwei shou zebei de, pinkun de.
An la yu shi shei fuyu, jiu shi shei fuyu; yu shi shei jiongpo, jiu shi shei jiongpo. Ta dui ta de puren que shi che zhi de, quan shi de.
Nimen buyao yin pa pinqiong er shahai ziji de ernu, wo ci gei tamen, ye ci gei nimen. Shahai ernu que shi dazui [zhu].
Nimen buyao jiejin jianyin [zhu], jianyin que shi dazui he zui'e zhi yuan.

Chufei wei le zhengyi, fouze, nimen buyao shahai an la jinzhi shahai de shengming. Bei sha de ren [yin dishi he yapo guyi sharen, er bingfei wusha], wo yi shouquan ta de jichengren [ke jinxing tongdeng de baofu huo kuanshu huo shou fuxu jin], dan ta [zai baofu shi] buke chaoyue changming de fadu [zhi ke shahai xiongshou, buke shahai qita ren], ta que shi shou [yisilan jiao fa] yuanzhu de.
Nimen buyao jiejin gu'er de caichan, chufei shi weile gaishan, zhidao ta chengnian. Nimen dang luxing nuoyan, yinwei nuoyan que shi yao bei shenwen de.
Dang nimen liang wu shi, nimen dangliang zu [zhu]; nimen dang yong gongping de cheng cheng, zhe shi zui youli de, zui hao de jieju.
[Ren a!] Ni buyao zunxing ni suo bu zhidao de, yinwei er [tingjue] mu [shijue] xin [siwei] dou shi yao bei [an la] shenwen de.
Ni buyao zai dadishang aoman hengxing, yinwei ni ji buneng ta chuan dadi, ye buneng yu shan bi gao.
Zai ni de zhu kan lai,[shangshu ti dao de] zhexie e xing que shi kezeng de.
Zhe shi ni de zhu qishi ni [mu sheng] de zhihui, ni buyao ji bai an la, you bai qita shenling, fouze, ni jiang shou qianze, zao qi juedi bei touru huo yu zhong.
[Mai jia de yi jiaotu a!] Nandao nimen de zhu ba nanhai ciyu nimen, er ba tianshi liu wei ziji de nu'er ma? Nimen dique zai shuo huangmiu dehua.
Wo que yi zai zhe bu “gulanjing” zhong fanfu shenshu [wo de zhiyi], yibian tamen [bu xinyang zhe] jieshou quangao, dan zhe que shi tamen gengjia yanwu.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Jiaru xiang tamen suo wangyan di nayang, you xuduo yu ta [an la] tongdeng de zhuzai cunzai, name, tamen biding hui xiangfangshefa tong baozuo zhi zhu [an la] zhengsheng.”
Zanmei ta [an la] chaojue! Zhigaowushang de ta [an la] chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
Qi ge tian he da di, yiji qizhong de yiqie dou zansong ta [zhu][an la], wu yi wu bu zanmei songyang ta, dan nimen bu lijie tamen de zansong. Ta que shi zui kuanrong de, zui kuanshu de.
Dang ni [mu sheng] songdu “gulanjing” shi, wo zai ni yu bu xinyang houshi zhe zhi jian shezhile yidao yinxing pingzhang [zhu],

Wo zai tamen de xin shang anle mo, yimian tamen lijie ta [“gulanjing”], bing zai tamen de er zhong zhizao long dun. Dang ni [mu sheng] zai “gulanjing” zhong ti dao ni de zhu du yishi, tamen bian yanwu di zhuan shen paole.
Dang tamen ting ni song jing shi, wo zui zhidao tamen xiang ting shenme he tamen zai mi tan shenme. Dangshi, bu yi zhe shuo:“Nimen suo zhuisui de zhishi yige zhongle mo de ren.”
Ni dang guancha tamen ruhe na ni she biyu! Tamen yi wu ru qitu, suoyi, tamen zhao bu dao renhe zhengdao.
Tamen shuo:“Dang women bian cheng kugu he suipian shi, nandao women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo cheng yige xin de shengming ma?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Jishi nimen bian chengle shi kuai huo tie,

huo nimen de xinzhong renwei zui nan chuangzao de dongxi.” Tamen jiang shuo:“Shei shi women fuhuo ne?” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Zuichu chuangzao nimen de zhu.” Tamen jiang xiang ni yaotou shuo:“Ci shi he shi fasheng ne?” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nage shike yexu bu yuanle.
Zai na ri, ta jiang zhaohuan nimen, nimen jiang yi zansong [de yanci] lai xiangying ta de zhaohuan, nimen jiang renwei nimen [zai chenshi] zhi douliule pianke.”
Ni dui wo de pu renmen [zhu][zhen xinshi] shuo: Tamen ying shuo zui youmei de yanci, yin wei emo bi zai tamen zhi jian tiaobo lijian. Emo que shi renlei mingxian de diren.
Nimen de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de. Ta yu ci min nimen, jiu ci min nimen; yu chengfa nimen, jiu chengfa nimen. Wo meiyou paiqian ni [mu sheng] zuo tamen de jianhu zhe.
Ni de zhu shi zui zhidao tiandi jian de yiqie de. Wo que yi shi yibufen xianzhi you yu ling yibufen xianzhi, wo ceng ci gei da wude “zai bu'er”.
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen qiqiu nimen she ta [an la] er wangyan de shenling [ru tianshi, er sa deng] ba! Naxie shenling ji buneng wei nimen xiao zai, ye buneng [wei nimen] jia huo yu ren.”

Tamen suo qiqiu di naxie shenling, tamen [naxie shenling] ye zai [wei ziji] xunqiu jiejin tamen de zhu [an la] de lujing, bing huxiang jingzheng shei geng jiejin ta [an la]. Tamen [ru tianshi, er sa deng] kewang ta [an la] de ci min bing weiju ta de xingfa. Ni de zhu de xingfa que shi gai fangbei de [zhu].
Zai fuhuo ri zhiqian, wo jiang huimie suoyou chengshi [de jumin], huo jinxing yancheng. Zhe shi jilu zai tian jing zhong de.

Chule qian ren fouren [wo de jixiang] wai, renhe shi dou buneng zuzhi wo jiang shi jixiang. Wo ceng ba mu tuo zuowei mingzheng jiang gei sa mu de ren, dan tamen canren di duidai ta. Wo jiang shi jixiang, zhi weile [shi tamen] weiju [bei huimie].

Dangshi, wo dui ni shuo:“Ni de zhu que shi zhouzhi renlei de [ji renlei de yanxing jun zai an la de zhangkong zhong].” Wo [zai yexing zhi ye] suo zhaoshi ni de mengjing [zhu] he “gulanjing” zhong [jizai de] na ke bei zuzhou de shu, zhishi dui renlei de yi zhong kaoyan. Wo jinggao tamen fangbei, dan wo de jinggao que shi tamen gengjia beini.
Dangshi, wo dui tianshimen shuo:“Nimen dang fucong a dan.” Tamen dou fucongle, wei yi bu lisi liwai. Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Nandao wo yao fucong ni yong nitu chuangzao de ren ma?”

Ta you shuo:“[An la a!] Qiu ni gaosu wo ba! Zhe jiushi ni shi ta bi wo zungui de ren ma? Jiaru ni kuan yan wo [huo] dao fuhuo ri, wo biding yao youpian ta de houyi [bing shi qi wu ru qitu], shaoshu ren chuwai.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni zou ba! Tamen zhong fan zhuisui ni zhe, huo yu jiushi dui nimen de huan bao, yi xiang chongzu de huan bao.

Ni keyi yong ni de shengyin qu youpian tamen zhong ni suo neng youpian zhe, ni keyi yong ni de qibing he bubing qu xiji tamen, ni keyi tong tamen gongxiang caichan [ru yinyou tamen yong qizha de shouduan zhuanqian] he ernu [yinluan], ni keyi xunuo tamen.” Dan emo dui tamen de xunuo zhishi qipian eryi.
[An la hai shuo]:“Ni jue meiyou nengli duifu wo de pu renmen [zhen xinshi]. Ni de zhu zuyi zuo jianhu zhe.”
Nimen de zhu wei nimen er shi chuanbo zai haishang hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui. Ta dui nimen que shi te ci de.

Dang nimen zai haishang zaoyu buxing shi, nimen she ta [an la] er qiqiu di naxie shenling dou xiaoshile, wei ta cunzai. Dan dang ta shi nimen ping'an denglu shi, nimen que beipanle. Ren zong shi wang'enfuyi de.

Nandao nimen you bawo ta [an la] bu hui shi dadi de yibian tunmo nimen, huo jiang fei shazou shi de baofeng xiji nimen, ranhou, nimen jue buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe baohu zhe [baohu nimen mian shou an la de chengfa] ma?

Nandao nimen you bawo ta bu hui shi nimen zai qu hanghai, ranhou jiang jufeng xiji nimen, yin nimen wang'enfuyi er ba nimen yan si, ranhou, nimen jue buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe zhushou lai fankang wo ma?
Wo que yi youdai a dan de houyi, wo shi tamen zai lu shang he haishang du ke cheng yun, bing ci gei tamen jiamei zhi wu, shi tamen youyue yu wo suo chuangzao de xuduo ren.
Zai na ri, wo jiang zhaohuan mei ge minzu ji gezi de yi ma mu [shizhe]. Fan gongguo bu di gei youshou zhe, zhexie ren jiang du ziji gongguo de jilu, tamen bu shou sihao kuidai.
Zai jinshi mangmu zhe [bu guancha an la de jixiang, buxinyang an la deng], zai houshi ye jiang shi mangmu di, erqie gengjia yuanli zhengdao.

Tamen ceng xiangfangshefa yinyou ni fangqi wo suo qishi ni [mu sheng] de [“gulanjing”], yibian ni fangqi “gulanjing” er weizao yixie fandui wo de dongxi. Ruguo ni zhen de zuole, tamen jiu ba ni dang hao pengyou.
Jiaru wo bu shi ni jianding, ni jihu qingxiang tamenle.
Jiaru nayang, wo bi shi ni zai jinshi changshi jiabei de xingfa, zai houshi ye changshi jiabei de xingfa. Ranhou, ni jue buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe yuanzhu zhe lai fankang wo.
Tamen konghe ni, yibian jiang ni zhu chu guxiang. Jiaru nayang, zai ni likai hou, tamen ye buneng jiuliu.
Zhe shi wo zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian paiqian shizhemen de changdao. Ni jue buneng zai wo de changdao zhong faxian renhe biangeng.

Ni dang jin shou cong taiyang pian xi zhi heiye de bai gong [ji shang li, bu li, hun li he xiao li], dang zai liming shi songdu “gulanjing”[ji chen li], yinwei liming shi songdu “gulanjing” shi bei [tianshi] jianzheng de [zhu].[Wu fan bai gong ding wei zhuming de jing wen].
Zai ye de yibufen shijian li, ni dang xing lai libai, zhe shi shuyu ni de fu gong bai [zhu 1]. Ni de zhu yexu hui ba ni tisheng dao yige zhide chengzan de weizhi [zhu 2][leyuan li de zuigao jibie].
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo shunli jinru [mai di na], qiu ni shi wo shunli likai [mai jia], qiu ni ci gei wo yuanzhu de liliang.”
Ni [dui renmen] shuo:“Zhenli lailinliao, xuwang xiaoshile, xuwang biding shi yao xiaoshi de.”
Wo jiang shi “gulanjing”, shi dui xinshimen de zhiliao he ci min, dan zhe que shi bu yi zhe gengjia sunshi.
Dang wo shi en yu ren [bu xinyang zhe] shi, ren que aoman di zhuan shen bugu [qie yuanli zhengdao]; dan dang ta zaoyu buxing shi, ta you juewang.
Ni [dui renmen] shuo:“Mei ren dou yi ziji de fangfa zuo, nimen de zhu zui zhidao shei shi zunxing zhengdao de.”
Tamen wen ni [mu sheng]“linghun” shi shenme. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Linghun wei wo de zhu zhidao, nimen [renlei] zhi shou cile [guanyu linghun] hen shao de zhishi [zhu].”
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo biding shouhui wo suo qishi ni de [“gulanjing”], ranhou, ni jue buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe baohu zhe lai fankang wo.
Chufei yi ni de zhu jiang shi de enhui. Ta ci ni [mu sheng] de enhui que shi juda de.
Ni shuo:“Jiaru renlei he jingling dou lianhe qilai chuangzuo zheyang yi bu “gulanjing”, name, jishi tamen huxiang bangzhu, tamen ye buneng chuangzuo chu tongyang de jing wen.”
Wo que yi zai zhe bu “gulanjing” zhong wei renlei chanming ge zhong biyu, dan da duoshu ren haishi guzhi bu xin.
Tamen shuo:“Women jue bu xiangxin ni [mu sheng], chufei ni neng cong di li wei women yong chu yi gu quanshui lai;
huo ni youyige ye zao shu he putao [zhu] shu de guoyuan, ni neng shi zhu heliu xiang qijian;
huo xiang ni suo shuo di nayang, ni neng shi tian yikuai yikuai luo zai women de tou shang; huo ni neng ba an la he tianshimen dou qing dao women mianqian lai;

huo ni you yi suo jinwu; huo ni neng shengtian, dan women jue bu xiangxin ni neng shengtian, chufei ni jiang gei women yi ben women neng du dong de jingdian.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Zanmei wo de zhu chaojue! Wo zhishi yi wei shou zhu [an la] paiqian de fanren.”
Dang zhengdao jianglin renmen shi, zuzhi tamen xinyang de zhishi tamen shuo:“Nandao an la paiqian yi wei fanren lai zuo shizhe ma?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Jiaru tianshimen neng zai da dishang anran xingzou, name, wo biding cong tianshang jiang gei tamen yi wei tianshi zuo shizhe.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“An la zuyi zuo wo he nimen zhi jian de jianzheng zhe. Ta dui ta de pu renmen que shi che zhi de, quan shi de.”

An la yindao shei, shei jiu huode zhengdao; ta shi shei mi wu, name, chu ta wai, ni jue buneng wei tamen zhaodao renhe baohu zhe. Fuhuo ri, wo jiang ba tamen you xia you ya you long de paxingzhe jihe qilai, tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Mei dang huoshi jianruo shi, wo you gei tamen zengjia lieyan.
Zhe jiushi tamen de baochou, yinwei tamen fouren wo de jixiang bing shuo:“Dang women bian cheng kugu he suipian shi, nandao women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo cheng yige xin de shengming ma?”
Nandao tamen bu mingbai chuangzao tiandi de an la you nengli chuangzao xiang tamen yiyang de ren ma? Ta yi wei tamen guiding yige wuyi de qixian, dan bu yi zhe haishi guzhi buxin.
Ni [dui buxinyang zhe] shuo:“Jiaru nimen zhangguanle wo de zhu de enhui [qiancai, jiyang deng] zhi ku, name, nimen biding hui yin haipa yong wan er jiayi kouliu. Ren zong shi linse [zhu] de.”

Wo que yi ci gei mu sa jiu zhong mingxian de jixiang.[Guanyu zhexie jixiang], ni keyi xunwen yiselie de houyi. Dang ta lai dao tamen [aiji de jumin] nali shi, falao dui ta shuo:“Mu sa a! Wo renwei ni dique zhong mole.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Ni dique zhidao, wei tiandi de zhu [an la] caineng jiang shi zhexie zuowei mingzheng. Falao a! Wo dique renwei ni jiangyao bei huimie.”
Ta [falao] jueding ba tamen quzhu chujing, dan wo yan sile ta he ta de suoyou zhuisui zhe.
Cihou, wo dui yiselie de houyi shuo:“Nimen zai cidi juzhu ba! Dang zuihou de yue qi [fuhuo ri huo er sa jianglin dadi] lailin shi [zhu], wo jiang ba nimen hunhezhu jihe qilai.”
Wo yi zhenli jiang shi “gulanjing”, er “gulanjing” ye zhi yi zhenli jiang shi. Wo zhi paiqian ni [mu sheng] zuo [leyuan de] baoxi zhe he [huo yu de] jinggao zhe.
Wo lingxing jiang shi zhe bu “gulanjing”[“gulanjing” zai 23 nianjian jiang shi wanbi], yibian ni suihou neng ba ta xuandu ji renlei, wo zhujian jiang shi ta.
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen keyi xiangxin ta [“gulanjing”], ye keyi bu xiangxin ta. Dan ciqian shou ci zhishi de renmen, dang youren xiang tamen songdu ta shi, tamen dou fushou koutou.”
Tamen shuo:“Zanmei women de zhu chaojue! Women de zhu de nuoyan shi yiding yao luxing de.”
Tamen kuzhe fushou xiaqu,“gulanjing” shi tamen gengjia qiangong. Koutou chu

ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen keyong an la zhi ming qidao, ye keyong “la he man [pu ci zhi zhu]” zhi ming qidao. Wulun nimen yong nage zun ming [zhu] qiqiu ta, yiqie zuimei de mingcheng dou shi ta de.” Ni zai bai zhong ji buyao gao sheng langsong, ye buyao di sheng monian, ni dang zai ci zhi jian caiqu yitiao shizhong zhi dao.
Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la. Ta meiyou ernu. Ta zai zhuquan zhong ji meiyou huoban, ye bu hui wei quru er she baohu zhe.” Ni dang zansong ta zhi da.
Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, shi ta jiang gei ta de puren [mu sheng] zhe bu jingdian [zhu][“gulanjing”]. Ta wei zai qizhong shezhi renhe xiedao.

[Ta shi] zhe bu jingdian zhenshi wuxia, yibian jinggao [bu xinyang zhe], ta jiang jiang yanxing [chengzhi tamen], bing xiang xingshan de xinshimen baoxi, tamen bi jiang huode youmei de baochou [leyuan],
[tamen jiang] yong ju qizhong [xiangfu],
qie jinggao wangyan “an la you ernu” de renmen [youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu deng].
Tamen dui ci hao wu zhishi, tamen de zuxian ye yiyang. Tamen xinkoukaihe, tamen zong shi shuohuang.
Jiaru tamen bu xin ci yanci [zhu][“gulanjing”], youyu tamen beili, ni [mu sheng] yexu hui yin beifen er huimie zishen.
Wo que yi shi dadishang de yiqie zuowei da di de zhuangshi wu, yibian wo kaoyan tamen [renlei]: Kan tamen shei de shangong zui hao.
Wo bi jiang ba da dishang de yiqie hua wei guangtutu [huangliang] de pingdi.
Nandao ni renwei shandong ren he beiwen de zhuren shi wo de jixiang zhong de yi jian qi shi ma?

Dangshi, you ji ge qingnian ren [tao li bu xinyang de minzhong] bi ju shandong zhong. Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni ba ni de enhui ciyu women ba! Qiu ni yindao women shunli zouchu women de kunjing.”
Wo shi tamen zai shandong zhong shuile xuduo nian.
Ranhou, wo rang tamen xing lai, yibian wo ceyan liang pai ren zhong na yipai geng neng zhengque jisuan tamen suo tingliu de shijian.
Wo rushi xiang ni [mu sheng] jiangshu tamen de gushi: Tamen shi ji ge qingnian ren, tamen xinyang tamen de zhu [an la], yin'er wo ciyu tamen geng duo de yindao [zhu].
Wo shi tamen de xin jianding. Dangshi, tamen zhan qilai shuo:“Women de zhu shi tiandi de zhu, women jue bu she ta er qiqiu renhe zhuzai [zhu], fouze, women biding fan liao bu xinyang de dazui.

Women de zhexie zuren, tamen she ta [an la] er chongbai qita zhuzai. Tamen weihe meiyou yi zhong mingzheng neng zhengshi tamen suo chongbai de zhuzai ne? Shei bi jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan zhe geng bu yi ne?

[Naxie qingnian ren huxiang shuo:] Dang nimen likai tamen he tamen she an la er chongbai de zhuzai shi, nimen ke bi ju shandong zhong, nimen de zhu bi dui nimen guang shi ta de enhui, bing shi nimen de shiwu shunli.”

Dang taiyang sheng qi shi, ni keyi kanjian taiyang pianxiang tamen de shandong de youbian; dang taiyang luoshan shi, taiyang jiu pianxiang tamen de shandong de zuobian, er tamen jiu tang zai shandong de zhongyang. Zhe shi an la de jixiang zhi yi. An la yindao shei, shei jiu huode zhengdao; ta shi shei mi wu, name, ni jue buneng wei ta zhaodao renhe pengyou lai yindao ta [zunxing zhengdao].

Ni renwei tamen shi xingzhe de, qishi tamen shi shuizhe de. Wo shi tamen zuoyou fanshen. Tamen de gou [zhu] shen zhao liang tiao qian tui wo zai dongkou [jingwei]. Jiaru ni kanjian tamen, ni biding bei xia de zhuan shen er tao, biding shen shou jinghai.

Wo ruci shi tamen xing lai, yibian tamen huxiang xunwen. Tamen zhong you yiren shuo:“Nimen [zai ci] tingliule duojiu?” Tamen shuo:“Women tingliule yitian huo bu dao yitian.” Tamen shuo:“Nimen de zhu zui zhidao nimen [zai ci] tingliule duojiu. Nimen pai nimen zhong de yiren daizhe nimen de zhexie yinbi dao cheng li qu, rang ta kan kan na jia de shiwu zui jiejing, rang ta gei nimen mai xie shiwu lai. Jiao ta xiaoxin jinshen, yimian youren ren chu nimen.
Ruguo tamen [cheng li ren] ren chu nimen, tamen biyong shi kuai da si nimen, huo qiangpo nimen zai xin tamen de zongjiao, ruguo nayang, nimen shi jue bu hui chenggong de.”

Wo ruci rang renmen zhidao tamen, yibian tamen zhidao an la de nuoyan que shi zhenshi de, fuhuo de shijian que shi wuyi de. Dangshi, tamen [cheng li ren] zheng wei tamen [shandong ren] de shi er zhenglun. Tamen [cheng li ren] shuo:“Nimen yinggai [zai dongkou] jian yi du qiang diyu tamen, yinwei tamen de zhu zui zhidao tamen.” Zai zhenglun zhong huosheng de renmen shuo:“Women yiding yao zai tamen nali jian yi suo qingzhensi.”

Youxie ren [mu sheng shidai dui shandong ren de zhenglun zhe] shuo:“[Tamen] shi san ge, di si ge shi tamen de gou.” Ling yixie ren shuo:“[Tamen] shi wu ge, di liu ge shi tamen de gou.” Zhexie shi caice wei jian zhi wu. Hai you yixie ren shuo:“[Tamen] shi qi ge, di ba ge shi tamen de gou.” Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu zui zhidao tamen de shumu, ciwai, zhiyou shaoshu ren zhidao tamen [de zhenxiang].” Chule yong [wo yi qishi ni de] mingzheng wai, ni ji buyao tong tamen zhenglun tamen [shandong ren] de shumu, ye buyao xiang renhe ren [ru youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu] qingjiao tamen [shandong ren] de shiqing.
Ni dui renhe shi dou jue buyao shuo:“Wo mingtian yiding zuo na shi.”
Chufei [ni tongshi shuo]:“Jiaru an la yiyu [zhu][ji tuo kao zhu].” Dang ni wangji [hou you xiangqi] shi, ni dang zan nian ni de zhu shuo:“Yexu wo de zhu hui zhiyin wo bi zhe geng jin de zhengdao.”
Tamen zai shandong zhong [an yangli jisuan] tingliule sanbai nian, youxie ren [an yinli jisuan] you jiale jiu nian [ji 309 nian].

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“An la zui zhidao tamen tingliule duojiu. Tiandi jian de yiqie wei jian zhi wu dou shi ta de.” Ta kan de zhen qingchu! Ta ting de zhen mingbai! Chu ta wai, tamen jue meiyou renhe baohu zhe. Ta jue bu rang renhe ren shen yu ta de panjue.
Ni [mu sheng] dang [xiang renmen] songdu ni de zhu de jingdian [“gulanjing”] zhong yi qishi ni de. Jue meiyou ren neng gaibian ta de yanyu, chu ta wai, ni jue buneng zhaodao renhe binan suo.

Ni [mu sheng] dang naixin di shi ziji tong zaowan qiqiu tamen de zhu, xunqiu ta de xiyue de renmen zai yiqi. Ni buyao aoshi tamen er xunqiu jinshi shenghuo de fuhua. Fanshi wo shi qi xin hushi zan nian [zhu] wo, shuncong qi siyu, qi xingwei sunshi de ren, ni buyao shuncong tamen.

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Zhege zhenli shi cong nimen de zhu jiang shi de, shei yuan xin, shei jiu xin; shei bu yuan xin, shei ke buxin.” Wo dique wei bu yi zhe zhunbeile huo yu [zhu], huo yu zhi qiang [lieyan] jiang baowei zhu tamen. Jiaru tamen [yin jiaoke er] qiujiu, jiang gei tamen yi zhong feishui ban hui shao mian de tong shui he. Zhe zhong yinliao zhen kepa! Zhe zhong guisu zhen elie!
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, wo jue bu shi xingshan zhe de baochou tulao [zhu].

Zhexie ren bi jiang huode yongjiu de leyuan, zhu he cong limian liuguo. Tamen zai leyuan li dai de shi jin shouzhuo, chuan de shi luse de jinxiu si pao, kao de shi bao yi. Zhe zhong baochou zhen hao! Zhe zhong guisu zhenmei!
Ni dang wei tamen she ge biyu: You liang geren, wo ciyu qizhong yiren liang ge putao yuan, bing yi ye zao shu wei zhu liang yuan, liang yuan zhi jian liu zuo gengdi.
Liang yuan dou chuchan shuiguo, hao bu qianque. Wo shi yitiao heliu liuru liang yuan zhi jian.
Yuan zhu you hen hao de shouhuo. Ta zai tanhua shi dui ta de linju shuo:“Wo de caifu bi ni de duo, wei wo fuwu de ren ye bi ni de qiangda.”
Ta zi'ao de jinru ziji de yuan zhong. Ta shuo:“Wo jue bu xiangxin zhexie dongxi hui huimie,
wo jue bu xiangxin fuhuo de shijian hui lailin. Jishi [fuhuo ri] wo bei zhao dao wo de zhu nali, wo zai nali ye neng huode bi zhe geng hao de guisu.”
Ta de linju zai tanhua shi dui ta shuo:“Nandao ni buxin zaowuzhu ma? Ta chuangzao ni [de zuxian a dan], xian yong nitu, ji yong jingye, ranhou ba ni zaocheng yige wanshan de ren.
Dan dui wo er yan,[wo quexin] ta jiushi an la, shi wo de zhu, wo jue bu gei wo de zhu shezhi renhe huoban.
Dang ni jinru ni de guoyuan shi, ni weihe bu shuo:“Zhe shi an la suo yiyu de [jieguo], hao wu banfa, wei kao an la [zhu].” Jiaru ni renwei wo zai caifu he ernu fangmian dou buru ni,
wo de zhu yexu hui ci wo yixie bi ni de guoyuan geng hao de dongxi, bing cong tianshang gei ni de guoyuan jiangxia zainan, shi ta bian cheng guangtutu de pingdi,
huo yuan li de shui shenru dixia, ni jue buneng zai zhaodao.”
Ta de shuiguo quan bei cuihuile, putao jia daotale, ta wei [sunshi] shiyong zai guoyuan shang de feiyong er ning shou. Ta [zhihao] shuo:“Yaoshi wo meiyou gei wo de zhu shezhi huoban duo hao a!”
[Ci shi] meiyou renhe qunti neng yuanzhu ta diyu an la [de xingfa], ta ye buneng zijiu.
Na shi [fuhuo ri], yiqie quanli quan gui an la——zhenli zhi zhu, ta shi zui shanyu shangci de, zui shanyu chengfa de.

Ni wei tamen she ge biyu: Jinshi shenghuo [zhu], haobi wo cong tiankong jiangxia de yushui, dadishang de zhiwu jie ci er fanmao shengzhang, dan bujiu jiu bian de ganku diaoling, sui feng piaoluo. An la dui wanshi shi wanneng de.
Caifu he ernu zhishi jinshi shenghuo de zhuangshi. Zai ni de zhu kan lai, chijiu de shangong [ru mei ri jianshou wu fan bai gong] cai shi baochou zui hao de, xiwang zuida de.
Zai na ri, wo jiang shi qun shan xiaoshi, ni jiang kanjian da di shi guangtutu de pingyuan. Wo jiang ba tamen dou jihe qilai, bu hui yilou tamen zhong de renhe ren.

Tamen jiang pailie zai ni de zhu de qianmian [shoushen].[Na shi an la jiang shuo]:“[Xianzai], nimen que yi lai dao wo zheli, zhengru wo zuichu chuangzao nimen yiyang. Qishi, nimen ceng wangyan wo bu hui wei nimen guiding yige [yu wo xiang hui de] yue qi.”

Gongguo bu jiang zhanxian chulai [xinshi di gongguo bu jiang di gei youshou, bu xinyang zhe de gongguo bu jiang di gei zuoshou], ni jiang kanjian fanzui zhe weiju qizhong suo jilu de. Tamen jiang shuo:“Zhen daomei! Zhe shi shenme gongguo bu? Wulun dashi xiaoshi, dou ru shu jilule, hao bu yilou.” Tamen jiang faxian tamen suo zuo de yiqie dou zhanxian zai mianqian. Ni de zhu jue bu kuidai renhe ren.

Dangshi, wo dui tianshimen shuo:“Nimen dang fucong a dan.” Tamen dou fucongle, wei yi bu lisi liwai. Ta [yi bu lisi] yuan shi jingling, ta weibeile ta de zhu de mingling. Ta he ta de houyi dou shi nimen de diren, nandao nimen yao she wo er yi tamen wei baohu zhe ma? Bu yi zhe suo huanqu de zhen elie!
Wo meiyou shi tamen jianzheng tiandi de chuangzao he tamen ziji de chuangzao, wo meiyou ba you ren mi wu zhe dang zhushou.

Zai na ri, ta [an la] jiang shuo:“Nimen zhaohuan nimen suo wangyan de wo de huobanmen ba!” Yushi tamen jiu jiaohan tamen, dan tamen bu yingda tamen. Wo jiang zai tamen zhi jian shezhi yidao huimie zhi keng.
Fanzui zhe jiang kanjian huo yu, tamen renwei tamen bi duo ru qizhong, wu chu ke tao.
Wo que yi zai zhe bu “gulanjing” zhong wei renlei chanming ge zhong biyu, dan ren zong xihuan zhengbian.

Dang zhengdao [“gulanjing”] jianglin renmen shi, zuzhi tamen xinyang bing qiu tamen de zhu kuanshu de, zhishi tamen yao dengdai qian ren [zao chengfa] de xianli jianglin tamen, huo mudu xingfa jianglin tamen.
Wo zhi paiqian shizhemen zuo baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe, dan bu xinyang zhe que yi xuwang xiang zhengbian, yibian jie ci bodao zhenli. Tamen na wo de jixiang he tamen suo bei jinggao di dang xiaobing.

Shei bi zhe zhong ren geng bu yi ne? Youren yi ta de zhu de qishi quan jie ta, er ta que beiqi bing wangji ta qinshou suo fan de zui'e. Wo que yi zai tamen de xin shang anle mo, yimian tamen lijie ta [“gulanjing”], bing zai tamen de er zhong zhizao long dun, jishi ni [mu sheng] zhaohuan tamen zunxing zhengdao, tamen ye jue bu hui zunxing zhengdao.

Ni de zhu shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de. Jiaru ta yaoyin tamen suo zuo de [zui'e] chengfa tamen, name, ta biding zaoyi jiangxia chengzhi tamen de xingfa, dan tamen you yige dingqi,[na shi] tamen jiang faxian wu chu ke tao.
Naxie chengshi de jumin [ru a de ren he sa mu de ren deng] xing bu yi shi, wo huimiele tamen. Wo wei tamen de huimie guidingle yige qixian.
Dangshi, mu sa dui ta de tongpu shuo:“Wo jiang bu ting de luxing, zhidao wo daoda liang he de huihe chu, fouze, wo jiang luxing haoji nian [zhu].”
Dang ta lia daoda liang he de huihe chu shi, ta lia wangjile ta lia di na tiao yu, er na yu ye xun lu ru he youxian di you zoule.
Dang ta lia zou yuan shi, ta dui ta de tongpu shuo:“Na chu women de zaofan lai chi! Women de zhe ci luxing shizai tai leile.”
Ta shuo:“Ni ke ceng jide? Dang women dao yanshi shang xiuxi shi, wo dique ba yu wangle, zhiyou emo cai hui shi wo wangji tixing ni: Na yu xun lu ru he you zoule. Zhenshi guaishi!”
Ta shuo:“Zhe jiushi women yao xunqiu de.” Yushi ta lia you shun yuan lu fanhui.
Ta lia faxianle wo de yige puren [he di er], wo ceng ba wo de enhui ciyu ta, bing ba wo de yixie zhishi chuanshou ta.
Mu sa dui ta [he di er] shuo:“Wo xiang gensui ni, qing ni jiaoshou wo an la chuanshou ni de yixie zhishi [zhihui], keyi ma?”
Ta [he di er] shuo:“Ni buneng naixin [zhu] de tong wo zai yiqi.
Ni zen neng rennai ni suo bu zhidao de shi ne?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Jiaru an la yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi you naixin de, wo bu hui zai renhe shi shang weikang ni.”
Ta [he di er] shuo:“Jiaru ni yao gensui wo, zai wo dui ni jiangshu qian, ni buneng wen wo renhe shi.”

Yushi ta lia bian chufale. Dang ta lia cheng chuan shi, ta [he di er] ba chuan zaole yige dong. Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Ni ba chuan zao yige dong, shi yao ba chuan li de ren dou yan si ma? Ni dique zuole yi jian can du di shi!”
Ta [he di er] shuo:“Nandao wo meiyou shuoguo ni buneng naixin di tong wo zai yiqi ma?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Ni buyao yin wo wangjile er zhize wo [zhu], qing ni buyao ze wo suo nan.”

Ranhou, ta lia you jixu zou. Dang ta lia yujian yige nan tong shi, ta [he di er] jiu shale nage nan tong. Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Nandao ni shahai yige weiceng shaguo renhe ren de wugu zhe ma? Ni dique zuole yi jian kepa de shi!”
Ta [he di er] shuo:“Nandao wo meiyou dui ni shuoguo ni buneng naixin di tong wo zai yiqi ma?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Cihou, jiaru wo zai wen ni renhe shi, ni jiu bubi rang wo peitong nile, ni ye suanshi renzhiyijinle.”

Yushi ta lia you jixu zou. Dang ta lia lai dao yige chengshi de jumin chu shi, ta lia xiang gai cheng de jumin yao shiwu chi, dan tamen bu ken zhaodai [zhu] ta lia. Houlai ta lia zai cheng li faxian yi du qiang kuaiyao daotale, yushi ta [he di er] jiu ba na du qiang fuzheng. Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Jiaru ni yuanyi, ni dique ke wei ci suoqu baochou!”
Ta [he di er] shuo:“Wo he ni gai gaobiele. Wo jiang xiang ni jieshi ni suo buneng rennai di naxie shi.
Guanyu na sou chuan, ta shi shuyu zai haishang laozuo de ji ge pinmin de, wo zhi suoyi yao gao ge quexian sunhuai ta, shi yinwei zai tamen de houmian youyi wei guowang yaoqiang zheng yiqie chuanzhi.
Zhiyu nage nan tong, ta de fumu dou shi xinshi, wo pa ta hui yi panni he buxin qiya ta lia,
suoyi, wo xiwang ta lia de zhu [an la] ling ci ta lia yige geng chunjie, geng xiaojing de erzi.

Zhiyu na du qiang, ta shi shuyu cheng li de liang ge nianqing nan gu'er de, qiang xiamian maizhe ta lia de caibao. Ta lia de fuqin shi yi wei shanren, ni de zhu yu zai ta lia chengnian hou zai rang ta lia quchu ta lia de caibao, zuowei cong ni de zhu jiang shi de yi xiang enhui. Wo meiyou zizuo zhuzhang zuo zhexie shi. Zhe jiushi ni suo buneng rennai de shi de jieshi.”
Tamen wen ni zu lei gao er naiying. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo jiang xiang nimen xushu youguan ta de yixie qingkuang.”
Wo ceng shi ta zai da dishang huode quanli, bing ci ta chuli wanshi de tujing.
Ta zunxing yitiao tujing.

Dang ta daoda riluo zhi chu shi, ta faxian taiyang zheng luo ru hei ni quan zhi zhong, bing zai fujin faxianle yige minzu. Wo [an la] shuo:“Zu lei gao er naiying a! Ni keyi chengfa tamen, ye keyi shandai tamen.”
Ta shuo:“Shei xing bu yi, wo jiu chengfa shei, ranhou, ta jiang bei dai dao ta de zhu [an la] nali qu, ta [an la] jiang yi yanxing [huo yu] chengfa ta.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, ta jiang huode youmei de baochou [leyuan], wo [zu lei gao er naiying] jiang [zaixia mingling shi] dui ta shuo shan yan.”
Ranhou, ta you zunxing yitiao tujing.
Dang ta daoda ri chu zhi chu shi, ta faxian taiyang zheng cong yige minzu de shangmian sheng qi, wo [an la] meiyou ci gei tamen fang ri shai zhi wu.
Shishi jiushi zheyang. Wo dique zhidao ta [zu lei gao er naiying] de yiqie.
Ranhou, ta you zunxing yitiao tujing.
Dang ta daoda liang shan [de shangu] zhi jian shi, ta faxian na li you ge minzu, tamen jihu bu dong [ta de] yuyan.
Tamen shuo:“Zu lei gao er naiying a! Ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe [zhu] zhengzai bendi zuo'e. Women xiang ni jingong, qing ni zai women he tamen zhi jian xiujian yidao bilei, hao ma?”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu ciyu wo de [caifu yu quanli deng bi nimen de gong wu] geng hao. Nimen yi laoli xiezhu wo ba! Wo jiang zai nimen he tamen zhi jian xiujian yidao bilei.

Nimen na tie kuai gei wo ba!” Dang ta tian man liang shan zhi jian [de shangu] shi, ta shuo:“Nimen la fengxiang ba!” Dang ta shi tie kuai bian de huohong shi, ta shuo:“Nimen na tong shui gei wo jiaozhu zai shangmian ba!”
Zheyang, tamen [ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe] ji buneng pandeng shanglai, ye buneng zao chuan ta.
Ta [zu lei gao er naiying] shuo:“Zhe shi yi wo de zhu de enhui wancheng de. Dang wo de zhu de nuoyan jianglin shi, ta jiang ba zhe dao bilei yi wei pingdi. Wo de zhu de nuoyan shi zhenshi de.”
Zai na ri [ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe bei shifang zhi ri], wo jiang rang tamen langtao ban chong chu. Haojiao yi chui xiang, wo jiang ba tamen quanbu jihe qilai.
Zai na ri, wo jiang ba huo yu zhanxian zai bu xinyang zhe mianqian,
tamen de yan jiang bei zhebi, ji buneng kanjian wo de jiaohui [“gulanjing”], ye buneng tingjian.
Nandao bu xinyang zhe renwei, tamen keyi she wo er ba wo de purenmen [ru tianshi, er sa deng] dang zhuzai ma? Wo que yi ba huo yu yubei wei bu xinyang zhe de zhaodai chu.
Ni shuo:“Yao wo gaosu nimen zai hang wei fangmian zui sunshi de ren ma [zhu]?
Tamen jiushi zai jinshi shenghuo zhong tulao wuyi de, er tamen que renwei tamen shi xingshan huo yi de [zhu].
Zhexie ren jiushi fouren tamen de zhu de jixiang he [houshi] yu ta xiang hui de ren. Yinci, tamen de shangong yi tulao. Fuhuo ri, wo jiang bu gei tamen jisuan renhe shangong [zhu].
Zhe jiushi tamen de baochou——huo yu, yinwei tamen bu xinyang bing ba wo de jixiang he shizhemen dang xiaobing.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, leyuan jiushi tamen de kuandai chu.
Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong er bu yuan likai.”

Ni [dui renmen] shuo:“Jiaru yi haishui wei mozhi lai jilu wo de zhu de yuyan, name, zai wo de zhu de yuyan shangwei hao jin qian, haishui biding xian yong jin, jishi wo zai jia shang tongyang de yi fen haishui,[ye buneng xie jin wo de zhu de yuyan].”

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo zhishi tong nimen yiyang de fanren, wo suo feng dao de qishi shi: Nimen ying chongbai de zhu zhishi du yi de zhu [an la]. Shei xiwang yu ta de zhu xiang hui, shei jiu gai zuo shangong, zhi neng chongbai ta de zhu [an la], bu gei ta shezhi renhe huoban.”
Kefu, ha, ya, a yin, sa de [alabo yu wu ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
[Zhe shi] xushu ni de zhu dui ta de pu ren zai ke li ya de enhui.
Dangshi, ta di sheng qiqiu ta de zhu [an la].
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de guge shuairuole, wo de tou ye bai fa cangcangle. Wo de zhu a! Zai wo dui ni de qidao zhong, wo cong wei shiwangguo.
Wo si zhihou, wo zhen de danxin wo de qinrenmen hui zou xiedao; wo de qizi ye buneng shengyule, qiu ni ci wo yige jichengren [erzi],
rang ta jicheng [zhu] wo he ya gubu de houyi [zhi jicheng zongjiao zhishi, er bingfei jicheng caifu]. Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi ta chengwei shou ni xiyue de.”
[Zhu de dafu shi]:“Zai ke li ya a! Wo jiang yi yige er zi xiang ni baoxi, ta de mingzi jiao ye ha ya. Yiqian, wo wei gei renhe ren quguo zhege mingzi.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de qizi buneng shengyule, wo ye shuailaole, wo zenme hai hui you erzi ni?”
Ta shuo:“Shishi jiushi zheyang. Ni de zhu shuo:“Zhe dui wo shi rongyi de, wo yiqian chuangzao ni shi, ni ye bu cunzai.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhaoshi wo yi zhong jixiang ba!” Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni de jixiang shi: Ni lianxu [san tian] san ye butong renmen jianghua, er ni you bu huan bing.”
Ta cong libai dian chulai jian ta de zuren, bing xiang tamen xuangao:“Nimen dang zhaoxi zansong an la.”
[Wo mingling ye ha ya shuo]:“Ye ha ya a! Ni dang jianchi jingdian [“tao la te”].” Wo zai ta tongnian shi yi ci ta zhihui,
Bing shi ta tongqing renmen, zuowei wo jiang shi de ci'ai, qie shi ta chengwei chunjie zhe. Ta shi jingwei de,
shi xiaojing ta de fumu de. Ta bu aoman, ye bu beini [an la huo fumu].
Ta zai chusheng ri, siwang ri he fuhuo ri dou xiangshou zhu ci de ping'an.
Ni [mu sheng] dang zai zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] zhong jiangshu ma'er ya [zhu][de gushi]: Dangshi ta shi ruhe likai ta de jiaren er dao dongbian de yige difang yinju de.
Ta anzhile yige ping zhang, yi bi kai tamen, ranhou, wo pai wo de jingshen [ji bu li lei tianshi] dao ta nali qu, ta zai ta mianqian xianxian cheng yige wanmei de ren.
Ta [dui ta] shuo:“Wo qiu pu ci zhi zhu [an la] baohu wo, mian zao ni de qinhai, jiaru ni shi jingwei [an la] zhe.”
Ta [ji bu li lei tianshi] shuo:“Wo zhishi ni de zhu paiqian de shizhe, wo lai [xiang ni] xuanbu zhujiang ci ni yige chunjie de erzi [de xixun].”
Ta shuo:“Hai meiyou yi wei nanren jiechuguo wo, er wo bingfei bu zhenjie de nuren, wo zenme hui you erzi ni?”
Ta shuo:“Shishi jiushi zheyang. Ni de zhu shuo:“Zhe dui wo [an la] shi rongyi de, wo jiang shi ta chengwei renlei de yi zhong jixiang he cong wo jiang shi de yi zhong enhui. Zhe shi jiding zhishi.”
Yushi ta bian huaile yun [ta], ta huaizhe ta dao yige pianpi di difang [ju yelusaleng yue sizhi liu yingli de boliheng shangu] yinju.
Fenmian de zhentong poshi ta lai dao yi ke ye zao shu xia. Ta shuo:“Yaoshi wo ciqian jiu sile duo hao a! Yaoshi wo bei ren yiwang duo hao a!”
Ci shi, you ge shengyin [ying'er er sa huo ji bu li lei tianshi] cong ye zao shu xia dui ta han dao:“Ni buyao youchou, ni de zhu yi zai ni de xiamian zaole yitiao xiao xi.
Ni chaozhe ziji yaodong ye zao shu, xinxian chengshu de zaozi jiu hui luo zai ni mianqian.
Ni chi ba! Ni he ba! Ni gaoxing ba! Jiaru ni kanjian youren lai, ni jiu shuo:“Wo yi lishi wei pu ci zhi zhu [an la] zhaijie, yinci, wo jintian butong renhe ren jianghua.”
Ranhou, ta baozhe ying'er lai dao ta de zuren nali. Tamen shuo:“Ma'er ya a! Ni dique dai laile yi jian wensuoweiwen de shiqing.
Ha lu [ci ren bushi mu sa di gege ha lun, xi ma'er ya shidai de yi wei qiancheng zhe] de jiemei a! Ni fuqin ji bushi yige dairen, ni muqin ye bingfei bu zhenjie zhe.”
Ta zhizhe nage ying'er. Tamen shuo:“Women zen neng yu yaolan zhong de ying'er jianghua ne [zhu]?”
Ta [nage ying'er] shuo:“Wo que shi an la de puren, ta yi ci wo jingdian, bing rang wo zuo yi wei xianzhi.
Wulun wo zai nali, ta duhui ci fu wo. Ta zhufu wo: Zhiyao wo huozhe jiu dang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke,
xiaojing wo muqin. Ta meiyou shi wo chengwei aoman zhe, buxing zhe.
Wo zai chusheng ri, siwang ri he fuhuo ri dou xiangshou zhu ci de ping'an.”
Zhe jiushi ma'er ya zhizi er sa, shi tamen suo zhenglun de zhenli de chenshu.
An la jue bu hui you ernu [bochi er sa shi an la zhizi de wangyan]. Zanmei ta [an la] chaojue! Dang ta panjue yi jian shiwu shi, ta zhi xu xialing shuo:“You!” Yushi jiu youle.
[Er sa shuo]:“An la que shi wo de zhu he nimen de zhu, suoyi, nimen dang chongbai ta, zhe shi zhengdao.”
Tamen [jidu jiaotu] zhong ge pai [dui er sa de shenshi] yijian fenqi. Fan buxin zhongda zhi ri jijiang lailin zhe, tamen jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Dang tamen lai jian wo di na ri, tamen ting de zhen mingbai! Tamen kan de zhen qingchu! Dan bu yi zhe jintian que shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.
Ni [mu sheng] dang jinggao tamen huihen zhi ri, na shi wanshi yi ding, dan tamen [xianzai] haishi shuhu dayi, haishi bu xinyang [zhu].
Wo bi jiang jicheng dadi ji da dishang de yiqie. Tamen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai.
Ni dang zai zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] zhong jiangshu yi bu la xin [de gushi]. Ta que shi yi wei qiancheng zhe, que shi yi wei xianzhi.
Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin shuo:“Wo de fuqin a! Ni weisheme yao chongbai naxie ji bu hui ting, ye bu hui kan, dui ni hao wu yichu de dongxi ne?
Wo de fuqin a! Wo que yi shou ci ni suo meiyou huode de zhi shi, suoyi, ni dang gensui wo, wo jiang yindao ni yitiao zhengdao.
Wo de fuqin a! Ni buyao chongbai emo, emo que shi weikang pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de.
Wo de fuqin a! Wo dique haipa ni hui zaoshou cong pu ci zhi zhu [an la] jiang shi de xingfa, yizhi chengwei [huo yu li] emo de pengyou.”
Ta [ta de fuqin] shuo:“Yi bu la xin a! Nandao ni yanwu wo [chongbai] de zhuzai ma? Jiaru ni bu tingzhi, wo biyong shitou da si ni.[Zai wo chengfa ni zhiqian], ni likai wo yuanzougaofei ba!”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Qiu zhu ci ni ping'an! Wo jiang qiu wo de zhu kuanshu ni, ta dui wo que shi renci de.
Wo jiang bi kai nimen ji nimen she an la er qiqiu de [ouxiang]. Wo jiang qiqiu wo de zhu, huoxu youyu qiqiu wo de zhu, wo buzhi chengwei buxing zhe.”
Dang ta likai tamen ji tamen she an la er chongbai de [ouxiang] shi, wo ci gei ta yi si ha ge he ya gubu, bing shi ta lia dou chengwei xianzhi.
Wo ci gei tamen wo de enhui [fengfu de jiyang], bing shi tamen xiangyou chonggao de shengyu.
Ni dang zai zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] zhong jiangshu mu sa [de gushi]. Ta que shi bei te xuan de, que shi yi wei shizhe he xianzhi.
Wo cong na zuo shan de youbian zhaohuan ta [mu sa], wo zhao ta lai yu wo mitan.
Wo ci gei ta wo de enhui——ta di gege ha lun——yi wei xianzhi [zuo ta de zhushou].
Ni dang zai zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] zhong jiangshu yi si ma yi. Ta que shi xinshou nuoyan de, que shi yi wei shizhe he xianzhi.
Ta chang zhufu ta de jiaren yao jin shou bai gong he wan na tian ke. Zai ta de zhu [an la] nali, ta shi shou xiyue de.
Ni dang zai zhe bu jingdian zhong jiangshu yi de lisi. Ta que shi yi wei qiancheng zhe, que shi yi wei xianzhi.
Wo yi ba ta tisheng dao yige chonggao di diwei.

Zhexie ren jiushi an la ceng ciyu enhui de xianzhimen. Tamen shuyu a dan de houyi, shuyu wo shi qi yu nu ha yiqi cheng chuan zhe de houyi, shuyu yi bu la xin he yiselie de houyi, shuyu wo suoyindao he xuanze de ren. Dang youren xiang tamen songdu pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de qishi shi, tamen dou baidao koutou he kuqi. Koutou chu
zai tamen zhihou, yige duoluo de houdai jichengle tamen, tamen feiqi bai gong, tantu xiangle [ru xihuan yinjiu, yinluan deng]. Yinci, tamen jiang bei touru huo yu shouxing.
Wei huizui, xinyang bing xingshan zhe liwai [zhu], zhexie ren jiang jinru leyuan, tamen bu shou renhe kuidai.
[Tamen jiang jinru] pu ci zhi zhu [an la] xunuo gei ta de pu renmen de [xianzai hai] kan bujian de yongjiu de leyuan. Ta de nuoyan que shi yao luxing de.
Tamen zai leyuan zhong jiang ting bu dao wang tan, zhi tingjian zhuyuan ping'an; tamen zai leyuan zhong jiang zhaoxi huode [an la ciyu] tamen de jiyang.
Zhe jiushi wo shi wo qianjing de pu renmen jicheng de leyuan.

[Tianshimen jiang shuo]:“Women zhi feng ni [mu sheng] de zhu de mingling jianglin. Fan zai women zhiqian de he zai women zhihou de yiqie, yiji zai qianhou zhi jian de yiqie, dou shi ta [an la] de. Ni de zhu shi jue bu hui wangji de.
[An la shi] tiandi wanwu de zhu, suo yi, ni dang chongbai ta, dang zai chongbai zhong jianren. Ni zhidao you shei neng yu ta xiangtibinglun ma?[Dangran meiyou].”
Ren [bu xinyang zhe] shuo:“Nandao wo si hou hai hui bei fuhuo ma?”
Nandao ren wangjile ma? Wo yiqian chuangzao ta shi, ta ye bu cunzai.
Yi ni de zhu fashi! Wo bi jiang ba tamen he emomen dou jihe qilai, ranhou, wo bi jiang shi tamen gui zai huo yu de zhouwei.
Ranhou, wo bi jiang cong mei pai zhong tichu naxie zui beini pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de ren lai.
Ranhou, wo zui zhidao tamen shei shi zui gai shou huo yu zhi xing de.
Nimen suoyouren dou jiang jinru huo yu [zhu], zhe shi ni de zhu bixu wancheng de yi xiang panjue.
Ranhou, wo jiang zhengjiu jingwei zhe [dui an la jinzhi jinze zhe], jiang rang bu yi zhe gui zai huo yu li.

Dang you ren xiang tamen songdu wo de mingbai de qishi shi, bu xinyang zhe [gu lai shen ren zhongguo shechi shenghuo de duoshenjiao tu] dui xinshi [mu sheng de zhuisui zhe zhongguo jianku shenghuo zhe] shuo:“Liang pai [xinshi yu bu xinyang zhe] zhong na yipai di diwei zuigao, xieshang changmian zui hongda ne?”
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, nandao naxie ren zai caifu he waiguan fangmian bubi tamen geng youyue ma?

Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Fan zai mi wu zhong zhe, pu ci zhi zhu [an la] jiang [zhanshi] yan kuan tamen de shouming, zhidao tamen kanjian tamen suo bei xunuo de: Bushi xingfa jiushi fuhuo de shijian, na shi tamen jiang zhidao shei di diwei zui elie, shei de liliang zui ruanruo [zhe shi dui di 73 jie jing wen de dafu].”
An la jiang zengjia dui zunxing zhengdao zhe de yindao. Zai ni de zhu kan lai, chijiu de shangong [zhu] cai shi hui ci zui hao de, guisu zui hao de.
Ni kan jian liao bu xinyang wo de jixiang [mu sheng he “gulanjing”] de ren de qingkuang ma? Ta shuo:“[Jiaru wo bei fuhuo], wo bi jiang bei ciyu caifu he ernu.”
Shi ta zhidao wei jian zhi wu ne? Haishi ta huodele pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de yunxu [zhu]?
Bu! Wo jiang jilu tasuo wangyan de, wo jiang zengjia ta [zai huo yu li] de xingfa.
[Ta si hou], wo jiang jicheng tasuo shuo de [ru wo zai jinshi ciyu ta de caifu he ernu], ta jiang duzi lai jian wo.
Tamen she an la er xuan bai xuduo shenling, yibian naxie shenling ci gei tamen rongyu he liliang [bing baohu tamen mian zao an la de xingfa deng].
Bu![Fuhuo ri] naxie shenling jiang fouren tamen dui tamen de chongbai, bing jiang chengwei tamen de choudi.
Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? Wo chang pai emomen qu youhuo buxinyang zhe bing shandong tamen fanzui.
Suoyi, ni buyao dui [chengfa] tamen jizao, wo zhi jisuan tamen [zai jinshi] de shou shu [bing yanhuan tamen dao yige dingqi, yibian tamen zengjia zui'e].
Zai na ri, wo jiang ba jingwei zhe jihe dao pu ci zhi zhu nali jieshou rongyao;
wo jiang [xiang gan gan ke de niu qun qu yinshui yiyang] ba fanzui zhe gan ru huo yu yin feishui jieke,
ci shi renhe ren dou meiyou qiuqing de quanli, wei huode pu ci zhi zhu yunxu zhe liwai.
Tamen shuo:“Pu ci zhi zhu you ernule [zhu][ru wangyan er sa shi an la de erzi, tianshimen shi an la de nu'er deng].”
Nimen dique niezaole yi jian hairentingwen de e shi!
Zhu tian jihu yinci er polie, dadi jihu yinci er benglie, qun shan jihu yinci er bengta.
Zhe shi yinwei tamen wangyan pu ci zhi zhu you ernu.
Pu ci zhi zhu buyi you ernu.
Tiandi jian de yiqie, jianglai meiyou yige bu xiang nupu yiyang lai dao pu ci zhi zhu nali.
Ta que zhi tamen de shumu bing jingmi tongjiguo.
Fuhuo ri, tamen jiang duzi lai jian ta.
Fan xinyang bing xingshan zhe, pu ci zhi zhu bi shi tamen hu jing hu ai [zhu].
Wo yi ni [mu sheng] de yuyan shi zhe bu “gulanjing” chengwei rongyi lijie de, yibian ni jie ci xiang jingwei zhe baoxi, tongshi jinggao qiangbian de minzhong.
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai,[xianzai] ni neng faxian tamen zhong hai youren [cunzai], huo neng tingjian tamen fachu de wei sheng ma?
Ta ha [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Wo jiang shi ni [mu sheng]“gulanjing”, bushi weile shi ni fannao,
er shi dui jingwei zhe de jiaohui.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi cong chuangzao dadi he ge gao tian de zhu jiang shi de.
Pu ci zhi zhu [an la] sheng dao baozuo shang.
Fan zai tiandi jian de yiqie, yiji dixia de yiqie dou shi ta de.
Jiaru ni [mu sheng] gao sheng qiqiu, ta dique shen zhi mimi de he geng yincang de.
An la, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Yiqie zuimei de mingcheng dou shi ta de [zhu].
Ni tingguo mu sa de gushi ma?

Dangshi, ta [mu sa] kanjian yige huoguang. Ta dui ta de jiaren shuo:“Nimen deng yixia, wo que yi kanjian yige huoguang, yexu wo neng cong nali wei nimen qu yige [ranshaozhe de] huoba lai, yexu wo zai huoguang chu neng zhaodao yindao.”
Dang ta daoda huoguang chu shi, you ge shengyin han dao:“Mu sa a!
Wo que shi ni de zhu, ni tuo xia ni de xiezi ba! Yinwei ni que shi zai “tu wa” sheng guzhong.
Wo que yi xuanze ni, yinci, ni dang qingting [wo dui ni de] qishi:
Wo que shi an la, chu wo wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu, suoyi, ni dang chongbai wo, dang wei zan nian wo er jin shou bai gong.
Fuhuo de shijian kending shi yao lailin de, dan wo yao baomi ta, yibian mei ren dou yi ziji suo zuo de nuli er huode baochou [zhu].
Jue buyao rang bu xin fuhuo de shijian er shuncong siyu zhe fang'ai ni [xin fuhuo de shijian], yizhi ni huimie zishen.
Mu sa a! Ni youshou zhong na de shi shenme?”
Ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo de shouzhang, wo zhuzhe ta, wo yong ta daxia shuye lai gei wo de yang qun chi, ta dui wo hai you qita yongtu.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni reng xia ta!”
Yushi ta jiu reng xia na shouzhang, na shouzhang turan bian chengle yitiao hui dong de she.
Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni zhuo zhu ta, ni buyao haipa, wo jiang shi ta huifu yuanzhuang.
Ni ba [you] shou jia zai [zuo] ye xia, ni chouchu shi jiang bian cheng jiebai yaoyan de, bu hui you renhe shanghai, zhe shi ling yi zhong jixiang.
Yibian wo zhaoshi ni wo de [yixie] da jixiang.
Ni dao falao nali qu ba! Ta que shi baonue guofen de.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo de xinxiong kaikuo [qiu ni ci wo zixin, zhizu he wuwei];
qiu ni shi wo de gongzuo shunli;
qiu ni jiechu wo de she jie,
Yibian tamen lijie wo dehua;
qiu ni cong wo de jiaren zhong wei wo renming yi wei zhushou,
[ji renming] wo di gege ha lun;
qiu ni yong ta lai zengqiang wo de liliang;
qiu ni rang ta xiezhu wo de gongzuo,
yibian women chang zansong ni,
yibian women chang zan nian ni [zhu].
Ni dui women que shi quan shi de.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni de qiqiu yingxule.
Wo zai ling yici que yi shi en gei ni.
Dangshi, wo ceng qishi ni muqin ying you de qishi:

“Ni ba ta [haizi] fang zai mu xiang li, ranhou ba mu xiang fang jin [niluohe] he li, heshui [feng'an la zhi ming] hui ba ta piao dao an bian,[zai nali], wo de yige diren——yeshi ta de yige diren hui ba ta shi qu de.” Wo yi ci ni wo de ci'ai, yibian ni zai wo de jianshi xia bei fuyang zhang da.

Dangshi, ni de jiejie zou guoqu shuo:“Yao wo gei nimen jieshao yi wei buyang ta de ren ma?” Yinci, wo you shi ni chong fan ni muqin de huaibao, yibian ta huode anwei, bu zai youchou. Houlai ni shaguo yige ren, dan wo zhengjiu ni tuolile da nan, bing yi yici da monan lai kaoyan ni. Ni ceng zai ma de ya ren nali zhule xuduo nian. Ranhou, mu sa a! Ni yi qian ding er lai [zheli].
Wo wei wo ziji er xuanze ni [zhu].
Ni he ni di gege [ha lun] daizhe wo de jixiang qu ba! Dan ni lia buyao shuhu zan nian wo.
Ni lia dao falao nali qu ba! Ta que shi baonue guofen de.
Ni lia dang dui ta shuo wenhe dehua, yexu ta hui jieshou quangao huo jingwei [an la].”
Ta lia shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women dique pa ta hui [mashang] shanghai women huo gengjia baonue guofen.”
Ta shuo:“Ni lia buyao haipa, wo dique yu ni lia tong zai. Wo shi quan wen de, quan shi de.

Yinci, ni lia dao ta [falao] nali qu bing [dui ta] shuo:“Wo lia que shi ni de zhu [an la] paiqian de shizhe, qing ni rang yiselie de houyi tong women yiqi likai ba! Qing ni buyao nuedai tamen, women que yi gei ni dai laile ni de zhu de jixiang. Qiu zhu ci zunxing zhengdao zhe ping'an!
Women que yi feng dao qishi: Fan fouren [an la ji qi shizhemen] bing beili zhe bi shou xingfa.”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni lia de zhu shi shei?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Women de zhu jiushi fuyu wanwu benxing bing yindao de zhu.”
Ta [falao] shuo:“[Yaoshi zheyang], yiqian ge shidai de qingkuang ruhe ne?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Wei wo de zhu zhidao zhege zhishi, shi jilu zai yi bu tian jing zhong de. Wo de zhu meiyou bu zhidao de, ye bu hui wangji.”
Shi ta wei nimen er ba dadi zao ru chuangpu [yiyang ke yanshen], bing wei nimen zai qizhong kaipi xuduo daolu. Ta cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, jie ci er shengchan chu ge zhong liangxing zhiwu.
Nimen chi ba! Nimen fangmu nimen de shengchu ba! Dui you lizhi de renmen, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Wo cong dadi chuangzaole nimen, wo jiang shi nimen fu fan dadi, zuihou, wo jiang zaici cong dadi quchu nimen [fuhuo].
Wo que yi xiang ta [falao] xianshile wo de suoyou jixiang, dan ta haishi bu xinyang bing jujuele.
Ta [falao] shuo:“Mu sa a! Nandao ni lai women zheli, shi weile yong ni de moshu ba women gan chu women de guotu ma?

[Yaoshi zheyang], women ye yao xiang ni xianshi tongyang de moshu, you ni zai women he ni zhi jian ding yige yue qi, zai yige kaikuo di difang, women zai nali gongping jiaoliang, women he ni dou bu shuangyue.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Nimen [he wo] de yue qi ding zai jieri neitian, taiyang sheng qi hou [ji shangwu], jiao renmen jihe qilai.”
Yushi falao [zhu] jiu likaile. Ta soujile ta de jimou, ranhou you huilaile.
Mu sa dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zhen gaisi! Nimen buyao jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan, yimian ta [an la] yong xingfa huimie nimen. Niezao huangyan zhe bi jiang shibai.”
Tamen wei tamen [bixu zuo] de shiqing huxiang zhenglun, dan tamen baochi mimi xieshang.
Tamen shuo:“Zhe liang ren kending shi moshu shi, ta lia xiang yong ta lia de moshu ba nimen gan chu nimen de guotu, bing feichu nimen de zungui yu xianda.
Suoyi, nimen dang ba nimen de jimou dou souji qilai, ranhou zhengdui er lai. Jintian shei zhan youshi, shei que yi chenggong.”
Tamen shuo:“Mu sa a! Shi ni xian reng [biaoyan]? Haishi women xian reng?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Haishi nimen xian reng ba!” Youyu tamen de moshu [zhu], tamen de shengzi he shouzhang zai ta [mu sa] kan lai haoxiang zai pao dong.
Mu sa de xinzhong gandao kongju.
Wo [an la] shuo:“Ni buyao haipa! Ni kending shi zhan youshi de.

Ni reng chu ni youshou zhong suo na de, ta bi jiang tunmo tamen suo shuanong de [moshu]. Tamen suo shuanong de zhishi moshu shi de xie fa eryi. Moshu shi wulun biaoyan shenme dou shi bu hui chenggong de.”
Yushi moshu shimen zhihao baidao xiaqu. Tamen shuo:“Women xinyang ha lun he mu sa de zhule.”

Ta [falao] shuo:“Zai wo zhunxu nimen zhiqian, nimen gan xiangxin ta [mu sa] ma? Ta yiding shi nimen de shouling, yiding shi ta jiaoshou nimen moshu de. Wo yiding yao jiaocuo kan qu nimen de shoujiao, wo yiding yao ba nimen ding si zai ye zao shugan shang, na shi nimen jiu zhidao women zhong shei de xingfa zui yanli, zui chijiu.”

Tamen shuo:“Women jue bu yuan xuanze ni er fangqi yi jianglin women de mingzheng he chuangzao women de zhu [an la]. Ni xiang zenme panjue jiu zenme panjue ba! Ni zhi neng zai jinshi shenghuo zhong weisuoyuwei.
Women yi xinyang women de zhu, yibian ta kuanshu women de zui'e he ni qiangpo women biaoyan de moshu. An la shi zui hao de [baochou zhe], zui chijiu de [chengfa zhe].”
Shei zuowei zuifan lai jian ta de zhu, shei bi ru huo yu, zai huo yu li busi bu huo.
Shei zuowei xinshi lai jian ta de zhu, qie shi xingshan zhe, name, zhexie ren bi jiang huode zuigao de pinji,
[tamen jiang juzhu zai] yongjiu de leyuan, zhu he cong limian liuguo, yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi dui chunjie zhe de baochou.

Wo que yi qishi mu sa:“Ni shuailing wo de pu renmen zai yejian chuzou ba! Ni dang zai haishang wei tamen kaipi yitiao han dao; ni buyao pa bei [falao ji qi jundui] zhui shang, ye buyao weiju [bei haishui yanmo].”
Falao shuailing ta de jundui zhuigan tamen, dan haishui ba tamen quanbu yanmole.
Falao ba ta de renmin yinru qitu, er wei ba tamen yin shang zhengdao.
Yiselie de houyi a! Wo que yi zhengjiu nimen tuolile nimen de diren, bing zai shan de youbian yuefa nimen, qie jiang gei nimen “man na [zhu][mi yiban tian de jiao zhi wu]” he anchun.
[Bing shuo]:“Nimen chi wo suo ci gei nimen de jiamei shiwu [zhu] ba! Dan nimen buyao guofen, yimian nimen zaoshou wo de qian nu. Shei zaoshou wo de qian nu, shei bi miewang.
Fan huizui, xinyang bing xingshan, ranhou [zhi si] zunxing zhengdao zhe, wo dui ta que shi zui kuanshu de [zhu].
Mu sa a! Ni weihe congmang likai ni de zuren a?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Tamen jin zhui wo de zongji er lai, wo de zhu a! Wo congmang lai jian ni, yi tao ni de xiyue.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Zai ni likai hou, wo que yi kaoyanguo ni de zuren, sa mi li yi shi tamen mi wu.”

Yinci, mu sa huaizhe fennu yu youchou hui dao ta de zuren nali. Ta shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Nandao nimen de zhu meiyou yingxu nimen yige gongping de nuoyan ma? Shi nimen juede [shixian] nuoyan de shijian tai zhangle ne, haishi nimen xiwang zaoshou cong nimen de zhu jiangxia de qian nu, yin'er nimen weibei dui wo de nuoyan ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Women bingfei ziyuan weibei dui ni de nuoyan, er shi women bei po xiedai [falao de] renmin de zhuangshi wu, suoyi, women jiu ba ta reng [jin huo li]le, zhe shi sa mi li jianyi reng de.”

Ta [sa mi li cong huo li quchu zhuangshi wu] wei tamen zhuzaole yige neng fachu niu jiao sheng de niudu ban de quti. Tamen shuo:“Zhe [niudu] shi nimen de zhu, yeshi mu sa de zhu, dan ta [mu sa] wangle [ta de zhu shi shei].”
Nandao tamen bu mingbai na niudu ji buneng huida tamen, ye buneng wei tamen zhangguan huo fu ma?
Ha lun shiqian que yi dui tamen shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Nimen zhishi bei zhe niudu suo mihuo. Nimen de zhu que shi pu ci zhi zhu [an la], suoyi, nimen dang zhuisui wo, dang fucong wo de mingling.”
Dan tamen shuo:“Women jiang jixu chongbai niudu, zhidao mu sa fanhui women zheli.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Ha lun a! Dang ni kanjian tamen wu ru qitu shi, shi shenme fang'ai ni bu zhuisui wo ne? Nandao ni ye yao weikang wo de mingling ma?”
Ta [ha lun] shuo:“Wo muqin de erzi a! Ni buyao zhua zhu wo de huzi, ye buyao zhua zhu wo de toufa. Wo dique pa ni hui shuo:“Ni yi zai yiselie de houyi zhong zhizao fenlie, er bu chong shi wo dehua.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Sa mi li a! Ni zenme la?”

Ta [sa mi li] shuo:“Wo kanjianle tamen suo meiyou kanjian de, wo cong shizhe [ji bu li lei tianshi de ma] de ti ji zhong zhuale yi ba tu, ranhou ba ta sa zai niudu shang. Wo de siyu ruci songyong wo [zheyang zuo].”

Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Ni zou ba! Ni zai jinsheng bi jiang chang shuo:“Buyao peng wo.” Ni que you yige [zao chengfa de] yue qi, ni jue buneng taobi ta. Ni kan yi kan ni qiancheng chongbai de zhuzai ba! Women yiding yao fenhua ta, ranhou ba ta sa zai dahai li.
Nimen ying chongbai de zhu zhishi an la, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu [zhu]. Ta shi zhouzhi wanwu de.”
Wo ruci xiang ni [mu sheng] xushu guoqu suo fasheng de yixie shi, wo que yi ci ni wo zheli de yi xiang jiaohui [“gulanjing”].
Shei bi kai [buxin] ta [“gulanjing”], fuhuo ri [zhu], shei bi fudan zui'e de zhongdan,
yong ju huo yu de xingfa zhong. Fuhuo ri, tamen suo fudan de zhen elie!
Dang haojiao [di er ci] chui xiang zhi ri, zai na ri, wo jiang ba lan yanhei lian de zuifan dou jihe qilai.
Tamen jiang di sheng xiang gao shuo:“Nimen zhi buguo tingliule shi tian.”
Wo zui zhidao tamen yao shuo shenme. Na shi, tamen zhong zui you zhishi he zhihui de ren jiang shuo:“Nimen zhi buguo tingliule yitian.”
Tamen wen ni qun shan de jieju, ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo de zhujiang chedi fensui qun shan,
bing shi tamen bian cheng yige kongkuang de pingyuan,
ni zai qizhong jiang kan bujian renhe quzhe yu gaodi.”

Zai na ri, renmen jiang zhuisui [an la de] zhaohuan zhe [de shengyin],[na shengyin] hao bu yuhui, suoyou shengyin dou yao wei pu ci zhi zhu [an la] gong jing xialai, chu jiaobu sheng wai, ni zai ye ting bu dao qita shengyin.
Zai na ri, chu pu ci zhi zhu xuke bing xiyue ting qi hua zhe wai, suoyou qiuqing dou shi tulao de.
Ta [an la] zhidao tamen [suoyou bei zaowu] zai jinshi [suo fasheng] de shiqing, ye zhidao tamen zai houshi [jiang fasheng] de shiqing, er tamen que bu zhidao.
[Zai na ri], suoyou mianmu dou jiang xiang yongsheng zili de zhu biaoshi qiangong.[Zai na ri], fan beifu zui'e zhe que yi shibai [zhu];
fan xinyang bing xingshan zhe, ze bupa kuidai he kekou [baochou].
Wo ruci ba ta jiang shi cheng alabo wen de “gulanjing”, bing zai qizhong chanming ge zhong jinggao, yibian tamen jingwei [an la], huo shi tamen jieshou jiaohui.

An la shi zhigaowushang zhe, shi zhuzai he zhenli. Zai “gulanjing” de qishi dui ni [mu sheng] jiang wan qian, ni buyao congmang songdu ta. Ni dang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zengjia wo de zhishi [zhu].”
Yiqian, wo que yi zhufu a dan, dan ta wangjile, wo faxian ta meiyou yili.
Dangshi, wo dui tianshimen shuo:“Nimen dang fucong a dan.” Yushi tamen dou fucongle, wei yi bu lisi liwai, ta jujue fucong.
Wo shuo:“A dan a! Zhe [yi bu lisi] que shi ni de diren, yeshi ni de qizi de diren, suoyi, jue buyao rang ta ba ni lia you chu leyuan, yimian ni lia jianxin tongku [zhu].
Ni zai leyuan li bu hui ji'e, bu hui luolu,
bu hui gan ke, bu hui bei ri shai.”
Dan emo youhuo ta shuo:“A dan a! Yao wo gei ni zhiyin yongsheng shu he buxiu guo ma?”
Yushi ta lia [tou] chile jinguo, ta lia de xiu ti bian hu xiang xianlule, ta lia zhihao yong leyuan li de yezi zheyan ziji de xiu ti. A dan weibeile ta de zhu [de mingling], yin'er wu ru qitu.
Ranhou, ta de zhu xuanze ta, kuanshu ta bing yindao ta.

Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni lia dou cong zheli [leyuan] xiaqu ba! Nimen jiang bici dishi. Jiaru wo de zhengdao jianglin nimen, name, shei zunxing wo de zhengdao, shei jiang bu hui mi wu, ye bu hui jianxin tongku;
shei taobi wo de jiaohui [“gulanjing”], shei biguo beican de shenghuo. Fuhuo ri, wo jiang shi ta zai mangmu zhong bei jihe.”
Ta jiang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo yuan shi neng kanjian de, ni weisheme yao shi wo mangmu di bei jihe ne?”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Shi zheyang de: Wo de qishi jianglin ni shi, ni hushi ta, suoyi, ni jintian ye jiang bei hushi [zai huo yu li, yuanli an la de enhui].”
Fan chaoyue fadu [gan dazui, weikang an la, buxin mu sheng he “gulanjing” deng] qie bu xinyang ta de zhu de jixiang zhe, wo jiu ruci huan bao ta. Houshi de xingfa cai shi zui yanli de, zui chijiu de.

Nandao tamen meiyou huode yindao [huo nandao tamen bu zhidao] ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen chang cong zhexie ren de guju shang zouguo. Dui neng lijie de renmen, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Yao bushi ni de zhu youyanzaixian he qixian yi ding, name, tamen [zai jinshi] biding zaoshou an la de chengfale.

Duiyu tamen suo wangyan de, ni [mu sheng] dang rennai. Ni dang zai ri chu qian [chen li] he riluo qian [bu li] zanmei songyang ni de zhu, dang zai yejian de yibufen shijian [hun li he xiao li] he baizhou zhi duan [shang li] zansong ta [zhu], yibian ni [wei an la jiang ci ni de baochou er] xinxi.

Ni buyao dui wo ciyu tamen zhong ge zhong ren [ge lei bu xinyang zhe] xiangshou de jinshi shenghuo de fuhua yanhong, na shi wo yong lai kaoyan tamen de. Ni de zhu de jiyang cai shi zui hao de, zui chijiu de.

Ni dang zhufu ni de jiaren jin shou bai gong, ni dui bai gong dang chizhiyiheng. Wo bu hui xiang ni suoyao renhe gongji [ru qiancai deng], wo hui ci gei ni. Shan guo [leyuan] shi shuyu qianjing zhe de.

Tamen shuo:“Weisheme ta [mu sheng] bu cong ta de zhu nali dai gei women yi zhong jixiang ne?” Nandao yiqian jingdian zhong jizai de mingzheng [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei” zhong guanyu mu sheng jiang jiang shi de xiaoxi] meiyou jianglin tamen ma?

Jiaru ci [mu sheng he “gulanjing”] qian wo jiu yong xingfa huimie tamen, tamen bi shuo:“Women de zhu a! Yaoshi ni paiqian yi wei shizhe lai yindao women, rang women zai zaoshou beijian he chiru qian jiu zunxing ni de qishi duo hao a!”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Ge zhong ren [ru xinshi yu bu xinyang zhe] dou zai dengdai. Nimen dengdai ba! Nimen bujiu jiang zhidao shei shi zou zhengdao de, shei shi zunxing zhengdao de.”
Dui renlei de qingsuan linjinle, dan tamen [xianzai] haishi shuhu dayi, bu yu zhongshi.
Mei dang [“gulanjing” zhong] you xin de qishi [gaojie] cong tamen de zhu [an la] jianglin tamen, tamen zong shi chaoxiaozhe tingqu.
Bu yi zhe de xinzhong chongman xienian, tamen mimi xieshang shuo:“Zhe zhishi tong nimen yiyang de fanren, nimen mingzhi shi moshu hai yao jieshou [shuncong] ma?”
Ta [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu zhidao tiandi jian suo shuo de yiqie. Ta shi quan wen de, quanzhi de [zhu].”

Dan tamen shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing” zhong yi jiang shi mu sheng de jing wen] shi yige za meng. Bu, shi ta weizao de yanci! Bu, ta shi yi wei shiren! Rang ta xiang yiqian bei paiqian de shizhemen yiyang xianshi women yi zhong jixiang ba!”
[Jinguan wo ceng jiang shi tamen jixiang], dan zai tamen zhiqian wo suo huimie de chengshi zhong, meiyou yige quexin jixiang de.[Xianzai] tamen hui quexin ma?
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, wo ceng paiqian xuduo ren [zuo shizhe] bing qishi tamen. Jiaru nimen bu zhidao, nimen keyi qingjiao shou gaojie zhe [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei” de xuezhe].
Wo meiyou ba tamen [shizhe] zaocheng bu chi shi wu de shenti, tamen ye bushi yongsheng de.
Ranhou, wo shixianle dui tamen de nuoyan, wo zhengjiule tamen he wo suo yiyu zhe, huimiele chaoyue fadu zhe.
[Renmen a!] Wo que yi jiang shi nimen yi bu jingdian [“gulanjing”], qizhong you dui nimen de gaojie, nandao nimen hai buming li ma?
Wo ceng huimiele xuduo xing bu yi de chengshi [de minzhong], bing zai cihou chuangzaole bie de minzhong.
Mei dang tamen gandao wo de xingfa [jijiang jianglin] shi, tamen turan shitu taozou.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen buyao taozou, nimen huiqu xiangshou nimen de shechi shenghuo he haozhai ba! Yibian nimen shoushen wen.”
Tamen jiaohan shuo:“Women zhen gaisi! Women que shi bu yi zhe.”
Tamen de zhe zhong aiming bu hui zhongduan, zhidao wo shi tamen bian cheng haoxiang gang geguo de [zhuangjia] yiyang er xiaoshi.
Wo chuangzao tiandi wanwu, bingfei wei le yule.
Jiaru wo xiang xiaoqian [ru yongyou qi er deng], wo yiding hui zai wo zheli huode xiaoqian, jiaru wo yu zuo.
Bu, wo yi zhenli [“gulanjing”] huiji miuwu [bu xinyang deng], miuwu zao daole huimie, turan xiaoshile. Nimen [dui wo] niezao huangyan [ru wangyan an la you qi er] jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi ta de [an la]; fan zai ta nali de [tianshi], dou chongbai ta, tamen ji bu aoman, ye bu pijuan.
Tamen [tianshi] zhouye zansong ta, hao bu songxie.
Nandao tamen zai da dishang shezhi [chongbai] de zhuzai neng shi sizhe fuhuo ma?
Chu an la wai, jiaru tiandi jian hai you qita ying shou chongbai de zhuzai, name, tiandi biding huimiele. Zanmei an la——baozuo zhi zhu chaojue [zhu]! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
Ta [an la] suo zuo de shi bu shou zewen de, er tamen [suo zuo de] que shi yao shoushen wen de.

Nandao tamen yao she ta er xuan bai qita zhuzai ma? Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen na chu nimen de zhengju lai ba! Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi dui wo de tongdao de tixing [gaojie], yeshi dui wo zhiqian de renmen de tixing [gaojie].” Dan tamen da duoshu ren haishi buming zhenli, yin'er beiqi ta.
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, fanshi wo suo paiqian de shizhe, wo du qishi ta:“Chu wo wai, zai meiyouying shou chongbai de zhu, suoyi, nimen zhi neng chongbai wo.”
Tamen shuo:“Pu ci zhi zhu [an la] you ernule.” Zanmei ta chaojue! Bu,[tamen suo wangyan de an la de ernu, ru er sa yu tianshi deng, tamen] zhishi yixie ying shou zunjing de puren.
Tamen bu gan zai ta [an la] qishi qian xian kaikou, tamen zhi feng ta de mingling xingshi.
Ta zhidao tamen zai jinshi [suo fasheng] de shiqing, ye zhidao tamen zai houshi [jiang fasheng] de shiqing, tamen zhi ti ta [an la] suo xiyue zhe qiuqing. Tamen yin kongju er jingwei ta.
Tamen zhong shei gan shuo:“Wo shi ta [an la] zhi wai de ling yi wei zhuzai.” Wo bi yi huo yu huan bao ta. Wo ruci huan bao bu yi zhe.
Nandao bu xinyang zhe bu zhidao ma? Tiandi yuan shi lianjie de zhengti, ranhou, wo shi qi fen kai. Wo yongshui chuangzao yiqie shengming. Nandao tamen bu xiangxin ma?
Wo zai dadishang wengu de anzhi qun shan, yimian tamen sui da di er yaodang. Wo zai da dishang kaipi kuankuo de daolu, yibian tamen huode yindao.
Wo ba tian zaocheng yige anquan de huagai, dan tamen rengran hushi tian de jixiang [ru ri yue fengyun deng].
Shi ta chuangzaole zhouye he ri yue, ge zai ziji de guidao shang yunxing.
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, wo cong wei ciyu renhe ren yongsheng. Jiaru ni sile, nandao tamen hai neng yongsheng ma?
Mei ren dou jiang changshi siwang [zhu][de ziwei]. Wo jiang yi huo fu kaoyan nimen, nimen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai.

Dang bu xinyang zhe kanjian ni [mu sheng] shi, tamen ba ni dang xiaobing.[Tamen shuo]:“Shi ci ren [mu sheng] feibang nimen de zhuzai ma?” Qishi, tamen jiushi jujue zan nian pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de ren.
Rensheng lai jiushi jizao de. Wo jiang zhaoshi nimen wo de jixiang, suoyi, nimen buyao cuicu wo.
Tamen shuo:“Zhege xunuo he shi shixian ne? Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe.”
Jiaru bu xinyang zhe zhidao, na shi tamen jue buneng fangyu ziji de lian bei mian shou huoxing, ye de bu dao renhe yuanzhu,[name, tamen xianzai jiu bu hui fouren an lale].
Bu, fuhuo de shijian jiang turan jianglin [zhu] tamen, shi tamen jinghuang shicuo. Tamen wuneng dikang ta, ye bu bei huanxing.
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, you xuduo shizhe que yi bei chaoxiao, dan chaoxiao zhe bei ziji suo chaoxiao de [xingfa] baowei zhule.
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shei neng zhouye baohu nimen mian shou pu ci zhi zhu de xingfa ne?” Qishi, tamen jiushi jujue zan nian tamen de zhu de ren.
Chu wo wai, nandao tamen hai you qita zhuzai neng baohu tamen [mian shou wo de xingfa] ma? Naxie zhuzai ji buneng zijiu, ye buneng ziwei [mian shou wo de xingfa].

Bu, wo shi zhexie ren he tamen de zuxian [zai jinshi zhanshi] xiangle, zhidao tamen de shouming yanchang [dao yige dingqi]. Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian wo zhujian suoxiao [bu xinyang zhe] lingyu nei de jiangtu [er ba ta ciyu xinshi] ma? Nandao tamen shi shengli zhe ma?
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo zhi yi [an la jiang shi wo de] qishi jinggao nimen.” Qishi, dang longzi bei jinggao [zunxing “gulanjing”] shi, tamen shi ting bujian zhaohuan de.
Jiaru tamen zaoshoule ni de zhu de yidian er xingfa, tamen bi shuo:“Women zhen gaisi! Women que shi bu yi zhe.”
