Tamen de qian ren ye tongyang fourenguo, zhexie ren hai meiyou huode wo ciyu tamen [qian ren] de shi fen zhi yi, dan tamen reng fouren wo de shizhemen. Wo de chengfa duo kepa!

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo zhi quangao nimen yi jian shi: Nimen dangcheng shuang huo dandu di wei an la zhi dao zhanli, ranhou nimen dang shensi [mu sheng de lishi]: Nimen de tongban [mu sheng] jue bushi fengzi. Zai yanli de xingfa lailin qian, ta dui nimen zhishi yi wei jinggao zhe [zhu].”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo bu hui [wei xuanjiao er] xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou, ta quan gui nimen, wo de baochou zhi laizi an la. Ta shi jianzheng wanshi wanwu de.”
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu que yi jiang shi zhenli [“gulanjing”], ta shi quanzhi yiqie wei jian zhi wu de zhu.”
Ni shuo:“Zhenli [“gulanjing”] yi lailin, xuwei jiang xiaoshi, yong bu zailai.”
Ni shuo:“Jiaru wo mi wu, wo zi shou mi wu zhi hai; jiaru wo zunxing zhengdao, na shi youyu wo de zhu qishi wo de jingdian. Ta que shi quan wen de, linjin de [zhu].”
Yaoshi ni neng kanjian tamen jinghuang shicuo er wu chu ke tao de qingkuang duo hao a! Tamen jiang zai jin chu bei zhuahuo.
[Houshi] tamen jiang shuo:“Women [xianzai] xinyangle.” Tamen zen neng cong yaoyuan di difang [chong fan chenshi] huode xinyang ne?

Yiqian [zai chenshi shi], tamen que yi bu xinyang [an la, yisilan jiao, mu sheng he “gulanjing” deng], tamen cong yaoyuan di difang wang cai wei jian zhi wu [houshi, leyuan, huo yu, fuhuo he an la de xunuo deng].
Tamen he tamen suo xi'ai de [xinyang] zhi jian you ge pingzhang ge kai, youru tamen de tonglei guoqu bei ge kai yiyang. Tamen que shi zai yanzhong de huaiyi zhong.

Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——tiandi de chuangzao zhe. Ta ba you liangyi, san yi he si yi de tianshi zuowei shizhe pai wang chenshi. Ta zai chuangzao zhong zengjia tasuo yiyu de. An la dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.
Wulun an la ciyu renlei he zhong enhui, jue meiyou neng zuzhi zhe; wulun ta kouliu he zhong enhui, cihou jue meiyou neng ciyu zhe. Ta shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.

Renmen a! Nimen dang laoji an la dui nimen de enhui, chu an la wai, hai you nage chuangzao zhe neng cong tiandi jian ci gei nimen jiyang ne? Chu ta wai, zai meiyouying shou chongbai de zhu. Nimen weihe hai yao beili zhenli ne?
Jiaru tamen fouren ni, name, zai ni zhiqian you xuduo shizhe que yi bei fouren [zhu]. Wanshi [zuizhong] dou jiang gui dao an la nali qu [panjue].
Renmen a! An la de yingxu que shi zhenshi de, suoyi, jue buyao rang jinshi shenghuo qipian nimen, jue buyao rang pian zei [emo] jie an la de mingyi qipian nimen.
Emo que shi nimen de diren, suoyi, nimen ying ba ta dang diren. Emo zhi jiaosuo ta de zhuisui zhe, rang tamen chengwei huo yu de fanren.
Bu xinyang zhe bi jiang shou yanli de xingfa; xinyang bing xingshan zhe bi jiang huode kuanshu he zhongda de baochou [leyuan].

Bei ziji de e xing suo mihuo, ziyiweishi xingshan zhe,[nandao tong zunxing zhengdao zhe shi yiyang de ma?] Xuzhi, an la yu shi shei mi wu, jiu shi shei mi wu; yu shi shei zunxing zhengdao, jiu shi shei zunxing zhengdao. Yinci, ni buyao yin dui tamen de beishang er shanghai zishen. Fanshi tamen suo zuo de, an la que shi quanzhi de.
Shi an la paiqian feng, rang feng ji qi yun, ranhou ba yun qugan dao yige kusi di difang, jie ci er shi kusi de dadi fusu. Renlei de fuhuo yeshi zheyang.

Shei [gan] yao rongyao,[xuzhi] rongyao dou shi an la de. Liangyan jiang shangsheng dao ta nali, shangong ke tigao liangyan di diwei [zhi shuo bu zuo de liangyan bu bei an la jieshou]. Gao yinmou guiji zhe bi jiang shou yanli de xingfa. Zhexie ren de yinmou guiji bu hui decheng.

An la chuangzao nimen [ru a dan shengren], xian yong nitu, ranhou yong yidi jingye [ru a dan shengren de houyi], ranhou shi nimen chengwei pei'ou. Renhe nuren de huaiyun he fenmian, meiyou ta bu zhidao de. Wulun zengjia chang ming zhe de shou shu, haishi jianshao duanming zhe de nianling [zhu], meiyou yi jian bu jilu zai tian jing [“shou baohu de xian pai”] zhong. Zhe dui an la que shi rongyi de.

Liang hai [de shuizhi] bu yiyang, zhege shi tian de, kekou de danshui, nage shi ku de xian shui. Nimen ke chi liang haizhong xinxian de rou [zhu][ru yu lei], nimen ke [cong liang haizhong] huoqu nimen suo chuandai de zhuangshi wu. Ni kanjian chuanbo zai haizhong polang hangxing [hangyun], yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen gan'en.

Ta shi heiye jinru baizhou, shi baizhou jinru heiye [zhu]; ta shi ri yue [wei nimen] fuwu, mei ge dou an guiding de chengxu yunxing. Zhe jiushi an la——nimen de zhu, zhuquan shi ta de, nimen she ta er qiqiu de [ouxiang] jue meiyou renhe zhuquan.

Jiaru nimen qiqiu tamen [naxie ouxiang], tamen ting bujian nimen de qiqiu. Jishi tamen tingjianle, tamen ye buneng huida nimen. Fuhuo ri, tamen jiang fouren nimen chongbaiguo tamen. Renhe ren dou buneng xiang che zhi zhe [an la] nayang gaosu ni [mu sheng].
Renmen a! Nimen que shi xuqiu an la de, er an la que shi wu suo qiu de [zhu], shou zansong de.
Jiaru ta yiyu, ta keyi huimie nimen er chongxin chuangzao.
Zhe dui an la bing bu nan.

Yige fu zui zhe bu fudan bieren de zui'e. Jiaru yige fuzhong zui zhe qing bieren ti ta fu zui, name, bieren jue buneng ti ta fudan sihao zuiguo, jishi shi jinqin. Ni [mu sheng] zhi neng jinggao anzhong jingwei tamen de zhu [an la] bing jin shou bai gong zhe. Shei jinghua zishen [yuanli zui'e], shei zi shou qi yi. Wei an la shi zuihou de guisu.
Xiazi [bu xinyang zhe] he kan de jian zhe [xinshi] shi bu xiangdeng de;
hei'an [bu xinyang yisilan jiao] he guangming [xinyang yisilan jiao] shi bu xiangdeng de;
yinliang he yanre shi bu xiangdeng de;
huo ren [xinshi] he siren [zhu][bu xinyang zhe] shi bu xiangdeng de. An la dique neng shi tasuo yiyu de ren tingjian, er ni [mu sheng] que buneng shi fenmu zhong de ren tingjian.
Ni zhishi yi wei jinggao zhe [ni de zeren zhishi xiang renlei mingbai di chuanda qishi].
Wo dique yi zhenli paiqian ni zuo baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe. Renhe yige minzu, dou you yi wei jinggao zhe zai qizhong shenghuoguo.
Jiaru tamen fouren ni, name, zai tamen zhiqian de shizhemen que yi bei fouren, jinguan tamen de shizhemen yi daizhe mingzheng, dianji he canlan de jingdian daoda tamen.
Ranhou, wo chengfa liao buxinyang zhe. Wo de xingfa duo kepa!
Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ma? An la cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, jie ci er shengchan chu wuyanliuse de shuiguo. Shanshang yeyou bai de, hong de, wuyanliuse de, wuhei de [tiaowen].
Zai renlei, yeshou he shengchu zhong, ye tongyang you butong de yanse. Zai an la de puren zhong, wei xuezhe zhenzheng jingwei ta. An la que shi quanneng de, zui kuanshu de.
Fan songdu an la de jingdian [“gulanjing”], jin shou bai gong, anzhong he gongkai shishe wo suo ciyu tamen de caiwu zhe [zhu], tamen xiwang ci xiang jingying yong bu pochan,
yibian ta [an la] shi tamen xiangshou tamen ying de de baochou, bing ci gei tamen geng duo de enhui. Ta que shi zui kuanshu de, zuishan bao de.
Wo zai jingdian [“gulanjing”] li suo qishi ni [mu sheng] de dou shi zhenli, ta neng zhengshi zai ci zhiqian jiang shi de [jingdian]. An la dui ta de puren que shi che zhi de, quan shi de.

Ranhou, wo shi wo suo xuanze de purenmen [mu sheng ji qi zhuisui zhe] jichengle zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”], tamen zhong you shi ziji shou sun de, yeyou zhe zhong de, hai youyi an la de mingling zhengxian xingshan de. Zhe [jicheng “gulanjing”] que shi juda de enhui.
Tamen jiang jinru yongjiu de leyuan. Tamen zai leyuan li dai de shi jin zhuo he zhenzhu, chuan de shi sichou.
Tamen jiang shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, shi ta wei women xiaochule youchou. Women de zhu que shi zui kuanshu de, zuishan bao de.
Shi ta shi women zhu zai changzhu zhi zhai zhong, zhe shi cong ta jiang shi de enhui. Women zai qizhong ji bu xinku, ye bu pijuan.”
Buxinyang zhe bi shou huo yu zhi xing. Ji bu pan tamen sixing, rang tamen siwang; ye bu jianqing tamen suo shou de huoxing. Wo ruci huan bao mei ge wang'enfuyi zhe [zhu].

Tamen zai huo yu li [gao sheng] qiujiu shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni fang women chuqu ba! Women yiding gai e xingshan.”[An la dafu shuo]:“Nandao wo meiyou yanchang nimen de shouming [zhu 1], rang yuan jieshou quangao zhe jieshou quangao ma [zhu 2]? Erqie jinggao zhe ye daoguo nimen zhong [jinggao nimen]. Nimen changshi [nimen zuo'e de] xingfa ba! Bu yi zhe jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.”
An la dique quanzhi tiandi jian de yiqie wei jian zhi wu. Ta dique quanzhi [renlei] xiongzhong de yiqie.

Shi ta [an la] shi nimen chengwei da dishang de jiren zhe. Shei bu xinyang, shei zi shou qi hai. Bu xinyang zhe de bu xin zhi neng zengjia tamen de zhu [an la] dui tamen de qian nu; bu xinyang zhe de bu xin zhi neng shi ziji gengjia sunshi.

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen she an la er qiqiu de zhuzai, nimen zhi gei wo kan ba! Tamen zai da dishang chuangzaole shenme? Tamen zeng shen yu chuangzao zhu tian de na yibufen [zhu]? Haishi wo ceng ciyu tamen yi bu jingdian, tamen yi jingdian zhong de mingzheng xingshi ne?” Bu, bu yi zhe zhi yi qipian huxiang xunuo.

An la dique weichi tiandi [de yunxing], yimian pianli guidao [er huimie]. Jiaru tiandi pianli guidao [er huimie], chu ta wai, jue wu ren neng weichi tiandi [de yunxing]. Ta que shi zui kuanrong de, zui kuanshu de.

Tamen yi an la fachu tamen zui zhuangyan de shiyan: Jiaru you yi wei jinggao zhe lailin tamen, name, tamen yiding hui bi [ciqian de] renhe minzu geng neng zunxing zhengdao. Dan dang jinggao zhe [mu sheng] lailin tamen shi, zhi shi tamen gengjia panni.

[Tamen panni zhi yin tamen] zai da dishang jiao'ao zi da, yinmou zuo'e. Yinmou zuo'e zhi hui huimie yinmou zhe zishen. Chule qian ren zaoshou de changdao wai, tamen hai dengdai shenme ne? Ni jue buneng faxian an la de changdao you renhe biangeng, ni jue buneng faxian an la de changdao you renhe bianhua.

Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing, guancha tamen qian ren de jieju ruhe ma? Qian ren de shili bi tamen de geng qiangda. Tiandi jian meiyou renhe dongxi neng taotuo an la de zhangkong. Ta que shi quanzhi de, wanneng de.

Jiaru an la yaoyin renmen suo fan de zui'e cheng fa renmen, name, ta bu hui zai da dishang liu xia yige huo wu, dan ta ba tamen yanhuan dao yige dingqi. Dang tamen de qixian lailin shi, an la dui ta de pu ren que shi quan shi de.
Ya xin [zhu][alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Yi zhe bu zhihui de “gulanjing” fashi,
ni [mu sheng] que shi shizhe zhi yi,
que shi zunxing zhengdao [yisilan jiao] de.
Zhe bu “gulanjing” shi quanneng de, te ci de zhu jiang shi de,
Yibian ni jinggao yige minzu, tamen de zuxian meiyou bei jinggaoguo, tamen shi shuhu de.
Tamen da duoshu ren dique ying shou xingfa de panjue, yinwei tamen bu xinyang.
Wo que yi ba jiasuo dai zai tamen de bozi shang, zhidao xia ke, suoyi tamen yangzhe tou.
Wo zai tamen de qianmian anzhile yige pingzhang, zai tamen de houmian ye anzhile yige pingzhang, zhe zhule tamen, suoyi tamen kan bujian.
Wulun ni jinggao tamen, haishi bu jinggao tamen, dui tamen dou shi yiyang de, tamen rengran bu xinyang.
Ni zhi neng jinggao zunxing jiaohui [“gulanjing”] qie anzhong jingwei pu ci zhi zhu [an la] zhe, ni dang yi kuanshu he youhou de baochou [leyuan] xiang ta baoxi.

Wo dique neng shi sizhe fuhuo, wo jiang jilu tamen suo zuo de shan e he tamen de shiji [zhu][ru mei ri dao qingzhensi zuo wu ci libai he canjia shengzhan de zuji deng]. Wo yi ba wanshi jilu zai yi bu mingbai de tian jing zhong.
Ni dang yi chengshi [jushuo gai cheng xi gu xuliya shoudu “an tiao ke”, xian wei tu'erqi nanbu de yige chengshi] jumin [de gushi] wei tamen she ge biyu. Dangshi, shizhemen lai dao gai cheng.

Dangshi, wo paiqian liang wei shizhe qu jiaohua tamen [gai cheng de jumin], dan tamen fouren ta lia [de shiming]. Ranhou, wo paiqian di san wei shizhe qu zengqiang ta lia [de liliang]. Tamen shuo:“Women que shi feng'an la zhi ming lai jiaohua nimen de shizhe.”
Tamen [gai cheng de jumin] shuo:“Nimen zhishi tong women yiyang de fanren, pu ci zhi zhu [an la] meiyou jiang shi renhe dongxi [gei nimen], nimen zhishi shuohuang eryi.”
Tamen [shizhe] shuo:“Women de zhu [an la] zhidao, women que shi feng ta [an la] zhi ming lai jiaohua nimen de shizhe,
women de zeren zhishi mingbai di [xiang nimen] chuanda [an la de qishi].”
Tamen [gai cheng de jumin] shuo:“Women dique ba nimen kan zuo buxiang zhi zhao. Jiaru nimen bu tingzhi xuanchuan, women biyong shitou da si nimen, nimen bi cong women zheli zaoshou tongku de xingfa.”
Tamen [shizhe] shuo:“Nimen de eyun laizi nimen ziji [zizuozishou].[Nandao nimen zao eyun] shi youyu nimen jieshou quangao ma? Bu, nimen shi guofen [chaoyue fadu] de minzhong.”
You geren cong chengshi de zui yuanfang pao lai shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Nimen dang fucong shizhemen,
nimen dang fucong zunxing zhengdao er bu xiang nimen suoqu baochou de ren [shizhe].
Wo zen neng bu chongbai na chuangzao wo, er nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu de zhu [an la] ne?
Wo zen neng she ta er chongbai qita shenling ne? Jiaru pu ci zhi zhu yu jiang zai yu wo, name, tamen [naxie shenling] de qiuqing dui wo shi hao wu yichu de, tamen buneng zhengjiu wo.
Jiaru wo zheyang zuo, wo bi xianru mingxian de mi wu zhong.
Wo que yi xinyang nimen de zhu [an la], suoyi, nimen dang tingcong wo.”
[Bu xinyang zhe shahai ta shi] you hua sheng [dui ta] shuo:“Ni jinru leyuan ba [zhu]!” Ta shuo:“Yaoshi wo de zuren zhidao duo hao a!
Wo de zhu yi kuanshu wo, bing shi wo chengwei shou zunjing zhe zhi yi.”
Zai ta zhihou, wo meiyou paiqian renhe tianbing qu chengzhi ta de zuren, wo bubi [wei ci shi] paiqian tianbing.
Zhi ting yisheng nahan [kongbu sheng], tamen dou bei miejuele.
Kebei de pu renmen! Zhiyao you shizhe lai jiaohua tamen, tamen zong shi chaoxiao ta [zhu].
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen [bei huimie de ren] jue buneng chong fan [chenshi]le.
Suoyou ren dou jiang bei dai dao wo zheli lai.
Kusi de dadi dui tamen shi yi zhong jixiang, wo ba ta fuhuo, jie ci shengchan chu guwu, gong tamen shiyong [zhu].
Wo zai da dishang chuangzaole xuduo ye zao yuan he putao yuan, bing shi xuduo quanshui congzhong yong chu,
yibian tamen chi qi guozi, naxie guozi bushi tamen qinshou zhizao de. Nandao tamen hai bu gan'en ma?
Zanmei ta [an la] chaojue! Ta chuangzaole ge zhong cheng dui de pei'ou, qizhong you dimian zhang chu de, yeyou chuzi tamen [nannu] ziji de, hai you tamen suo bu zhidao de.
Heiye dui tamen shi yi zhong jixiang, wo shi baizhou jinru heiye, tamen turan chu zai hei'an zhong.
Taiyang an yuding de chengxu yunxing, zhe shi quanneng de, quanzhi de zhu de qian ding.
Yueliang, wo ye wei ta guidingle [yunxing] chengxu, zhidao ta bian cheng gan qu de ye zao zhi yiyang.
Taiyang bu hui chaoguo yueliang [yunxing], heiye bu hui chaoyue baizhou [yunxing], ge zai yige guidao shang yunxing.
Dui tamen de yi zhong jixiang shi: Wo shi tamen de houyi chengzuo zai [nu ha shengren] manzai de chuanshang.
Wo wei tamen chuangzaole xiang chuan yiyang ke gong tamen cheng zai de jiaotong gongju.
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo neng yan si tamen,[na shi tamen jiang gao sheng qiujiu], tamen jiang meiyou jiuzhu zhe, ye de bu dao zhengjiu,
chufei you wo jiang shi de enhui.[Rang tamen] zhanshi xiangshou ba!

Mei dang you hua sheng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen dang weiju zai nimen zhiqian de [jinshi de monan] he zai nimen zhihou de [houshi de xingfa], yibian nimen shou ci min.”[Ru: Jiaru nimen xinyang yisilan jiao, yuan bi ouxiang chongbai, fucong an la bing xingshan deng, nimen bi shou ci min, dan tamen hao bu zhuyi.]
Mei dang tamen de zhu [an la] de yi zhong jixiang jianglin tamen, tamen zong shi beiqi ta.

Mei dang you hua sheng dui tamen shuo “nimen dang shiyong an la ciyu nimen de [caiwu]” shi, bu xinyang zhe jiu dui xinshi shuo:“Jiaru an la yiyu, ta hui gongyang ta, women hebi gongyang ta ne? Nimen que shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
Tamen shuo:“Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe, zhege jinggao [fuhuo ri] he shi shixian ne?”
Tamen suo dengdai de zhishi yisheng nahan [kongbu sheng], tamen zheng zhenglun shi, nahan sheng xijile tamen.
Tamen jiang buneng liu yizhu, ye wuneng hui dao ziji de jiaren shenbian.
Haojiao [di er ci] yi chui xiang, tamen turan cong fenmu zhong chulai, jimang ben xiang tamen de zhu.

Tamen jiang shuo:“Women zhen daomei! Shi shei cong women de shuimian zhong ba women huanxing de?”[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Zhe jiushi pu ci zhi zhu [an la] suozuo de xunuo, shizhemen shuo de shi shihua [zhu].”
Zhi ting yisheng nahan [kongbu sheng], tamen dou bei dai dao wo zheli [shoushen].
Jintian [fuhuo ri], renhe ren dou bu shou sihao kuidai, nimen zhi yi nimen cengjing suo zuo de [shan e] er shou baochou [zhu].
Zai na ri, leyuan de jumin jiang congshi yu kuaile zhi shi.
Tamen he tamen de qizi jiang zhishen yu [liangshuang de] yinliang zhong, kao zai bao yi shang [xiangle].
Tamen zai leyuan li yao shuiguo jiu you shuiguo, tamen yao shenme jiu you she me.
“Ping'an” shi pu ci zhi zhu [zhu][an la] suo zhi de zhuci.
[You hua sheng dui fanzui de renmen shuo]:“Fanzui de renmen a! Jintian nimen bixu likai [xinshi]le.
A dan de houyi a! Nandao wo meiyou zhufuguo nimen ma: Nimen buyao chongbai emo, ta que shi nimen mingxian de diren,
nimen zhi neng chongbai wo, zhe cai shi zhengdao.
Emo que yi shi nimen zhong de xuduo ren mi wu, nandao nimen hai buming li ma?
Zhe jiushi nimen suo bei jinggao de huo yu.
Youyu nimen [shengqian] bu xinyang, jintian nimen bixu jinru huo yu [shou huoxing].”
Zai na ri, wo jiang fengbi tamen de zui, tamen de shou jiang dui wo shuohua, tamen de jiao jiang zuozheng tamen cengjing suo zuo de shan e.
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo bi xiaochu tamen de yanjing [shi tamen chengwei mangren], rang tamen mangmu xun dao.[Na shi] tamen zen neng kanjian [zhengdao] ne?
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo bi shi tamen zai tamen de suozai zhi di bianxing [ru an la shi weifan jinling zhe bian cheng dongwu deng, jian 7:166], Ranhou, tamen ji buneng qianjin, ye buneng houtui.
Fanshi wo suo ciyu changshou zhe, wo neng zai chuangzao zhong shi ta daozhi [zhu][ru rensheng xia hou, shenti you ruo bian qiang, zuihou you you qiang bian ruo]. Nandao tamen hai buming li ma?
Wo meiyou jiaoshou ta [mu sheng] shige [zhu 1], shige ye bu shiyi ta [zhu 2]. Zhe zhishi yi xiang jiaohui he yi bu mingbai de “gulanjing”,
yibian ta [mu sheng huo “gulanjing”] jinggao huo ren [xinshi] bing panjue [chengfa] bu xinyang zhe [siren].
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Wo ceng qinshou wei tamen chuangzaole shengchu, er tamen chengle shengchu de zhuren;
wo shi shengchu wei tamen fuwu, qizhong you gong tamen cheng zai de, you gong tamen chi de.
Tamen cong shengchu zhong hai ke huode xuduo yichu he ruzhi. Nandao tamen hai bu gan'en ma?
Tamen she an la er chongbai qita shenling, tamen zhiwang dedao naxie shenling de yuanzhu.
Naxie shenling wuneng yuanzhu tamen,[shenpan shi] tamen [naxie shenling] jiang bei ji hecheng jundui lai fanzheng tamen.
Buyao rang tamen de wangyan shi ni [mu sheng] youchou. Fanshi tamen suo yincang de he gongkai de, wo quan zhidao.
Nandao ren bu zhidao ma? Wo yong yidi jingye chuangzaole ta, er ta mashang chengle yige gongkai de zhengbian zhe.
Ta [ren] na wo [an la] she biyu, er ta [ren] wangjile ziji de chuangzao guocheng. Ta shuo:“Shei neng shi kugu fuhuo ne?”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Zuichu chuangzao ta de zhu [an la] jiang shi ta fuhuo. Ta [an la] shi quanzhi ge zhong chuangzao wu de.
Ta wei nimen er cong lu shu shang chuangzao huo, nimen mashang congzhong ran huo.”
Nandao chuangzao tiandi de zhu [an la] buneng chuangzao xiang tamen yiyang de ren ma? Juedui neng! Ta que shi zui shanyu chuangzao de, quanzhi de.
Dang ta yu zuo yi jian shiwu shi, ta zhi xu xialing shuo:“You!” Yushi jiu youle.
Zanmei zhangwo wanshi wanwu de zhu [an la] chaojue! Nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu.
Yi lie ban zhe [tianshi] fashi,
yi shan qu yun zhe [tianshi] fashi,
yi chuanda jiaohui [“gulanjing”] zhe [tianshi] fashi,
nimen ying chongbai de zhu que shi du yi de zhu [an la],

[ta] shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, shi taiyang sheng qi de suoyou difang de zhu [diqiu biaomian an jingxian pingfen wei ershisi qu, xiang lin liang ge shiqu xiangcha yi xiaoshi, suoyi taiyang meitian lunliu cong shijie gedi sheng qi, ji an la shi zhongshijie de zhu].
Wo que yi yong qunxing zhuangshi zuijin de tian,
bing fangfan suoyou panni de emo ruqin ta.
Tamen buneng qieting gaoceng [tianshimen] de tanhua, yinwei tamen cong ge fang bei sheji,
bei quzhu, tamen jiang shou yongjiu [huo tongku] de xingfa.
Dan zhi qieting yici de, jiang bei yige tan zhaozhi guang suo zhuiji.
Ni [mu sheng] wen tamen [bai ouxiang zhe] ba! Shi tamen geng nan chuangzao ne? Haishi wo suo chuangzao de [tiandi wanwu] geng nan chuangzao? Wo dique yong niantu chuangzaole tamen.
Bu, ni [dui tamen de aoman] gandao jingyi, er tamen que zai chaoxiao [ni he “gulanjing”].
Tamen yi shou jinggao, dan tamen bu chong shi.
Mei dang tamen kanjian [an la de] jixiang, tamen zong shi chaoxiao [jixiang].
Tamen shuo:“Zhe zhishi mingxian de moshu.
Nandao women si hou bian cheng chentu he kugu shi, women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo ma?
Women [yi gu] de zuxian ye yao bei fuhuo ma?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shi de, nimen jiang beijian di bei fuhuo.”
Zhi ting yisheng jiaohan [di er ci chui xiang haojiao], tamen [bei fuhuo shi] turan dongzhangxiwang.
Tamen shuo:“Women zhen daomei! Zhe jiushi shenpan ri.”
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Zhe jiushi nimen cengjing fouren de panjue ri.”
[You hua sheng dui tianshimen shuo]:“Nimen dang ba bu yi zhe he tamen de qizi, yiji tamen she an la er chongbai de [ouxiang] dou jihe qilai, ranhou ba tamen dai dao huo yu de lushang qu.
Nimen dang lanzhu tamen, tamen bi jiang bei shenwen [zhu].”
[Shenwen shi jiang dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen zenme la? Nimen weihe bu [xiang zai chenshi nayang] huzhu ne?”
Bu, jintian tamen jiang shi touxiang de.
Tamen jiang huxiang zou lai, bici zewen.
Tamen [zhuisui zhe] jiang [dui youpian tamen de ren] shuo:“Nimen zong shi cong youbian lai youpian women de [ji yong e xing youpian women].”
Tamen [youpian zhe] jiang shuo:“Bu, nimen yuan bushi xinshi.
Women ben wu quanli duifu nimen. Bu, nimen shi panni de minzhong.
[Xianzai] women ying shou women de zhu de panjue, women ying changshi [women ying shou de] xingfa.
Women zhi suoyi shi nimen mi wu, yinwei women yuanlai yeshi mi wu zhe.”
Zai na ri, tamen bi jiang tong shou xingfa.
Wo dique ruci chengzhi fanzui zhe.
Tamen jiushi zhe zhong ren: Mei dang youren dui tamen shuo “chu an la wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu” shi, tamen bian jiao'ao zi da [zhu][de fouren].
Tamen shuo:“Nandao women yao wei yige zhongle mo de shiren er fangqi women de shenling ma?”
Bu, ta [mu sheng] yi zhaoshi [tamen] zhenli [ru yisilan jiao he “gulanjing”], bing zhengshi [zhiqian de] shizhemen.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen [mai jia de yi jiaotu] bi jiang changshi tongku de xingfa,
nimen zhi yi nimen cengjing suo fan de zui'e er shou huan bao.”
Wei an la te xuan de pu renmen [zhen xinshi] liwai.
Zhexie [te xuan de pu] ren [zai leyuan li] bi jiang huode zhongsuozhouzhi de jiyang:
Ge zhong shuiguo, erqie tamen shi shou zunjing de,
zai enze de leyuan li,
mianduimian zuo zai bao yi shang,
zhen man xian jiu de beizi jiang chuandi gei tamen.
Na xian jiu yanse jiebai, yin zhe gandao weimei wubi.
Na xian jiu zhong wu mazui wu, tamen bu hui yinci er he zui [zhu].
Zai tamen de pangbian you mu bu xieshi de [zhi kan ziji de zhangfu], mei mu qingchun de qizi peiban,
tamen [de jiaonen qingchun] youru shou baohu de dan.
Tamen jiang huxiang zou lai, bici xunwen.
Tamen zhong you yiren shuo:“Wo [zai chenshi] you ge pengyou,
ta [chang wen wo] shuo:“Ni zhen de xiangxin [fuhuo] ma?
Nandao women si hou bian cheng chentu he kugu shi, women zhen de hai yao [yi women de xingwei er] shou baochou [chengfa] ma?”
Ta [na ren dui leyuan de tongban] shuo:“Nimen yuan wang xia kan ma?”
Yushi ta bian wang xia kan, kanjian ta [na wei pengyou] zai huo yu de zhongyang.
Ta [dui ta zai chenshi shi di na wei pengyou] shuo:“Yi an la fashi! Ni chadian er huile wo.
Ruguo meiyou wo de zhu de enhui, wo biding chengle bei dai wang [huo yu shouxing] zhe zhi yi.”
[Na wei jin leyuan de xinshi shuo]:“[Women yi jinru leyuan], chule women zuichu de siwang wai, women bu hui zai siwangle ma? Women bu hui zai shouchengfale ma?
Zhe que shi weida de chenggong.
Rang gongzuo zhe wei huode zhe zhong chenggong er nuli ba [zhu]!”
Zhe shi geng hao de kuandai ne? Haishi zan gumu shu?
Wo dique ba ta [zan gumu shu] zuowei dui bu yi zhe de zhemo.
Na [zan gumu shu] que shi huo yu diceng zhang chu de yi ke [kongbu] shu,
qi guozi xiang mo tou.
Tamen bi jiang chi na zhong shuiguo, bi jiang yi ci tian man du fu.
Ranhou, tamen bi jiang zai jia yin feishui, yibian fu zhong de shuiguo yu feishui hunhe [hou zai fu zhong gengjia feiteng].
Ranhou, tamen de guisu que shi huo yu.
Tamen bi jiang faxian tamen de zuxian yuan shi mi wu zhe.
Tamen congmang tazhe tamen de hou chen xingshi.
Zai tamen zhiqian, xuduo qian ren que yi mi wu.
Wo que yi zai tamen zhong paiqianguo xuduo jinggao zhe [shizhe].
Ni dang guancha bei jinggao zhe de jieju ruhe!
Wei an la te xuan de purenmen [zhen xinshi] liwai.
Nu ha que yi qiqiu wo, wo shi zui shanyu yingda de.
Wo zhengjiu ta he ta de jiaren tuolile da nan [yan si].
Wo shi ta de zisun chengwei xingcun zhe.
Wo shi ta zai hou ren zhong xiangyou mei ming.
Zhong shijie dou youren qiu zhu ci nu ha ping'an!
Wo dique ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Ta que shi wo de xinyang de pu ren zhi yi.
Ranhou, wo yan sile qiyu de ren [bu xinyang zhe].
Zunxing ta [nu ha] de dao [yisilan jiao] de ren zhong que you yi bu la xin.
Dangshi, ta [yi bu la xin] daizhe yi ke chunjie de xinling lai jian ta de zhu.
Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin he zuren shuo:“Nimen zai chongbai shenme?
Nandao nimen yao she an la er xunqiu xujia de shenling ma?
Nimen shi ruhe wang cai zhong shijie zhi zhu [an la] de?”
Ranhou, ta [yi bu la xin] kanle qunxing yiyan,
ta shuo:“Wo biding shi huan [wenyi] bingle [ta yong ci ji, yibian liu zai tamen de simiao zhong cuihui naxie ouxiang].”
Yinci, tamen bian zhuanshen likaile ta [pa ci bing chuanran tamen].
[Tamen buzai shi], ta qiaoqiao zou dao tamen de ouxiangmen mianqian shuo:“Nimen weihe bu chi [gongfeng zai nimen mianqian de] gongwu ne?
Nimen weihe bu shuohua ne?”
Yushi ta yong youshou toutou da tamen.
Tamen [bai ouxiang zhe] jimang xiang ta pao lai.
Ta [dui tamen] shuo:“Nandao nimen yao chongbai nimen suo diaosu de ouxiang ma?
An la chuangzaole nimen he nimen suo zhizao de.”
Tamen shuo:“Nimen wei ta jian yige huolu ba! Ranhou ba ta tou jin liehuo zhong [shaozhuo].”
Tamen xiang mouhai ta, dan wo que shi tamen bian cheng zui beixia de [zhu].
Ta [cong huo zhong bei jiu hou] shuo:“Wo yao dao wo de zhu nali qu, ta hui yindao wo.
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni ci gei wo yige shanliang de erzi ba!”
Yinci, wo yi yige kuanhou de erzi [yi si ma yi] xiang ta baoxi.

Dang ta [yi si ma yi] zhang dao neng yu ta yiqi zuoshi shi, ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Wo de erzi a! Wo dique meng jian wo jiang zai ni zuo [xian gei an la de] xisheng wu. Ni kaolu yixia, ni you she me yijian?” Ta [yi si ma yi] shuo:“Wo de fuqin a! Qing ni zhixing ni suo feng dao de mingling ba! Jiaru an la yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi jianren zhe.”
Dang ta lia yi guishun an la, ta [yi bu la xin] shi ta [yi si ma yi] de lian chao de ce tangzhe [zhunbei zai] shi,
wo [an la] zhaohuan ta:“Yi bu la xin a!
Ni que yi zhengshile nage meng.” Wo dique ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Zhe que shi yi xiang mingxian de kaoyan.
Wo yi yi zhi weida de xisheng wu [yi zhi gong mianyang] shule ta.
Wo shi ta zai hou ren zhong xiangyou mei ming.
“Ci yi bu la xin ping'an!”
Wo ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Ta que shi wo de xinyang de puren.
Wo hai yi jishi xianzhi you shi shanren de yi si ha ge xiang ta baoxi.
Wo ci fu ta he yi si ha ge. Ta lia de houyi zhong, you xingshan zhe, you gongran zibaoziqi zhe.
Wo que yi shi en gei mu sa [zhu 1] he [ta di gege] ha lun [zhu 2].
Wo ceng zhengjiu ta lia he ta lia de zuren tuoli da nan.
Wo ceng yuanzhu tamen, yinci tamen chengle shengli zhe.
Wo ci gei ta lia mingbai de jingdian.
Wo yindao ta lia zunxing zhengdao.
Wo shi ta lia zai hou ren zhong xiangyou mei ming.
“Ci mu sa he ha lun ping'an!”
Wo dique ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Ta lia que shi wo de xinyang de puren.
Yi lei ya si que shi shizhe zhi yi.
Dangshi, ta dui ta de zuren shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Nandao nimen yao qiqiu ba er lei [yi lei ya si de zuren chongbaiguo de zhuming ouxiang] er fangqi zui hao de chuangzao zhe
——an la, nimen de zhu he nimen de zuxian de zhu ma?”
Dan tamen fouren ta [yi lei ya si], suoyi, tamen bi jiang bei dai qu [shou huo yu de xingfa],
wei an la te xuan de purenmen [zhen xinshi] liwai.
Wo shi ta zai hou ren zhong xiangyou mei ming.
“Ci yi lei ya si ping'an!”
Wo dique ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Ta que shi wo de xinyang de puren zhi yi.
Lu te que shi shizhe zhi yi.
Dangshi, wo zhengjiule ta he ta de quanbu jiaren,
liu zai houmian [gai huimie] de yi wei lao fu [ta de qizi] chuwai.
Ranhou, wo huimiele qiyu de ren [ru sihai pang suo duo ma cheng de jumin].
Nimen dique zhaoxi dou zai jingguo tamen de yizhi, nandao nimen hai buming li ma?
You nu si que shi shizhe zhi yi [zhu].
Dangshi, ta tao dao na sou manzai de chuanshang.
Ta [tongyi] chouqian [zhu], dan ta shibaile.
Yitiao da yu tunle ta, ta [de xingwei] shi ying shou qianze de.
Jiaru ta bushi chang zansong an la zhe,
ta biding liu zai yu fu zhong, zhidao tamen [renlei] bei fuhuo di na yitian.
Wo ba ta reng zai guangtutu di hai'an, na shi ta shi you bing de.
Wo shi yi ke hulu ke de zhiwu zhang zai ta shangmian [gaizhe ta].
Wo paiqian ta qu jiaohua shi wan huo geng duo de ren.
Tamen xiangxin ta, suoyi, wo shi tamen zhanshi xiangle.
Ni [mu sheng] wen wen tamen [bu xinyang zhe]:“Nandao nuhai gui ni de zhu, er nanhai gui tamen ma?
Haishi wo ceng ba tianshi zaocheng nuxing de, er tamen keyi zuozheng ne?”
Xuzhi, tamen [gu lai shen de yi jiaotu] biding niezao huangyan shuo:
“An la you ernule [tamen ba tianshimen dang zuo an la de nu'er].” Tamen dique zai shuohuang.
Nandao ta yao nuhai er buyao nanhai ma?
Nimen zenme la? Nimen zenme [ruci] panduan?
Nandao nimen hai bu xingwu ma?
Haishi nimen you mingzheng ne?
Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe, nimen jiu na chu nimen de jingdian lai ba!
Tamen niezao ta [an la] yu jingling zhi jian you xueqin guanxi, er jingling que yi zhidao [fuhuo ri] ziji bi jiang bei dai qu shenwen.
Zanmei an la chaojue! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
Wei an la te xuan de pu renmen [zhen xinshi] liwai.
Nimen he nimen suo chongbai de [ouxiang],
jue buneng you ren [xinshi] beili ta [an la],
zhuding ru huo yu [shou huoxing] zhe chuwai.
[Tianshimen shuo]:“Women [tianshi] mei ge dou you yige zhouzhi de weizhi.
Women que shi chang lie ban de [ru musilin libai lie ban yiyang].
Women que shi chang zansong an la de.”
Tamen [alabo ren de yi jiaotu] dique chang shuo:
“[Zai mu sheng wei sheng qian] jiaru women you qian ren de jiaohui,
women yiding shi an la te xuan de pu ren.”
[Xianzai “gulanjing” jiang shile, mu sheng wei shengle], dan tamen reng bu xinyang [zhu][mu sheng he “gulanjing”], tamen bujiu jiang zhidao [bu xinyang de houguo].
Wo dui wo suo paiqian de pu renmen [shizhemen] dique youyanzaixian:
Tamen que shi huosheng zhe.
Wo de jundui que shi shengli zhe.
Suoyi, ni [mu sheng] zhanshi bi kai tamen ba!
Ni guancha tamen ba! Tamen bujiu jiang kanjian [xingfa].
Nandao tamen yao wo zaori shixian wo [dui tamen] de xingfa ma?
Dang wo de xingfa jianglin tamen de tingyuan shi [ji jianglin tamen], bei jinggao zhe de zaochen zhen elie!
Ni zhanshi bi kai tamen ba!
Ni guancha tamen ba! Tamen bujiu jiang kanjian [xingfa].
Zanmei ni de zhu——zun rong de zhu chaojue! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
“Ci shizhemen ping'an!”
Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——zhong shijie de zhu!

Chuzi tamen ben zu de yi wei jinggao zhe [mu sheng] yi daoda tamen, tamen [alabo ren de yi jiaotu] wei ci gandao jingya. Bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Zhe [mu sheng] shige moshu shi, shige shuohuang zhe [zhu].
Nandao ta yao ba xuduo zhuzai bian cheng yige zhuzai [an la] chongbai ma? Zhe zhenshi jian guaishi.”
Tamen de shoulingmen qishen shuo:“Nimen zou ba! Nimen qu jianxin nimen de zhuzai ba! Zhe que shi jian you yumou de shi.
Women zai zuihou de zongjiao zhong meiyou ting daoguo ci shi, zhe zhishi yi zhong weizao.
Zai women zhexie ren zhong, nandao jiaohui [“gulanjing”] zhi jiang gei ta [mu sheng] ma?” Bu, tamen shi zai huaiyi wo de jiaohui [“gulanjing”]. Bu, tamen shangwei changshi wo de xingfa.
Nandao tamen yongyou ni de quanneng de, bo shi de zhu de enhui zhi ku ma?
Nandao tamen yongyou tiandi wanwu de zhuquan ma? Jiaru tamen you, rang tamen shefa pa shangtian qu ba!
[Youyu tamen fouren an la de qishi], tamen shi yi zhi jiang bei dabai de jundui, youru yiqian meng jun [bei dabai] yiyang.
Zai tamen zhiqian fouren shizhemen de you: Nu ha de zuren, a de ren, yongyou dajun de falao,
sa mu de ren, lu te de zuren he conglin de jumin, zhexie ren shi tonglei.
Tamen dou fouren [tamen de] shizhemen, suoyi, wo [dui tamen] de chengfa shixianle.
Zhexie ren zhi dengdai yisheng ju xiang [ru yi si la fei lei tianshi chui xiang haojiao], na ju xiang hao bu tingdun.
Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Zai qingsuan riqian, qiu ni rang women zaori kanjian women gongguo de jilu ba!”
Duiyu tamen suo wangyan de, ni dang rennai. Ni dang laoji wo de qiangda de puren da wude, ta que shi yongyuan gui xin'an la de.
Wo que yi shi qun shan tong ta yiqi zao [ri chu zhi zhengwu] wan [wuhou zhi riluo] zansong wo.
[Wo que yi shi] zhong niao jihe qilai, quanbu tong ta [da wude] yiqi gui xin wo [bing zansong wo].
Wo shi ta de wangguo qiangda, wo ci gei ta zhihui heshan bian de yanci [zhu].
Susong zhe de gushi daoda nile ma? Dangshi, tamen yue qiang er runei dian [woshi].

Dangshi, tamen qu jian da wude, er ta haipa jian tamen. Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao haipa![Women shi] liang ge susong zhe, women zhong de yiren qirule ling yiren, qing ni wei women binggong caijue, qing ni buyao piantan [women renhe yifang], qing ni zhiyin women zhengdao.

Zhe wei jiushi wo de xiongdi [bingfei qin xiongdi, zhi xinyang shang de xiongdi, yin wei an la shuo:“Xinshi jie xiongdi.”(Jian 49:10)], Ta you jiushijiu zhi mu mianyang, er wo zhiyou yi zhi, dan ta [dui wo] shuo:“Ni ba na zhi yang gei wo ba!” Ta zai bianlun zhong zhanshengle wo.”

Ta [da wude wei ting duifang bianjie jiu] shuo:“Ta yaoqiu ni ba ni di na zhi mu mianyang bing ru ta de [99 zhi] mu mianyang zhong [cou zu 100 zhi], ta que yi qifu ni. You xuduo tongshi que shi huxiang qiru de, wei xinyang bing xingshan zhe liwai, dan zhexie ren shi shaoshu.” Da wude caixiang wo [an la] zai kaoyan ta, suoyi, ta bian qiu ta de zhu [an la] kuanshu [ta], bing baidao xiaqu, xiang an la huizui. Koutou chu
wo kuanshule ta de guocuo, ta dique huodele jiejin wo [de xuke] he youmei de guisu [leyuan].

Da wude a! Wo que yi renming ni wei da dishang de jiren zhe, suoyi, ni dang ti renmen binggong caijue, ni buyao shuncong siyu, yimian siyu shi ni beili an la zhi dao. Fan beili an la zhi dao zhe, tamen bi yin tamen wangji qingsuan ri er shou yanli de xingfa.
Wo bingfei hao wu mudi er chuangzao tiandi wanwu, na shi bu xinyang zhe de wang cai. Bu xinyang zhe jiang shou huo yu zhi xing zhen huogai!
Nandao wo duidai xinyang bing xingshan zhe hui xiang duidai da dishang de zuo'e zhe ma? Nandao wo duidai jingwei zhe hui xiang duidai xie'e zhe [fanzui zhe] ma?
[Zhe] shi wo suo jiang shi ni [mu sheng] de yi bu jixiang de jingdian [“gulanjing”], yibian tamen shensi ta [“gulanjing”] de jing wen, yibian you lizhi de renmen juewu.
Wo ba su lai man ciyu da wude. Su lai man shi duome youxiu de yi wei puren a! Ta que shi yongyuan gui xin'an la de.
Dangshi, youren zai bangwan ba yi pi xunlian you su de junma xian gei ta [wei an la zhi dao zhandou].
Ta [su lai man] shuo:“Ai! Wo ku'ai zhexie junma er wangjile zan nian wo de zhu [wangji li bu libai], zhidao [bu li de] shijian guoqu, yemu jianglin [ci shi li bu libai de shijian yi jieshu].”
[Ranhou ta shuo]:“Nimen ba tamen [ma] gan lai gei wo ba!” Ta yong shou paida ma tui he jing bu.
Wo que yi kaoyanguo su lai man. Wo ceng ba yige emo fang zai ta de baozuo shang [gu ta shiqule yiduan shijian de wangwei], ranhou ta gui xin wo [bing xiang wo huizui].
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuanshu wo, qiu ni ci gei wo yige zai wo zhihou bu shuyu renhe ren de wangguo. Ni que shi hou shi de.”
Wo shi feng wei ta fuwu, feng feng ta de mingling rouhe de chui xiang ta xiangdao da di difang.
[Wo hai shi] ge zhong neng jianzhu de he neng qianshui de emo,
yiji qita dai jiaoliao de emo [wei ta fuwu].
[An la dui su lai man shuo]:“Zhe shi wo de enci, ni keyi [dui tamen] shi en [ru shifang naxie emo], ye keyi [ba tamen] liu xia, bu hui shou qingsuan.”
Ta dique huodele jiejin wo [de xuke] he youmei de guisu [leyuan].
Ni dang laoji wo de puren ai you bu [zhu]. Dangshi, ta qiqiu ta de zhu [shuo]:“Emo que yi shi wo zaoshou tongku [sun shen] he chengfa [shi cai].”
[Wo mingling ta shuo]:“Ni duojiao ba! Zhe shi ke gong muyu he yinyong de liangshui.”
Wo ba ta de jiaren he yu tamen xiangtong de renshu ci hai ta, zhe shi cong wo jiang shi de enhui, shi dui you lizhi de renmen de jiaohui.

[Wo dui ta shuo]:“Ni dang yong shou na yi ba cao qu da [ni de qizi]. Ni buyao weibei shiyan.” Wo dique faxian ta shi jianren zhe. Ta shi duome youxiu de yi wei puren a! Ta que shi yongyuan gui xin'an la de.
Ni dang laoji wo de puren yi bu la xin, yi si ha ge, ya gubu, tamen dou shi you jingli [chongbai wo] de, dou shi you zongjiao zhishi de.
Wo te xuan tamen, bing ci tamen zan zhu zhi wu [ru tamen zai qizhong quan ren guishun an la ji wei houshi xingshan deng].
Zai wo kan lai, tamen que shi te xuan de, que shi zui youxiu de.
Ni dang laoji yi si ma yi, ai lei ye sai a, zu le ke fu lei, quan shi zui youxiu de.
Zhe shi yi xiang jiaohui. Jingwei zhe bi jiang huode youmei de guisu——
[changzhu] yongjiu de leyuan, yuan menjiang wei tamen chang kai [zhu].
Tamen zai leyuan li, kao zai bao yi shang, jiao ren na lai ge zhong shuiguo he yinliao.
Zai tamen de pangbian you mu bu xieshi [zhi kan ziji de zhangfu], tongling de qizi peiban.
Zhe shi wei qingsuan ri er yingxu nimen [jingwei zhe] de.
Zhe jiushi wo [ci gei nimen] de jiyang, ta shi qu zhi bu jin de.
Shishi jiushi zheyang. Panni zhe bi jiang huode elie de guisu——
[yong ju] huo yu. Tamen jiang bei reng ru huo yu zhong [shou huoxing]. Guisu zhen elie!
Shishi jiushi zheyang. Rang tamen changshi xingfa ba! Na shi ji re de feishui he ji leng de zang wu [ru nong zhi],
hai you qita ge zhong tongyang yanli de xingfa.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Zhe shi yiqun tong nimen yidao chuang ru huo yu de ren, tamen shi bu shou huanying de, tamen bi zai huo yu zhong [shou huoxing].”

Tamen [mangmu gensui wu ru huo yu zhe] jiang shuo:“Bu! Nimen [daitou ru huo yu zhe] cai shi bu shou huanying de, shi nimen [zai chenshi wudao women er] ba women you ru zhe zhong jingdi de. Guisu zhen elie!”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Shei ba women you ru zhe zhong jingdi, qiu ni shi shei zai huo yu li shou jiabei de xingfa.”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women zenme meiyou kanjian women [zai chenshi] ceng shi wei eren di naxie ren ne?
Nandao shi women ceng ba tamen dang xiaobing ma? Haishi women de shili shuaitui kan bujian tamenle?”
Zhe que shi zhenshi de, huo yu de fanren jiushi ruci zhenglun de.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo zhishi yi wei jinggao zhe, chu du yi weiyan de an la wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu.
[Ta shi] tiandi wanwu de zhu.[Ta shi] shi quanneng de, zui kuanshu de.”
Ni shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi yige zhongda de xiaoxi,
dan nimen beiqi ta.
Wo bu zhidao gaocengmen [tianshimen] bici zhenglun [a dan shengren de chuangzao] shi de qingkuang.
Wo suo feng dao de qishi shi: Wo zhishi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Dangshi, ni de zhu dui tianshimen shuo:“Wo jiang yong nitu chuangzao yige ren [a dan].
Dang wo zao wan ta bing ba linghun chui ru ta de tinei shi, nimen dang fushou fucong.”
Suoyou tianshi dou fucongle,
wei yi bu lisi bu ken fucong, ta aoman, ta yuan shi bu xinyang zhe.
Ta [an la] shuo:“Yi bu lisi a! Shi shenme zuzhi ni bu fucong wo qinshou chuangzao de ren ne? Ni shi aoman? Haishi ni shi gaoshang de?”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Wo bi ta [a dan] youyue, ni yong huo chuangzao wo, er yong nitu chuangzao ta.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni cong zheli [leyuan] chuqu ba! Ni que shi bei fangzhu de.
Wo dui ni de qianze, zhidao shenpan ri.”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuan yan wo dao tamen [renlei] bei fuhuo di na yitian ba!”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni bei kuan yanle,
zhidao zhuding de shi ri [fuhuo ri].”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Yi ni de zun rong fashi! Wo bi jiang ba tamen quanbu you ru qitu,
sa de [alabo yu yige zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi], yi chongman jiaohui de “gulanjing” fashi!
Bu! Buxinyang zhe xianrule wangzizunda he beini zhong.
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen [gao sheng] hujiu shi, taowang de shijian yi shiqu.
Wei tamen zhong ni te xuan de purenmen [zhen xinshi] liwai [zhu].”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Zhe shi zhenli, wo shuo de jiushi zhenli.
Wo bi jiang yong ni he tamen [renlei] zhong zhuisui ni de ren yiqi tian man huo yu.”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo bu hui wei ci [xuanchuan “gulanjing”] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo ye bushi jiamao de.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] zhishi dui zhong shijie de yi xiang jiaohui,
nimen bujiu bi jiang zhidao ta [“gulanjing”] de zhenxiang.”
Zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] shi cong quanneng de, zui ruizhi de an la jiang shi de.
Wo que yi jiang shi ni [mu sheng] zhe bu baohan zhenli de jingdian, suoyi, ni dang chongbai an la, dang qiancheng jingyi fucong ta [zhu].

Xuzhi, yisilan jiao [de chongbai he shuncong] zhi wei an la. Naxie she an la er ling qiu baohu zhe [ouxiang] de ren [shuo]:“Women chongbai tamen [ouxiang], zhi weile tamen neng shi women jiejin an la.” An la bi jiang wei tamen panjue tamen suo fenqi de. An la jue bu yindao shuohuang zhe he wang'enfuyi zhe.
Jiaru an la yu you erzi, ta yiding hui cong ta de chuangzao wu zhong tiaoxuan tasuo yiyu de. Zanmei ta chaojue! Ta shi du yi weiyan de an la.

Ta yi zhenli chuangzao tiandi. Ta shi heiye jinru baizhou, shi baizhou jinru heiye, bing shi ri yue [wei nimen fuwu], mei ge dou an guiding de chengxu yunxing. Xuzhi, ta shi quanneng de, zui kuanshu de.

Ta [an la] you yige ren [a dan shengren] chuangzaole nimen, ranhou, ta you nage ren chuangzaole ta de qizi [ha wa]. Ta wei nimen er jiangxia ba zhi peidui de shengchu [yi dui mianyang (gong de yu mu de), yi dui shanyang (gong de yu mu de), yi dui niu (gong de yu mu de), yi dui luotuo (gong de yu mu de)]. Ta ba nimen chuangzao yu nimen de mu fu zhong, zai sanchong hei'an zhong fanfu chuangzao nimen. Zhe shi an la, shi nimen de zhu. Zhuquan shi ta de, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Nimen zenme hai yao beili ne?

Jiaru nimen wang'enfuyi, name, an la que shi wu qiu yu nimen de. Ta bu xihuan wang'enfuyi de pu ren. Jiaru nimen [chengwei xinshi bing] gan'en, name, ta jiang xiyue nimen. Yige fu zui zhe bu fudan bieren de zui'e. Ranhou, nimen dou jiang gui dao nimen de zhu nali qu, ta jiang ba nimen cengjing suo zuo de gaosu nimen. Ta dique quanzhi [renlei] xiongzhong de yiqie.

Dang ren zaoyu buxing shi, ta jiu qiqiu ta de zhu [an la] bing gui xin ta [qie xiang ta huizui]. Ranhou, dang ta [an la] ciyu ta [ren] enhui shi, ta [ren] bian wangjile ta yiqian suo qiqiu de, bing gei an la shezhi xuduo [yu an la tongdeng de] chongbai duixiang, yibian you ren beili ta [an la] de dao. Ni shuo:“Ni zhanshi xiangshou ni de bu xin ba! Ni que shi huo yu de fanren.”

[Shei de xingwei geng hao ne?] Shi zheng ye qianchengwei zhu [libai] koutou, zhanli, jinfang houshi bing kewang ta de zhu de enhui de ren ne?[Haishi bu xinyang zhe?] Ni shuo:“You zhishi de renmen yu wu zhishi de renmen xiangdeng ma [zhu]? Wei you lizhi de renmen caineng juewu.”

Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de xinyang de pu renmen a! Nimen dang jingwei nimen de zhu [an la]. Zai jinshi xingshan de renmen bi you shan bao [zhu 1]. An la de dadi shi kuankuo de [ruguo jia di buneng chongbai an la, ke dao yi di chongbai an la]. Wei jianren zhe caineng wuxian liang huode tamen ying de de baochou [zhu 2].
Ni shuo:“Wo yi fengming zhi chongbai an la, zhi qiancheng jingyi fucong ta [zhu].
Wo yi fengming cheng wei shouxian guishun de ren [musilin].”
Ni shuo:“Jiaru wo weikang wo de zhu, wo dique weiju zhongda zhi ri de xingfa.”
Ni shuo:“Wo zhi chongbai an la, zhi qiancheng jingyi fucong ta.
Nimen yao she ta chongbai shenme jiu chongbai shenme ba!” Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Sunshi zhe que shi zai fuhuo ri shi tamen ziji he jiaren shou sun zhe. Xuzhi, zhe que shi zui mingxian de sunshi.”
Zai tamen de shangmian you huo fugaizhe, zai tamen de xiamian yeyou huo fugaizhe. Zhe shi an la yong lai jinggao ta de pu renmen de.[An la shuo]:“Wo de pu renmen a! Nimen dang jingwei wo.”
Fan yuanli chongbai emo, gui xin'an la [bing huizui] zhe, tamen jiang huode jiayin. Ni xiang wo de pu renmen baoxi ba!

Tamen [wo de pu renmen] qingting shan yan [ru “chu an la wai, zai meiyouying shou chongbai de zhu” deng] bing zunxing qi zui hao de [ru ren zhu du yi, bu chongbai ouxiang deng]. Zhexie ren que shi an la suo yindao de ren, zhexie ren que shi you lizhi de ren [ru zai de•ben•a mu er•ben•nu fa lei, sa lei man•fa er xi he ai bu•zai er•ji fa li deng].
Ying shou xingfa panjue de ren,[yu bu ying shou xingfa panjue de ren xiangdeng ma?] Nandao ni [mu sheng] neng zhengjiu huo yu zhong de ren ma?

Danshi, fan jingwei tamen de zhu [an la] de ren, tamen [zai leyuan li] jiang huode gaoji zhuzhai, lou shang you lou, zhu he cong xiamian liuguo.[Zhe shi] an la de xunuo, an la shi jue bu shuangyue de.

Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ma? An la cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, ranhou shi ta shenru dixia, huiliu cheng quan, ranhou, jie ci er shengzhang chu wuyanliuse de zhuangjia [zhu], ranhou shi ta kuwei, ni kanjian ta bian huang, ranhou ta [an la] shi ta bian cheng suipian. Dui you lizhi de renmen, ci zhong que you yi zhong jiaohui.

An la shi qi xinxiong xiang yisilan jiao changkai zhe, ta zunxing ta de zhu de guangming,[zhe zhong ren tong fei musilin xiangdeng ma?] Dui zan nian an la xin ying zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai! Zhexie ren shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.

An la jiang shile zuimei de yanci, yi bu neirong yinhui, chaofan qie fanfu shenshu de jingdian [“gulanjing”].[Dang youren songdu “gulanjing” huo tingjian qi songdu sheng shi] fan weiju tamen de zhu de ren de jifu jiang wei ci er chandou. Ranhou, tamen de jifu he xin jiang yin zan nian an la er bian de rouhe. Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi an la de zhengdao, ta yi ci yindao tasuo yiyu zhe zunxing zhengdao [zhu]. An la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu meiyou yindao zhe.
Fuhuo ri yi mianbu fangyu [huo yu de] yanxing zhe [yu ping'an jinru leyuan zhe xiangdeng ma]? You hua sheng dui bu yi zhe shuo:“Nimen dang changshi nimen suo fanzui'e de chengfa.”
Tamen de qian ren ye tongyang fourenguo, yinci, xingfa cong tamen liao xiangbudao di difang jianglin tamen.
An la shi tamen zai jinshi shenghuo zhong changshi lingru, dan houshi de xingfa cai shi zui yanli de. Yaoshi tamen zhidao duo hao a!
Wo que yi zai zhe bu “gulanjing” zhong wei renlei shezhi ge zhong biyu, yibian tamen jieshou jiaohui.
[Zhe shi yi bu] alabo wen de “gulanjing”, qizhong hao wu waiqu [zhu][cuangai], yibian tamen jingwei.

An la she ge biyu: Yige ren [nuli] shuyu yi huo huxiang zhengchao zhe [ru ji bai an la you bai ouxiang zhe] suoyou, er ling yige ren [nuli] ze wanquan shuyu yige zhuren [ru zhi bai du yi de an la zhe] suoyou. Zhe liang ren de qingkuang xiangtong ma? Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Ni [mu sheng] bi jiang shi yao siwang de, tamen ye bi jiang shi yao siwang de [zhu].
Ranhou, fuhuo ri, nimen bi jiang zai nimen de zhu nali huxiang zhengbian.
Shei bi jie an la de mingyi shuohuang [zhu] bing fouren jianglin ta de zhenli [mu sheng he “gulanjing” deng] de ren geng bu yi ne? Nandao huo yu li meiyou bu xinyang zhe de jusuo ma?
Shou ci zhenli [“gulanjing”] zhe [mu sheng] he quexin zhenli zhe [zhen xinshi], zhexie ren que shi jingwei zhe.
Fanshi tamen xiang yao de, tamen zai tamen de zhu nali dou ke dedao, zhe shi dui xingshan zhe de baochou.
Yibian an la shemian tamen suo fan de zui e, bing yi tamen suo zuo de zui hao shangong baochou tamen [zhu].
Nandao an la hai buneng shi ta de pu renmen manzu ma? Tamen yi tamen she ta [an la] er chongbai de zhuzai [ouxiang] lai weihe ni [mu sheng]. An la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu meiyou yindao zhe;
an la yindao shei zunxing zhengdao, jue meiyou ren neng shi ta mi wu. Nandao an la bushi quanneng zhe, zhangguan baoying zhe ma?

Jiaru ni wen tamen:“Shei chuangzaole tiandi?” Tamen bi shuo:“An la.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Jiaru an la yu shanghai wo, name, nimen she an la er qiqiu de [ouxiang], tamen neng xiaochu ta [an la] dui wo de shanghai ma? Jiaru ta [an la] yu shi en yu wo, tamen neng zudang ta de enhui ma?” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“An la dui wo zugoule [zhu 1]! Xinlai zhe [zhen xinshi] zhi neng xinlai ta [zhu 2][an la].”
Ni shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Nimen yi nimen de daoheng ba! Wo yi wo de daoheng, nimen bujiu jiang zhidao,
lingru de xingfa jianglin shei, shei jiang zaoshou yongjiu de xingfa.”

Wo que yi wei renlei er jiang shi ni [mu sheng] zhe bu baohan zhenli de jingdian [“gulanjing”]. Shei zunxing zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru qitu, shei zi shou qi hai. Ni bushi tamen de jianhu zhe [zhu].

Si qi yi dao zhe, an la jiang qu zou tamen de linghun; siqi wei dao zhe, an la ye hui zai shuimian zhong qu zou tamen de linghun. Yi panding siwang zhe, an la jiang ba tamen de linghun liu xia; wei panding siwang zhe, an la jiang qian hui tamen de linghun dao yige dingqi [zhu]. Dui neng sikao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Tamen she an la er chongbai xuduo qiuqing zhe ma? Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Yaoshi naxie qiuqing zhe meiyou renhe quanli, ye buming li [hao wu zhili] ne?[Tamen ye neng qiuqing ma?]”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Yiqie qiuqing, quan gui an la zhangguan. Tiandi de zhuquan shi ta de, ranhou, nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu.”

Dang youren ti dao an la du yishi, bu xinyang houshi zhe de xin bian chongman zengwu; dang youren ti dao [tamen] she ta [an la] er chongbai de zhuzai shi [ru ouxiang, er sa, tianshi deng], tamen bian xinxi ruo kuang.
Ni shuo:“An la a! Tiandi de chuangzao zhe a! Quanzhi kan bujian zhi wu he kan de jian zhi wu de zhu a! Ni bi jiang wei ni de pu renmen panjue tamen suo fenqi de.”

Jiaru bu yi zhe yongyou da dishang de yiqie, bingqie zai jia shang tongyang de yi fen, tamen biyong ta qu shu qu fuhuo ri de yanxing [zhu][dan tamen de shujin jue bu hui bei jieshou]. Tamen liao xiangbudao de xingfa jiang cong an la nali wei tamen xianxian chulai.
Tamen suo fan de zui'e jiang wei tamen xianxian chulai, tamen suo chaoxiao de [xingfa] jiang baowei zhu tamen.

Dang ren zaoyu buxing shi, ta bian qiu wo [xiangzhu], ranhou, dang wo [wei ta xiaochu buxing bing] ciyu ta enhui shi, ta shuo:“Wo huode zhexie enhui, zhi yin wo you zhishi.” Bu, zhe zhishi yi zhong kaoyan, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing buzhidao.
Tamen de qian ren ye shuoguo tongyang dehua, tamen suo zuo de yiqie dui tamen hao wu yichu.

Tamen zaoshoule tamen suo fanzui e de chengfa. Zhexie ren [mu sheng jiaohua de minzhong] zhong de bu yi zhe, tamen ye jiang zaoshou tamen suo fanzui e de chengfa. Tamen jue buneng taotuo [zhu][an la de chengfa].
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? An la yu shi shei fuyu, jiu shi shei fuyu; yu shi shei jiongpo, jiu shi shei jiongpo. Dui xinyang de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Ni shuo:“Wo [an la] de guodu sunhai zishen de pu renmen a! Nimen buyao juewang an la de enhui, an la bi jiang kuanshu suoyou zuiguo. Ta que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de [zhu].
Zai xingfa jianglin nimen qian, nimen danggui xin nimen de zhu [bing xiang ta huizui], dang guishun ta, fouze, nimen jiang de bu dao renhe yuanzhu.
Zai nimen bu zhi bu jue er xingfa turan jianglin nimen qian, nimen dang zunxing cong nimen de zhu jiang shi nimen de zuimei de yanci [“gulanjing”].”
Yimian youren shuo:“Ai! Wo de beishang jie yin wo shuhule dui an la de yiwu, wo que shi chaoxiao zhe [ru chaoxiao zhenli, mu sheng he “gulanjing” deng].”
Huo [yimian] shuo:“Yaoshi an la yindao wo, wo bi shi jingwei zhele.”
Huo [yimian] ta kanjian xingfa shi shuo:“Yaoshi wo you yici jihui [fanhui chenshi], wo yiding zuo shanren.”
[An la dui ta de dafu shi]:“Bu, wo de qishi que yi jianglin ni, dan ni fouren ta, ni wangzizunda, ni shi bu xinyang zhe.”
Fuhuo ri, ni [mu sheng] jiang kanjian jie an la de mingyi shuohuang zhe de lian shi hei de. Nandao huo yu li meiyou jiao'ao zi da zhe de jusuo ma?
An la jiang zhengjiu jingwei zhe zhi chenggong zhi zhai [leyuan]. Tamen bu hui zaoyu buxing, ye bu hui youchou.
An la shi wanwu de chuangzao zhe, shi wanwu de jianhu zhe.
Ta zhangguan tiandi de yaoshi. Bu xinyang an la de qishi zhe, zhexie ren que shi sunshi zhe.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wuzhi de renmen a! Nandao nimen yao quan wo she an la er chongbai qita zhuzai ma?”
Ni he ni zhiqian de shizhemen que yi feng dao qishi:“Jiaru ni gei an la shezhi huoban [zhu], ni de shangong bi jiang tulao, ni bi jiang chengwei sunshi zhe.”
Bu! Ni dang chongbai an la, dangzuo gan'en zhe.

Tamen meiyou dui an la zuo ying you de tuiduan. Fuhuo ri, dadi jiang quan zai ta de zhangwo zhong, zhu tian jiang juan zai ta de youshou zhong [zhu]. Zanmei ta chaojue! Zhigaowushang de ta [an la] chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.
Haojiao yi chui xiang, fan zai tiandi jian de dou jiang hun siguoqu, wei an la yiyu zhe liwai. Ranhou, haojiao zaici chui xiang [zhu], tamen turan zhan qilai dongzhangxiwang.
Dadi jiang shanyaozhe ta de zhu [an la] de guanghui, gongguo bu jiang zhanshi chulai, xianzhimen he jianzheng zhemen jiang bei zhao lai, tamen jiang bei binggong panjue, bu shou kuidai.
Mei ren dou jiang huode ziji suo zuo de quanbu baochou. Fanshi tamen suo zuo de, ta shi quanzhi de.

Bu xinyang zhe jiang bei cheng dui gan ru huo yu. Deng tamen daoda huo yu shi, yu men kaile. Guanli huo yu de tianshi jiang dui tamen shuo:“Nandao chuzi nimen ben zu de shizhe weiceng jianglin nimen, xiang nimen xuandu nimen de zhu [an la] de qishi bing jinggao nimen jinri de xiang hui ma?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Bu,[tamen que yi lailin women].” Bu xinyang zhe ying shou xingfa de panjue.
You hua sheng [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen jinru huo yu zhi men bing yong ju qizhong ba! Jiao'ao zi da zhe de jusuo zhen elie!”

Jingwei zhe jiang bei cheng dui song ru leyuan. Deng tamen daoda leyuan shi, yuan men zaoyi changkai [zhu]. Guanli leyuan de tianshi jiang dui tamen shuo:“Qiu zhu ci nimen ping'an! Nimen zuo de dui, nimen jinru leyuan bing yong ju qizhong ba!”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la. Ta shijianle ta dui women de xunuo, bing shi women jicheng cidi, women zai leyuan li xiang zhu nali jiu zhu nali. Xingshan zhe de baochou duo mei a!”

Ni jiang kanjian tianshimen weirao zai baozuo de sizhou zanmei songyang tamen de zhu, tamen [suoyou bei zaowu] jiang bei binggong panjue. You hua sheng shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——zhong shijie de zhu.”
Ha, mi mu [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].

Zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] shi cong quanneng de, quanzhi de, kuanshu zui'e de, jieshou huiguo de, chengfa yanli de, guang shi enhui de an la jiang shi de. Chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Wei ta [an la] shi zuihou de guisu.
Wei bu xinyang zhe cai hui zhenglun an la de qishi. Ni buyao bei tamen zai da dishang de sichu benbo suo mihuo.

Zai tamen zhiqian, nu ha de zuren he zai tamen zhihou de ge minzu dou fourenguo [tamen de shizhemen]. Mei ge [bu xinyang de] minzu dou yu mouhai ziji de shizhe. Tamen wang jia zhenglun, qitu jie ci bodao zhenli, yinci, wo chengfale tamen. Wo de xingfa duo kepa!
Bu xinyang zhe ruci shoudaole ni de zhu de panjue, tamen que shi huo yu de fanren.

Danfu baozuo zhe [tianshi] he zai baozuo de sizhou zhe [tianshi] dou zanmei songyang [zhu] tamen de zhu. Tamen [tianshi] xinyang ta [an la] bing wei xinshimen qiurao [shuo]:“Women de zhu a! Ni zai enhui he zhishi fangmian shi baoluo wanwu de, suoyi, qiu ni kuanshu huiguo zi xin bing zunxing ni de dao zhe, qiu ni baohu tamen mian shou huo yu de xingfa.
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni rang tamen, tamen xingshan de zuxian, tamen de qizi he tamen de zisun jinru yongjiu de leyuan ba! Na shi ni suo xunuo tamen de. Ni que shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.
Qiu ni baohu tamen mian shou [gan zui de] chengfa. Zai na ri, ni baohu shei mian shou [gan zui de] chengfa, ni que yi ci min shei. Na que shi weida de chenggong.”

Bu xinyang zhe [jinru huo yu shi], you hua sheng jiaohan tamen shuo:“[Nimen zai chenshi shi], an la yanwu nimen, sheng yu nimen [xianzai] yanwu nimen ziji, yinwei [na shi] dang youren quan nimen xinyang shi, nimen bu xinyang.”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Ni ceng shi women si guo liang ci, ni ceng liang ci ciyu women shengming.[Xianzai] women chengren women de zuiguole. Qingwen you likai huo yu de lu ma?”

[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Zhe shi yinwei: Dang youren ti dao an la du yishi [ru libai zhong], nimen jiu fouren; dang youren gei ta [an la] shezhi huoban [zhu] shi, nimen jiu xinyang. Yinci, panjue zhi gui zhigaowushang, zhi da de an la.”
Shi ta [an la] zhaoshi nimen ta de jixiang, bing wei nimen cong tiankong jiangxia jiyang. Wei gui xin'an la [bing huizui] zhe cai hui jieshou quangao.
Nimen [mu sheng ji xinshimen] dang qiqiu an la, dang qiancheng jingyi fucong ta, jishi bu xinyang zhe bu xihuan.
[An la] shi pinji zuigao de, shi you baozuo de. Ta yi ta de mingling ba qishi jiang gei tasuo yiyu de puren, yibian ta [shou ci qishi zhe] jinggao xiang hui zhi ri [fuhuo ri],

na jiushi tamen [cong fenmu zhong] chulai zhi ri,[na shi] tamen zhong meiyou renhe shi neng manguo an la.[You hua sheng shuo]:“Jintian, zhuquan shi shei de?”[Zhong shijie dou jiang huida]:“Shi du yi weiyan de an la de.”
Jintian, mei ren dou jiang yin ziji suo zuo de [shan e] huode baochou; jintian,[mei geren dou] bu shou kuidai. An la que shi qingsuan shensu de.
Ni [mu sheng] dang jinggao tamen linjin zhi ri [fuhuo ri]. Na shi, xin jiang yin youchou er tiao dao yanhou. Bu yi zhe ji meiyou renhe qinyou, ye meiyou renhe qiuqing zhe yuan ting qi suku.
Ta [an la] zhidao yan suo bu chengshi de he xiongzhong suoyincang de.
An la yi zhenli panjue, tamen she ta [an la] er qiqiu de [ouxiang] ze buneng panjue renhe shi. An la que shi quan wen de, quan shi de.

Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing, guancha tamen qian ren de jieju ruhe ma? Qian ren de shili bi tamen de geng qiangda, zai da dishang [liu xia] de yiji [bi tamen de] geng duo, dan an la zhong yin tamen de zui'e chengfale tamen. Renhe ren dou buneng baohu tamen mian shou an la de xingfa.
Zhe shi yinwei tamen de shizhemen yi daizhe mingzhengdaoda tamen, dan tamen reng bu xiangxin [shizhemen], suo yi, an la chengfale tamen. Ta que shi zui qiang da de, chengfa zui yanli de.
Wo que yi paiqian mu sa [zhu] daizhe wo de jixiang he mingzheng,
qu jiaohua falao, ha man he gao lun, dan tamen shuo:“[Ta] shi moshu shi, shi shuohuang zhe.”

Dang ta daizhe cong wo jiang shi de zhenli daoda tamen shi, tamen shuo:“Nimen dang sha si tong ta yiqi xinyang de renmen de nanhai, zhi rang tamen de nuhai [funu] huozhe.” Bu xinyang zhe de yinmou zhishi wu ru qitu.
Falao shuo:“Nimen rang wo sha si mu sa ba! Jiao ta qiqiu ta de zhu [shi wo tingzhi sha ta] ba! Wo dique pa ta hui gaibian nimen de zongjiao, huo zai guonei yinqi dongluan.”
Mu sa shuo:“Wo qiu wo de zhu, yeshi nimen de zhu baohu wo, mian zao suoyou bu xinyang qingsuan ri de wangzizunda zhe de qinhai.”

Falao de jiaren zhong yi wei yincang xinyang de nan xinshi shuo:“Dang yige ren que yi daizhe cong nimen de zhu jiang shi de mingzhengdaoda nimen, zhi yin ta shuo:“Wo de zhu shi an la”, nandao nimen jiu yao shahai ta ma [zhu]? Jiaru ta shi shuohuang zhe, name, ta zi shou qi hai; jiaru ta shi shuo shihua zhe, name, tasuo weihe nimen de zainan, youxie bi jiang jianglin nimen. An la jue bu yindao guofen zhe [ru wugu sharen, chaoyue fadu, gan dazui he duo shen chongbai deng] he shuohuang zhe.

Wo de zuren a! Jintian, guo quan shi nimen de, nimen zai guonei chengxiong. Dan ruguo an la de xingfa jianglin women, shei neng bangzhu women diyu ta ne?” Falao shuo:“Wo zhi zhishi nimen wo renwei zhengque de, wo zhi lingdao nimen zou zhengdao.”
Nage xinshi shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Wo dique pa nimen zaoshou leisi [yiqian] ge zongpai zaonan zhi ri de xingfa,
ru nu ha de zuren, a de ren he sa mu de ren, yiji zai tamen zhihou de renmen suo zao de zainan. An la buxiang kuidai ta de pu renmen.
Wo de zuren a! Wo dique pa nimen zaoshou [leyuan de jumin yu huo yu de fanren] huxiang hanjiao zhi ri [de xingfa].
Zai na ri, nimen jiang zhuanshen taozou, renhe ren dou buneng baohu nimen mian shou an la de xingfa. An la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu meiyou yindao zhe.

Yiqian, you su fu que yi daizhe xuduo mingzhengdaoda nimen, dan nimen yizhi huaiyi ta suo dai gei nimen de mingzheng, zhidao ta si shi, nimen reng shuo:“An la jue bu hui zai ta zhihou paiqian shizhele.” An la ruci shi guofen zhe he huaiyi zhe mi wu.

Wu zhenpingshiju er zhenglun an la de qishi zhe, zai an la he xinshimen kan lai, tamen shi feichang kezeng de. An la ruci fengbile mei ge jiao'ao zi da zhe he baojun de xin [zhu][gu tamen buneng zunxing zheng dao].
Falao shuo:“Ha man a! Ni wei wo jianzao yizuo gao ta ba! Yibian wo neng daoda naxie lu——

shangtian zhi lu, yibian wo neng kuijian mu sa de zhu, jinguan wo renwei ta shi shuohuang zhe.” Falao ruci bei ziji de e xing suo mihuo, bing zu'ai ta zunxing zheng dao. Falao de yinmou zhi neng huimie zishen.
Nage xinshi shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Nimen gensui wo ba! Wo hui zhiyin nimen zheng dao [yisilan jiao] de.
Wo de zuren a! Jinshi shenghuo zhishi duanzan de xiangshou, houshi cai shi yongjiu de jusuo [zhu].
Shei zuo'e, shei zhi shou tongyang de e bao; shei xingshan, wulun nannu, zhiyao shi xinshi, zhexie ren jiang jinru leyuan, tamen zai leyuan li jiang huode wuxian liang de gongji.
Wo de zuren a! Wo zhaohuan nimen huojiu, nimen zenme zhaohuan wo ru huo yu ne?
Nimen zhaohuan wo buyao xinyang an la, bing yi wo suo bu zhidao de gei ta [an la] shezhi huoban, er wo que zhaohuan nimen gui xin quanneng de, zui kuanshu de zhu [an la].
Wuyi, nimen zhaohuan wo qu xinyang de, zai jinshi he houshi dou shi buneng yingda [wo de] qiqiu de. Women de guisu que shi an la nali. Guofen zhe que shi huo yu de fanren.
Nimen jiang hui xiangqi wo dui nimen shuoguo dehua. Wo ba wo de shiwu tuofu gei an la. An la dui [ta de] pu renmen que shi quan shi de.”
An la baohu nage xinshi mian zao tamen de mouhai, bing jiang yanxing chengfa falao de renmin.
Tamen zhaoxi dou jiang bei dai qu shou huoxing. Fuhuo de shijian lailin zhi ri,[you hua sheng dui tianshimen shuo]:“Nimen dang rang falao de renmin jin [huo yu] qu shou zui yanli de xingfa [zhu].”
Na shi, tamen jiang zai huo yu li huxiang zhenglun, ruozhe jiang dui jiao'ao zi da zhe shuo:“Women yiqian que shi zhuisui nimen de,[xianzai] nimen neng wei women jianqing yixie huo yu de xingfa ma?”
Jiao'ao zi da zhe jiang shuo:“[Xianzai] women dajia dou zai huo yu lile, an la que yi wei ta de pu renmen panjue.”
Zai huo yu li de renmen jiang dui huo yu de guanli zhe [tianshi] shuo:“Qing nimen qiqiu nimen de zhu [an la] wei women jianqing yi ri de xingfa ba!”

Tamen [tianshi] jiang shuo:“Nandao nimen de shizhemen meiyou daizhe mingzhengdaoda nimen ma?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Bu,[tamen yi daizhe mingzheng daoda women].” Tamen [tianshi] jiang shuo:“Nimen qiqiu [nimen suo xihuan de] ba! Bu xinyang zhe de qiqiu zhishi zai mi wu zhong.”
Wo bi zai jinshi shenghuo zhong he zheng renmen qilai zuozheng zhi ri shi wo de shizhemen he xinshimen huosheng [zhu].
Zai na ri, bu yi zhe de tuoci dui ziji jiang shi wuyi de, tamen jiang zao qianze, tamen jiang huode elie de guisu [zai huo yu li shou tongku de xingfa].
Wo que yi ci gei mu sa zheng dao, bing shi yiselie de houyi jichengle jingdian [“tao la te”].
Na shi dui you lizhi de renmen de yindao he jiaohui.
Ni [mu sheng] dang jianren, an la de nuoyan que shi zhenshi de. Ni dang qiu zhu kuanshu ni de guoshi [zhu] bing zhaoxi zanmei songyang ni de zhu.

Wu zhenpingshiju er zhenglun an la de qishi zhe, tamen de xiongzhong que youyi zhong aoqi [bu yuan chengren mu sheng shi an la de shizhe he “gulanjing” shi an la de yanyu deng], tamen jue buneng shixian [tamen de yuwang]. Yinci, ni dang qiu an la baohu [mian zao jiao'ao zi da zhe de qinhai]. Ta [an la] que shi quan wen de, quan shi de.
Tiandi de chuangzao, dique bi renlei de chuangzao geng kunnan, dan da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Xiazi he kan de jian zhe shi bu xiangdeng de; xinyang bing xingshan zhe he zuo'e zhe yeshi bu xiangdeng de, dan nimen hen shao jieshou quangao.
Fuhuo de shijian kending shi yao lailin de, zhe shi wuyi de, dan da duoshu ren bing bu xiangxin.

Nimen de zhu shuo:“Zhiyao nimen [xinyang wo bing] qiqiu wo, wo jiu yingda nimen [zhu][de qiqiu]. Aoman er bu chongbai wo de ren [ru bu xinyang an la du yi, bu qiqiu an la deng], tamen jiang shou xiuru de jinru huo yu.”
Shi an la wei nimen chuangzaole heiye, yi gong nimen xiuxi; ta chuangzao baizhou, yi gong nimen guancha. An la dui renlei que shi you hong en de, dan da duoshu ren bing bu gan'en.
Zhe jiushi an la, shi nimen de zhu, shi wanwu de chuangzao zhe, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Nimen weihe hai yao beili zhenli ne?
Fouren an la de qishi zhe jiushi ruci beili zhenli de.

Shi an la wei nimen er ba dadi zao wei anju zhi suo, tian zao wei peng; ta shi nimen chengxing, shi nimen xingxiang wanmei; ta gongji nimen jiamei zhi wu. Zhe jiushi an la, shi nimen de zhu. Zansong an la——zhong shijie de zhu zhifu!
Ta [an la] shi yongsheng de, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu, suoyi, nimen dang qiqiu ta, dang qiancheng jingyi fucong ta. Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——zhong shijie de zhu.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Dang mingzheng cong wo de zhu jianglin wo shi, wo yi fengming bu chongbai nimen she an la er qiqiu [chongbai] de [ouxiang], wo yi fengming guishun zhong shijie de zhu [an la].”

Ta chuangzao nimen [ru a dan], xian yong nitu, ranhou yong yidi jingye [ru chuangzao a dan de houyi], ranhou yong yikuai ningxie [zhu], ranhou shi nimen chusheng wei ying'er, ranhou shi nimen zhang dao chengnian, ranhou shi nimen bian cheng laoren, jinguan yiqian nimen zhong you yaozhe de, yibian nimen huo dao yige dingqi, yibian nimen mingli.
Ta neng shi rensheng, ta neng shi ren si. Dang ta panjue yi jian shiwu shi, ta zhi xu xialing shuo:“You!” Yushi jiu youle.
Nandao ni bu zhidao naxie zhenglun an la de qishi de ren shi zenyang beili zhenli [yisilan jiao] de ma?
Tamen [zhenglun qishi zhe] fouren zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] he wo paiqian wo de shizhemen de shiming [zhu], tamen bujiu jiang zhidao [tamen jiang bei reng ru huo yu zhong shaozhuo].
Na shi [tamen bei reng ru huo yu hou], tie quan tie lian jiang dai zai tamen de bozi shang, tamen jiang bei tuo ru feishui zhong, ranhou, tamen jiang zai huo yu zhong bei shaozhuo.

Ranhou, you hua sheng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yiqian she an la er chongbai de ouxiang [xianzai] zai nali?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Tamen paoqi women bujianle. Bu, women yiqian wei qiqiu [chongbai]guo renhe dongxi.” An la ruci shi bu xinyang zhe mi wu.
[Tianshimen jiang dui tamen shuo]:“Zhe shi yinwei nimen zai dadishang bu gai huanxi er huanxi [ru bu gai she an la er chongbai ouxiang he zuo'e deng], hai yinwei nimen tai deyiwangxingle.
Nimen jinru huo yu zhi men bing yong ju qizhong ba! Wangzizunda zhe de guisu zhen elie!”

Ni [mu sheng] dang jianren, an la de nuoyan que shi zhenshi de. Wulun wo [zai jinshi] rang ni [mu sheng] kanjian wo suo jinggao tamen de yixie xingfa, haishi wo rang ni shou zhong, tamen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai.

Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, wo que yi paiqianguo xuduo shizhe, tamen zhong youxie [de gushi] wo yi gaosu ni, youxie wo shangwei gaosu ni. Chufei jing an la xuke, fouze, renhe shizhe dou buneng xianshi jixiang. Dang an la de mingling lailin shi, wanshi dou jiang bei binggong panjue. Na shi, zhuisui miuwu zhe que yi sunshi.
Shi an la wei nimen chuangzaole shengchu, qizhong you gong nimen qi de [zhu], you gong nimen chi de;
nimen congzhong hai ke huode xuduo yichu, nimen keyong tamen dadao nimen xiongzhong de xuqiu [ru cheng qi, yunzai huowu deng], nimen keyong tamen he chuanbo yunzai huowu.
Ta zhaoshi nimen ta de jixiang. Nimen yao fouren an la de na zhong jixiang ne?

Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing, guancha tamen qian ren de jieju ruhe ma? Qian ren de shili bi tamen de geng qiangda, zai da dishang [liu xia] de yiji [bi tamen de] geng duo, dan tamen suo zuo de yiqie dui tamen wuyile.
Dang tamen de shizhemen daizhe mingzhengdaoda tamen shi, tamen wei ziji [zai chenshi] suo yongyou de zhishi er deyiwangxing [zhu]. Tamen suo chaoxiao de xingfa baowei zhu tamenle.
Dang tamen kanjian wo de xingfa shi, tamen shuo:“Women xinyang an la du yiliao, women bu xinyang women suo chongbaiguo de ouxiang.”
Dang tamen kanjian wo de xingfa shi,[na shi] tamen cai xinyang, zhe dui tamen hao wu yichu. Zhe shi an la dui ta de pu renmen yi shiqu de changdao. Na shi, bu xinyang zhe que yi sunshi.
Ha, mi mu [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] shi cong pu ci de, te ci de zhu [an la] jiang shi de.
Dui you zhishi de minzhong, zhe shi yi bu jing wen jieshi xiangjin de jingdian, shi yi bu alabo wen de “gulanjing”,
ke zuo baoxi zhe [xinshi jin leyuan] he jinggao zhe [bu xinyang zhe jin huo yu], dan tamen da duoshu ren haishi beili, haishi bu tingcong.

Tamen shuo:“Duiyu ni suo zhaohuan women [xinyang] de, women de xin bei mengbile, women de er shi long dun de, women he ni zhi jian you yidao pingzhang [gezhe], suoyi, ni zuo ni de ba! Women zuo women de.”

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo zhishi tong nimen yiyang de fanren, wo suo feng dao de qishi shi:“Nimen ying chongbai de zhu, zhishi du yi de zhu [an la].” Suoyi, nimen dang zunxing tong xiang ta de zheng dao [bing shuncong ta], dang qiu ta kuanshu.” Bai ouxiang zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Tamen [bai ouxiang zhe] bu jiaona tian ke [zhu], bu xinyang houshi.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, tamen jiang huode yongheng de baochou [leyuan].

Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Nandao nimen zhen de bu xiangxin zai liang rinei chuangzao da di zhe [an la], er nimen gei ta shezhi xuduo [yu ta tongdeng de] chongbai duixiang zhe ma?” Zhe jiushi zhong shijie de zhu [an la].
Ta zai dadishang wengu de anzhi qun shan; ta jiang fu da di, yuding da dishang suo xu de jiyang. Zhexie shi zai si rinei jiu wanchengle, zhe shi yong lai dafu xunwen zhe de.
Ranhou, ta sheng shang tiankong, na shi tiankong haishi wu zhuang. Ta dui tiandi shuo:“Ni lia ziyuan huo mianqiang de lai [jian wo] ba!” Tiandi shuo:“Women shunfu de laile.”
Ta zai liang rinei zao chule qi ge tian, bing guidingle ge tian de renwu [zhu]. Wo yi qunxing zhuangshi zuijin de tian bing jiayi baohu. Zhe shi quanneng de, quanzhi de zhu de yuding.
Jiaru tamen beili, ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo jinggao nimen yi zhong xingfa [huimie xing de pili sheng], youru a de ren he sa mu de ren suo zaoshou de xingfa [huimie xing de pili sheng].”

Dangshi, shizhemen cong tamen de qianhou lailin tamen [shuo]:“Nimen zhi neng chongbai an la.” Tamen shuo:“Jiaru women de zhu yiyu, ta bi jiangxia tianshi. Yinci, women jue bu xiangxin nimen suo bei paiqian de shiming.”

Zhiyu a de ren, tamen ceng zai da dishang wangzizunda. Tamen shuo:“Shei bi women de shili geng qiangda ne?” Nandao tamen bu zhidao chuangzao tamen de an la bi tamen de shili geng qiangda ma? Dan tamen reng fouren wo de qishi.

Yinci, wo zai ji ge xiong ri li jiang baofeng chengfale tamen, yibian wo rang tamen changshi jinshi shenghuo zhong lingru de xingfa, dan houshi de xingfa cai shi zui lingru de,[na shi] tamen jiang de bu dao yuanzhu.

Zhiyu sa mu de ren [zhu], wo ceng yindao tamen zunxing zhengdao [yisilan jiao], dan tamen ningke zunxing mi wu, ye bu zunxing zhengdao, suoyi, lingru de xingfa [huimie xing] de pili sheng chengfale tamen, yinwei tamen cengjing zuo'e.
Wo zhengjiule xinyang bing jingwei zhe.
Zai na ri, an la de diren jiang bei jihe yu huo yu, tamen jiang denghou [bei gan wang huo yu].
Deng tamen daoda huo yu shi, tamen de ermu he pifu dou jiang dui tamen zuozheng tamen cengjing suo zuo de [zui'e].

Tamen jiang dui ziji de pifu shuo:“Nimen weisheme yao zuo bu liyu women de zhengju ne?” Pifu jiang shuo:“Shi neng shi wanwu shuohua de an la rang women shuohua de, ta zuichu chuangzaole nimen, nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu.”
Nimen yiqian meiyou fangbei nimen de ermu he pifu hui zuo bu liyu nimen de zhengju, er nimen wang cai an la bu zhidao nimen suo zuo de xuduo shi [zhu].
Nimen dui nimen de zhu de wang cai huimiele nimen, suoyi [jintian] nimen chengle sunshi zhe.
Jiaru tamen neng renshou, name, huo yu jiang shi tamen de jusuo. Jiaru tamen qiu yuanliang, name, tamen jue buneng huode yuanliang.

Wo yi [zai jinshi] wei tamen paile xuduo mi ban [emo], naxie mi ban yi tamen shengqian [zai jinshi shenghuo zhong zuo'e] he si hou [bu xinyang qingsuan he fuhuo deng] de shi mihuo tamen. Tamen ying shou xingfa de panjue, youru zai tamen zhiqian shiqu de jingling he renlei de qunti suo shou de panjue yiyang. Tamen que shi sunshi zhe.
Bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Nimen buyao qingting zhe bu “gulanjing”, nimen ying raoluan song jing sheng, yibian nimen huosheng.”
Wo bi jiang shi bu xinyang zhe changshi yanli de xingfa, wo bi jiang yi tamen suo zuo de zui huai xingwei huan bao tamen.
Na jiushi huo yu [zhu], shi an la de diren ying shou de huan bao. Tamen zai huo yu li you yongjiu de zhuzhai, zhe shi tamen fouren wo de qishi ying shou de huan bao.
Bu xinyang zhe jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni zhaoshi women jingling he renlei zhong ceng shi women mi wu zhe, women jiang ba tamen cai zai jiaoxia, rang tamen chengwei zui beijian de.”

Fan shuoguo “women de zhu shi [du yi de] an la”, ranhou zunxing zhengdao zhe, tianshimen jiang [zai tamen siwang shi] jianglin tamen [shuo]:“Nimen buyao haipa, nimen buyao youchou, nimen dang wei nimen suo bei xunuo de leyuan er gaoxing.
Zai jinshi he houshi, women dou shi nimen de haoyou. Fanshi nimen xiang yao de, nimen zai leyuan li dou ke dedao; fanshi nimen suo qiqiu de, nimen zai leyuan li dou ke dedao manzu.
[Zhe] shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de zhu suo ci de kuandai.”
Shei zai yanci fangmian bi zhe zhong ren de geng hao ne? Ta quan ren xinyang an la, li xingshan gong bing shuo:“Wo shi yige musilin.”
Shan e shi bu xiangdeng de [zhu 1]. Ni dang yidebaoyuan [zhu 2]. Ruguo zheyang, yu ni you chou zhe jiang mashang bian cheng miyou.
Wei jianren zhe caineng shou ci zhe zhong meide, wei [zai houshi] you dafu fen zhe caineng shou ci zhe zhong meide.
Ruguo emo songyong ni [bu zuo haoshi], name, ni dang qiu an la baohu [mian zao emo de qinhai]. Ta [an la] que shi quan wen de, quanzhi de.

Ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Baizhou, heiye, taiyang, yueliang. Nimen buyao koubai taiyang, ye buyao koubai yueliang, nimen dang koubai chuangzao zhexie jixiang de an la, jiaru nimen [zhen de] zhi chongbai ta [zhu].
Jiaru tamen wangzizunda [bu ken chongbai an la], name, zai ni de zhu nali de tianshimen zhouye dou zai zansong ta, tamen yong bu gandao yanjuan. Koutou chu

ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Ni kanjian dadi shi ganku de, dan dang wo jiangxia yushui shi, ta bian chongman shengji er shengzhang. Neng shi dadi fusu zhe,[fuhuo ri] bi neng shi sizhe fuhuo. Ta dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.

Fan qujie wo de qishi zhe, tamen shi man buguo wo de. Fuhuo ri, shi bei touru huo yu zhe geng hao ne? Haishi ping'an chuxian zhe geng hao? Nimen xiang zuo shenme jiu zuo shenme ba! Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, ta que shi quan shi de.

Dang jiaohui [“gulanjing”] jianglin tamen shi reng bu xinyang zhe,[an la bi chengfa tamen]. Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi yi bu ying shou zunjing de jingdian [an la baohu ta de jingdian bu bei cuangai. Jian 15:9].
Xuwang buneng cong ta de qianmian gongji ta, ye buneng cong ta de houmian gongji ta. Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi cong zui ruizhi de, shou zansong de zhu jiang shi de.
Fanshi renmen dui ni suo shuo de, dou shi zai ni zhiqian dui shizhemen shuoguo de. Ni de zhu que shi zui kuanshu de, tong cheng de.

Jiaru wo ba ta jiang shi wei fei alabo wen de “gulanjing”, name, tamen bi shuo:“Weisheme bu [yong women de yuyan] xiangxi jieshi jing wen ne? Weisheme yi bu fei alabo wen de jingdian hui jiang gei yi wei alabo ren de shizhe ne?” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing”] dui xinshimen shi yi zhong yindao he zhiliao. Zhiyu bu xinyang zhe, tamen de er shi long dun de, tamen shi kan bu dong zhe bu “gulanjing” de. Zhexie ren haoxiang shi cong yuan chu bei jiaohuan de [gu tamen ting bujian, buming li].”
Wo que yi ci gei mu sa jingdian, dan renmen dui ci you fen qi. Yao bushi ni de zhu youyanzaixian, name, tamen [de fenqi] biding bei panjuele. Tamen dui ci que shi zai yanzhong de huaiyi zhong.
Shei xingshan, shei zi shou qi yi; shei zuo'e, shei zi shou qi hai. Ni de zhu jue bu kuidai [ta de] pu renmen.

[Xuezhemen ba] fuhuo de zhishi guiyu ta [wei an la zhidao fuhuo de shijian]. Wulun shi guoshi de tuo e, haishi nuxing de huaiyun yu fenmian, meiyou ta [an la] bu zhidao de [zhu]. Zai na ri, ta jiang shenwen tamen [duoshenjiao tu]:“[Nimen suo wangyan de] wo de huobanmen [xianzai] zai nali?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Women xiang ni baogao, women zhong wu ren neng wei ci zuozheng.”
Tamen yiqian suo qiqiu de [ouxiang] paoqi tamen xiaoshile.[Xianzai] tamen faxian tamen yi wu chu ke tao [bi an la de xingfa].
Ren [bu xinyang zhe] qiu fu buyanqifan, yidan zaoyu buxing jiu huixin juewang.

Zai zaoyu buxing hou, jiaru wo shi ta changshi wo de enhui, ta bi shuo:“Zhe shi wo ying de de, wo jue bu xiangxin fuhuo de shijian hui lailin. Jishi wo bei dai dao wo de zhu nali, wo ye neng zai ta nali huode zui hao de baochou.” Wo bi jiang ba bu xinyang zhe suo zuo de gaosu tamen, wo bi jiang shi tamen changshi kuxing.
Dang wo shi en yu ren shi, ta huibi bugu; dan dang ta zaoyu buxing shi, ta you qiurao buxiu.

Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Jiaru zhe bu “gulanjing” shi cong an la nali jiang shi de, er nimen fouren ta, name, shei bi zai yaoyuan de duili zhong [bu xinyang an la, bu zunxing zhengdao] de ren geng mi wu ne?”
Wo jiang ba wo de jixiang xianshi gei tiandi wanwu, xianshi gei tamen ziji, zhidao tamen mingbai “gulanjing” que shi zhenli. Nandao ni de zhu hai bugou zuo wanwu de jianzheng zhe ma?
Xuzhi, tamen dique huaiyi jiang yu tamen de zhu xiang hui. Xuzhi, ta [an la] que shi zhouzhi wanshi wanwu de.
Ha, mi mu,
a ying, xi ni, gaofu [alabo yu wu ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Quanneng de, zui ruizhi de an la ruci qishi ni [mu sheng],[ye tongyang qishi] zai ni zhiqian de shizhemen [zhu].
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi ta de. Ta shi zhigaowushang de, zui weida de.
Tianshimen zanmei songyang tamen de zhu bing wei da dishang de ren qiu [an la] kuanshu shi, zhu tian jihu yao cong shangmian polie. Xuzhi, an la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Naxie she ta [an la] er ling xuan baohu zhe [chongbai] de ren, an la zai jianshi tamen, ni [mu sheng] bushi tamen de jianhu zhe.

Wo ruci qishi ni zhe bu alabo wen de “gulanjing”, yibian ni jinggao zhucheng zhi mu [mai jia] ji qi zhouwei de ren, yibian ni jinggao wuyi de jihe ri, na shi yibufen ren [xinshi] jiang zai leyuan zhong, ling yibufen ren [bu xinyang zhe] jiang zai [huo yu de] liehuo zhong [zhu].
Jiaru an la yiyu, ta bi shi tamen chengwei yige minzu, dan ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe jinru ta de enhui zhong. Bu yi zhe jue meiyou renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe.
Nandao tamen yao she ta [an la] er ling xuan baohu zhe [chongbai] ma?[Xuzhi] an la cai shi zhenzheng de baohu zhe. Ta neng shi sizhe sheng, ta dui wanshi shi wanneng de.
Fanshi nimen suo zhenglun de shi, ta de caijue dou gui an la. Zhe jiushi an la——wo de zhu, wo zhi xinlai ta, wo zhi gui xin ta [zhu].

[Ta shi] tiandi de chuangzao zhe, ta cong nimen ziji zhong wei nimen chuangzao pei'ou, ye cong shengchu zhong wei qi chuangzao pei'ou. Ta jie ci chuangzao nimen [yu zigong zhong]. Meiyou renhe wu yu ta [an la] xiangsi. Ta shi quan wen de, quan shi de.
Ta zhangguan tiandi de yaoshi. Ta yu shi shei fuyu, jiu shi shei fuyu; yu shi shei jiongpo, jiu shi shei jiongpo. Ta que shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.
