Ta [an la] wei nimen zhidingle [tongyang de] zongjiao [yisilan jiao], na shi ta ceng zhiding gei nu ha de, yeshi wo suo qishi ni [mu sheng] de, yiji wo suo zhiding gei yi bu la xin, mu sa he er sa de,[bing chongshen]:“Nimen dang jin shouzhengjiao [dang yi yisilan jiao jiaoyi jiaogui zuoshi], nimen buyao zai zhengjiao zhong fen zongpai. Fanshi ni [mu sheng] suo zhaohuan bai ouxiang zhe de, tamen gandao nanyu renshou. An la xuanze tasuo yiyu zhe zunxing zhengjiao, yindao gui xin [bing shuncong] zhe zunxing zheng jiao.

Zai zhishi jianglin tamen hou, youyu tamen huxiang du ji cai fen wei zongpai. Yao bushi ni de zhu youyanzaixian, yao dao yige dingqi, name, tamen zhi jian de shi biding bei panjuele. Naxie zai tamen [ru youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu] zhihou jicheng jingdian [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei”] de ren, tamen dui ci [yisilan jiao huo “gulanjing”] que shi zai yanzhong de huaiyi zhong.

Yinci, ni [mu sheng] dang zhaohuan renmen [zhu][gui xin yisilan jiao he “gulanjing”], ni dang zunxing ni suo feng dao de mingling, ni buyao shuncong tamen de siyu. Ni dang shuo:“Wo quexin an la suo jiang shi de jingdian [“gulanjing” ji an la yiqian jiang shi de suoyou jingdian], wo yi fengming zai nimen zhi jian binggong xingshi. An la shi women de zhu, yeshi nimen de zhu. Women dui women de xingwei fuze, nimen dui nimen de xingwei fuze, women he nimen zhi jian bubi zhenglun. An la jiang jihe women [dajia]. Wei ta [an la] shi zuihou de guisu.”

Zai jieshou an la de zongjiao [he mu sheng] hou reng zhenglun zhe, zai tamen de zhu [an la] kan lai, tamen de zhenglun shi hao wu jiazhi de. Tamen bi zao [an la de] qian nu, bi shou yanli de xingfa [zhu].
Shi an la jiang shile zhe bu baohan zhenli de jingdian [“gulanjing”] he tiancheng [binggong banshi]. Ni zen neng zhidao? Fuhuo de shijian yexu linjinle.

Bu xinyang fuhuo zhe yaoqiu zaori shixian ta [fuhuo], er xinyang fuhuo zhe que pa ta zaori shixian, yinwei tamen zhidao ta que shi zhenshi de. Xuzhi, fan zhenglun fuhuo de shijian zhe que shi zai shenyuan de mi wu zhong.
An la dui ta de pu renmen shi ci'ai de. Ta ci jiyang gei tasuo yiyu zhe. Ta shi zui qiang da de, quanneng de.

Shei [yin shangong] yao houshi de baochou, wo jiu zengjia shei de baochou; shei [yin shangong] yao jinshi de baochou, wo jiu gei shei yixie [yi zhuding de baochou], dan ta zai houshi jiang meiyou renhe fu fen [zhu].

Nandao tamen you xuduo [yu an la tongdeng de] huoban, naxie huoban neng wei tamen zhiding chu an la suo bu yunxu de zongjiao ma? Yao bushi yinwei panci [yi yuxian fachu], name, tamen biding bei panjuele. Bu yi zhe bi shou tongku de xingfa.

[Fuhuo ri], ni jiang kanjian bu yi zhe wei ziji suo fan de zui'e er kongju, er [an la de] xingfa you yiding yao jianglin tamen. Fan xinyang bing xingshan zhe jiang zhu zai leyuan di meijing zhong. Fanshi tamen xiang yao de, tamen zai tamen de zhu nali dou neng dedao. Zhe [leyuan] que shi zuida de enhui.

Zhe [leyuan] shi an la yong lai xiang xinyang bing xingshan de pu renmen baoxi de. Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo bu hui wei ci [xuanchuan yisilan jiao he “gulanjing”] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, chufei shi tongzu jian de you'ai.” Shei zuo yi jian shanshi, wo yao ci shei jiabei de baochou [zhu]. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, zuishan bao de.

Nandao tamen yao shuo:“Ta [mu sheng] jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan ma?” Jiaru an la yiyu, ta neng fengbi ni de xin [rang ni wangji ni suo zhidao de “gulanjing”]. An la xiaomie miuwu, bing yi ta de yanyu [“gulanjing”] zhengshi zhenli [yisilan jiao]. Ta dique quanzhi [renlei] xiongzhong de yiqie.
Ta jieshou ta de purenmen de huizui bing kuanshu zui'e [zhu]. Ta zhidao nimen suo zuo de.
Ta yingda xinyang bing xingshan zhe de qiqiu, ta zeng ci dui tamen de enhui. Bu xinyang zhe bi shou yanli de xingfa.

Jiaru an la kuoda dui ta de pu renmen de jiyang, tamen bi zai da dishang huzuofeiwei, dan ta yi dingliang [qian ding] jiangxia tasuo yiyu de jiyang. Ta dui ta de pu renmen que shi che zhi de, quan shi de.
Shi ta zai tamen juewang hou jiangxia yushui bing guang shi ta de enhui. Ta shi baohu zhe, shou zansong zhe.
Ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Tiandi de chuangzao, yiji tiandi jian suo sanbu de ge zhong dongwu.[Fuhuo ri] ta neng suiyi ba tamen jihe qilai.
Wulun nimen zaoshou he zhong buxing, dou shi youyu nimen qinshou zuo'e [de yuangu]. Ta kuanshu xuduo zui'e.
Nimen zai da dishang jue buneng taotuo [an la de chengfa], chu an la wai, nimen jue meiyou renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe.
Ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Zai haishang shan yiban [hangxing] de chuanbo.
Jiaru ta yiyu, ta neng shi feng jingzhi, rang chuanbo jing ting zai haimian shang. Dui mei ge jianren zhe he gan'en zhe, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Huozhe [jiaru ta yiyu], ta hui yin tamen suo fan de zui'e er shi naxie chuanbo chenmo. Ta kuanshu xuduo zui'e [zhu].
Fan zhenglun wo de qishi zhe,[na shi] tamen jiang zhidao tamen juedui wu chu ke tao [bi an la de chengfa].
Wulun nimen shou ci shenme [enhui], zhishi jinshi shenghuo de [duanzan] xiangshou,[houshi] zai an la nali de [leyuan] cai shi zui hao de, zui chijiu de, na shi shuyu xinshimen he xinlai an la zhe de;
yeshi shuyu yuan bi dazui he jianyin, zai fanu [zhu] shi neng yuanliang zhe de;

yeshi shuyu xiangying tamen de zhu de haozhao [ru quexin “liu da xinyang” he luxing “wuda gongxiu” deng], jin shou bai gong, gongtong xieshang tamen de shiwu, shiyong wo suo ciyu tamen de caiwu zhe de;
yeshi shuyu shou pohai er fankang zhe de.
E xing ying shou tongyang de e bao [chengfa]. Shei yuanliang bing hejie, an la bi baochou shei. Ta [an la] jue bu xihuan bu yi zhe.
Duiyu shou qiru hou er fankang zhe, zhexie ren shi wu ke zebei de.
Ying shou zebei de zhishi naxie qiru renmen bing zai da dishang manheng wuli zhe [zhu], zhexie ren bi shou tongku de xingfa.
Duiyu rennai bing yuanliang zhe, zhe zhong xingwei dique zhide tichang.
An la shi shei mi wu, cihou, shei jiu meiyou baohu zhe. Ni jiang kanjian bu yi zhe zai kanjian xingfa shi shuo:“Qingwen hai you fanhui [chenshi] de lu ma?”

Ni jiang kanjian tamen [bu yi zhe] mianlin huo yu zhi xing shi suo shou de xiuru he ditou tou kan. Xinshimen jiang shuo:“Sunshi zhe jiushi zai fuhuo ri shi tamen ziji he jiaren shou sun zhe.” Xuzhi, bu yi zhe [bu xinyang zhe] bi shou yongjiu de xingfa.
Chu an la wai, tamen jue meiyou renhe baohu zhe neng yuanzhu tamen. An la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu zoutouwulu.
Zai buke kangju zhi ri [fuhuo ri] cong an la jianglin qian, nimen dang xiangying nimen de zhu [de haozhao]. Zai na ri, nimen jiang wu chu ke tao, buneng dilai.

Jiaru tamen beiqi [yisilan jiao], name, wo meiyou pai ni [mu sheng] zuo tamen de jianhu zhe, ni de zeren zhishi [mingbai di] chuanda [qishi]. Dang wo shi ren changshi wo de enhui shi, ta jiu wei ci er xinxi; dang tamen yin tamen qinshou suo fan de zui'e er zaoyu buxing shi, ren bian chengle wang'enfuyi zhe.
Tiandi de zhuquan dou shi an la de. Ta yu chuangzao shenme, jiu chuangzao shenme; yu ci shei nuhai, jiu ci shei nuhai; yu ci shei nanhai, jiu ci shei nanhai;
huo ji ci nanhai, ye ci nuhai; yu shi shei buneng shengyu, jiu shi shei buneng shengyu. Ta que shi quanzhi de, wanneng de.

Renhe ren dou buneng yu an la zhijie duihua, chufei yi qishi huo cong muhou, huo ta paiqian yi wei shizhe [tianshi] feng ta de mingling zhaoshi ta yu qishi de [zhu]. Ta que shi zhigaowushang de, zui ruizhi de.

Wo ruci qishi ni [mu sheng] wo mingling zhong de yi xiang qishi. Ni yuanlai bing bu zhidao jingdian shi shenme? Xinyang shi shenme? Dan wo yi shi ta [“gulanjing”] chengwei guangming, jie ci yindao wo de pu ren zhong wo suo yiyu zhe zunxing zhengdao. Ni dique zhengzai yindao [renlei] zunxing zhengdao [zhu][yisilan jiao],
Na jiushi an la zhidao, tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi ta de. Xuzhi, wanshi wanwu zuizhong dou jiang gui dao an la nali qu [shoushen].
Ha, mi mu [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhi dao qi yi].
Yi zhe bu mingbai [chanming wanshi wanwu] de jingdian [“gulanjing”] fashi!
Wo que yi shi ta chengwei alabo wen de “gulanjing”, yibian nimen lijie [bing jieshou quangao].
Zai wo zheli de jingdian zhi ben [“shou baohu de xian pai”] zhong, ta [“gulanjing”] que shi gaogui de, chongman zhihui de.
Nandao yinwei nimen shi guofen [chaoyue fadu] de minzhong, wo jiu [bu jinggao nimen er] cong nimen nali shouhui jiaohui [“gulanjing”] ma?
Wo ceng zai qian ren zhong paiqianguo xuduo xianzhi.
Mei dang yi wei xianzhi lai dao tamen, tamen zong shi chaoxiao ta.
Wo ceng huimiele bi tamen [de shili] geng qiangda de [minzu], qian ren de shili yi shiqu.
Jiaru ni [mu sheng] wen tamen:“Shei chuangzaole tiandi?” Tamen bi shuo:“Quanneng de, quanzhi de zhu chuangzaole tiandi.”
Shi ta wei nimen er ba dadi zao ru chuangpu [yiyang ke yanshen], bing zai qizhong wei nimen kaipi xuduo daolu, yibian nimen huode yindao.
Shi ta cong tiankong yi dingliang jiangxia yushui, jie ci er shi kusi zhi di fusu, nimen ye jiang ruci bei quchu [fuhuo].
Shi ta wei wanwu chuangzaole pei'ou. Ta chuangzao chuanbo he shengchu gong nimen cheng qi,

yibian nimen anzuo shangmian. Nimen zuo wen hou, nimen dang zan nian nimen de zhu [an la] de enhui bing shuo:“Zanmei ta [an la] chaojue! Shi ta shi ci wu wei women fuwu, women yuan shi wuneng zuo dao de.
Women bi jiang fanhui women de zhu nali qu.”
Tamen ba ta de yixie puren dang zuo ta de yibufen [ru wangyan er sa shi “an la zhizi”, tianshi shi “an la zhi nu” deng]. Ren que shi mingxian de wang'enfuyi zhe [zhu].
Nandao ta cong ziji suo chuangzao de renlei zhong [wei ziji] xuanqu nuhai er ba nanhai rang gei nimen ma?
Tamen wangyan pu ci zhi zhu [an la] you nuhai, dan dang tamen youren huoxi [ziji de qizi] sheng nuhai de xiao xi shi, ta de lian mashang bian de yin'an, neixin chongman fennu.
[Nandao tamen yao ba] zai zhuangshi [chuan jin dai yin] zhong chang da, buneng ming bian de nuhai gui an la ma?
Tamen ba pu ci zhi zhu de pu renmen——tianshimen dang zuo nuxing. Nandao tamen jianzhengguo tamen [tianshi] de chuangzao ma? Tamen de jianzheng jiang bei jilu, tamen jiang bei shenwen.
Tamen shuo:“Jiaru pu ci zhi zhu yiyu, women jiu bu hui chongbai tamen [naxie xujia zhuzai]le.” Tamen dui ci hao wu zhishi. Tamen zong shi shuohuang.
Nandao ci [“gulanjing”] qian wo ceng ci gei tamen yi bu jingdian, rang tamen jianchi na bu jingdian [de jiaoyi jiaogui] ma?
Bu, tamen shuo:“Women faxianle women de zuxian suo zunxing de yi zhong zongjiao, women zhishi zunxing tamen de yijiao eryi.”

Tongyang, zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, mei dang wo paiqian yi wei jinggao zhe daoda yige chengshi, gai chengguo shechi shenghuo de renmen bi shuo:“Women faxianle women de zuxian suo zunxing de yi zhong zongjiao, women zhishi zunxing tamen de yijiao eryi.”

Ta [bei paiqian de jinggao zhe] shuo:“Yaoshi wo zhaoshi nimen yi zhong bi nimen faxian nimen de zuxian suo zunxing de zongjiao geng hao de ne?[Nandao nimen hai yao jixu zunxing nimen de zuxian de yijiao ma?]” Tamen shuo:“Women jue bu xiangxin nimen suo bei paiqian de shiming.”
Suoyi, wo chengfale tamen. Ni dang guancha fouren zhenli [yisilan jiao] zhe de jieju ruhe!
Dangshi, yi bu la xin dui ta de fuqin he zuren shuo:“Wo yu nimen suo chongbai de [ouxiang] que shi hao wu guanxi de,
wei chuangzao wo de zhu [an la] liwai,[wo zhi chongbai du yi de an la], ta bi jiang yindao wo [zunxing zhengdao].”
Ta [yi bu la xin] ba yongheng zhi yan [chu an la wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu] liu zeng gei ta de houyi, yibian tamen [xiang an la] huiguo.
Bu, wo yi shi zhexie ren [duoshenjiao tu] he tamen de zuxian [zai jinshi zhanshi] xiangle, zhidao zhenli [“gulanjing”] he mingbai xuanjiao de shizhe [mu sheng] lailin tamen [zhu].
Dang zhenli [“gulanjing”] jianglin tamen shi, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi moshu, women jue bu xiangxin ta.”
Tamen shuo:“Weihe zhe bu “gulanjing” bu jiang gei liang cheng [mai jia he ta yi fu] zhong de yi wei yao ren ne?”

Nandao tamen yao fenpei ni de zhu de enhui ma? Wo ba tamen zai jinshi shenghuo zhong de shengji fen gei tamen, bing shi tamen yibufen ren gao yu ling yibufen ren xuduo pinji, yibian tamen yibufen ren guyong ling yibufen ren gongzuo. Ni de zhu de enhui [leyuan] bi tamen [zai jinshi] suo juji de [caifu] geng hao [zhu].
Yao bushi pa renlei chengwei yige tuanti, wo bi shi bu xin pu ci zhi zhu [an la] zhe de fangwu bian cheng yin ding yin ti de, yibian tamen denglin er shang;
bing shi tamen de fangwu bian cheng yin men yin yi de, tamen kekao zai yin yi shang [xiangle];
[bing shi tamen de fangwu bian cheng] jin [zhu] shi de. Dan suoyou zhexie zhishi jinshi shenghuo de [duanzan] xiangshou. Zai ni de zhu nali de houshi shi shuyu jingwei zhe de.
Shei hushi zan nian pu ci zhi zhu [ru hushi chongbai du yi de an la deng], wo jiu wei ta zhiding yige emo, rang na emo zuo ta de tongban.
Naxie emo biding fang'ai tamen zunxing an la zhi dao, er tamen que yiwei tamen ziji cai shi zunxing zhengdao zhe.
Deng ta [hushi zan nian pu ci zhi zhu zhe] lai dao wo zheli shi, ta [jiang dui ta de mo ban] shuo:“Yaoshi ni wo zhi jian you dongxi fang de juli zhang duo hao a! Ni zhege tongban zhen elie!”
[Ranhou, you hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Yinwei nimen ceng xing bu yi, gu jintian [houhui] dui nimen shi wuyi de, nimen bi jiang tong shou xingfa.”
Nandao ni [mu sheng] neng shi longzi tingjian? Haishi ni neng yindao xiazi he zai mingxian de mi wu zhong de ren ne?
Jishi wo rang ni [mu sheng] likai chenshi, wo ye biding yao chengfa tamen.
Huozhe wo shi ni kanjian wo suo jinggao tamen de xingfa, wo dique yeyou nengli chengzhi tamen.
Ni dang jianchi yi qishi ni de jingdian [zhu][“gulanjing”], ni que shi zai zhengdao shang de.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi dui ni he ni de zuren de jiaohui, nimen jianglai yao bei shenwen [ci jing].
Ni dang xunwen zai ni zhiqian wo suo paiqian de shizhemen, wo zai pu ci zhi zhu [an la] wai gei tamen zhidingguo renhe ke gong chongbai de shenling ma?
Wo que yi paiqian mu sa daizhe wo de jixiang qu jiaohua falao ji qi shoulingmen, ta [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo que shi zhong shijie zhi zhu paiqian de shizhe.”
Dang ta daizhe wo de jixiang lai dao tamen shi, tamen turan chaoxiao naxie jixiang.
Wo suo zhaoshi tamen de jixiang, yige bi yige da. Wo yi xingfa chengzhile tamen, yibian tamen gui xin [yisilan jiao].
Tamen [dui mu sa] shuo:“Moshu shi a! Qing ni wei women qiqiu ni de zhu ba![Rang ta wei women jiechu xingfa], yinwei ta ceng xunuo ni, women yiding zunxing zhengdao.”
Dan dang wo wei tamen jiechu xingfa shi, tamen mashang jiu weiyuele.
Falao xiang ta de renmin xuangao shuo:“Wo de renmin a! Nandao aiji de wangquanbushi wo de ma? Nandao cong wo xiamian liuguo de zhexie heliu bushi wo de ma? Nandao nimen kan bujian ma?
Nandao wo bubi zhege beijian er biaoda bu qing de ren [mu sa] geng hao ma?[Mu sa bu shanyu ciling. Jian 28:34].
Weisheme ta meiyou shou ci jin shouzhuo ne? Huozhe wei shen me tianshimen butong ta yiqi jianglin ne?”
Ta [falao] yunong ta de renmin, er tamen ye fucong ta, tamen que shi beini de minzhong.
Dang tamen chunu wo shi, wo chengfale tamen, wo ba tamen quan bu yan sile [zhu].
Wo shi tamen chengwei hou ren de yige jiaoxun he jianjie.
Dang ma'er ya zhizi [er sa] bei zuowei lizi [ru jidu jiaotu ba er sa dang zuo zhuzai chongbai] yinzheng shi, ni de zuren mashang wei ci er chaonao.
Tamen shuo:“Shi women [chongbai] de xuduo shenling geng hao ne? Haishi ta [er sa] geng hao?” Tamen xiang ni ju chu ci li zhi weile qiangciduoli. Bu, tamen shi qiangbian de minzhong.
Ta [er sa] zhishi [wo de] yige puren. Wo ci gei ta enhui bing shi ta chengwei yiselie de houyi de yige jianjie [ru er sa bu xiang fanren yiyang you fuqin].
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo bi [huimie nimen er] chuangzao tianshi zai dadishang daiti nimen.
Ta [er sa] que shi fuhuo [lailin] shi de zhengzhao [zhu][er sa jianglin da di], suoyi, nimen dui ci [fuhuo ri] buke huaiyi, nimen dang shuncong wo [an la], zhe shi zhengdao.
Jue buyao rang emo fang'ai nimen [zunxing zhengdao]. Emo que shi nimen mingxian de diren [zhu].

Dang er sa daizhe mingzheng jianglin shi, ta shuo:“Wo que yi gei nimen dai laile zhihui [yuyan], wo jiang wei nimen chanming nimen suo fenqi de yixie shi, suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
An la que shi wo de zhu, ye que shi nimen de zhu, suoyi, nimen dang chongbai ta, zhe shi zhengdao [yisilan jiao].”
Dan tamen ge pai yijian fenqi. Bu yi zhe jiang zao tongku zhi ri de chengfa zhen huogai!
Tamen zhi dengdai fuhuo de shijian zai tamen buzhi bu jue shi turan jianglin tamen.
Zai na ri, chu jingwei zhe wai, pengyou jiang bici chengwei choudi.
[Zai na ri, you hua sheng dui xinshimen shuo]:“Wo de pu renmen a! Jintian, nimen meiyou kongju, meiyou youchou;
nimen shi chengxin wo de qishi bing guishun zhe;
nimen he nimen de qizi yukuai di jinru leyuan ba!”
Zai nali, jin pan he jinbei jiang chuandi gei tamen; zai nali, youxin xiang yao de, you yan xiang kan de [zhu].[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen yong ju qizhong [leyuan] ba!
Zhe shi nimen yi nimen [zai chenshi] suo zuo shangong er jicheng de leyuan.
Zai nali, nimen jiang huode ge zhong shuiguo, gong nimen [suiyi] chi.”
Fanzui zhe bi jiang yong juyu huo yu de xingfa zhong.
Tamen suo shou de xingfa bu hui bei jianqing, tamen zai qizhong shi juewang de [huihen de, aiqi de].
Wo meiyou kuidai tamen, er shi tamen duo xing bu yi.
Tamen jiang jiaohan:“Malike [huo yu de zhangguan zhe] a! Qiu ni de zhu chujue women ba!” Ta jiang shuo:“Nimen bi jiang yong ju qizhong.”
Wo que yi zhaoshi nimen zhenli [mu sheng he “gulanjing”], dan nimen da duoshu ren yanwu zhenli.
Nandao tamen mimoule yi jian shi ma? Wo jiang yong jimou [duifu tamen].
Nandao tamen renwei wo ting bujian tamen de mimi he mimou ma? Bu![Wo juedui neng tingjian], wo de tianshimen jiu zai tamen pangbian jilu [zhu].

Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Jiaru pu ci zhi zhu [xiang nimen suo wangyan di nayang] you ernu, name, wo shi an la de di yige chongbai zhe [wo shi di yi ge xinyang an la du yi zhe, wo zuozheng ta jue meiyou ernu].”
Zanmei tiandi de zhu——baozuo zhi zhu [an la] chaojue! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
Ni rang tamen wang tan qule ba! Zhidao tamen zaoyu tamen suo bei jinggao de rizi [fuhuo ri].
Zai tianshang, ta [an la] shi weiyi ying shou chongbai de; zai dishang, ta yeshi weiyi ying shou chongbai de. Ta shi zui ruizhi de, quanzhi de.
Zansong ta [an la] zhifu! Ta zhangguan tiandi wanwu de zhuquan. Wei ta zhidao fuhuo de shijian, nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu.
Tamen she ta [an la] er qiqiu de [ouxiang] wu quan [ti tamen] qiuqing, wei yi zhenli zuozheng zhe [xinyang bing fucong du yi de an la zhe] liwai, yinwei zhexie ren shi zhidao zhenxiang de.
Jiaru ni [mu sheng] wen tamen shei chuangzaole tamen? Tamen bi shuo:“An la”. Tamen weihe hai yao beili zhenli ne?
Ta [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Zhexie ren que shi bu xinyang de minzhong.”
Ni [mu sheng] dang yuanliang tamen bing [dui tamen] shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an!” Tamen bujiu jiang zhidao.[Zhe jie jing wenxi ting yong de jing wen, bei di 9 zhang di 5 jie “yunxu zhanzheng” suo qudai].
Ha, mi mu [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Yi zhe bu mingbai [chanming wanshi wanwu] de jingdian [“gulanjing”] fashi!
Wo dique zai yi ge jiqing zhi ye [zhaiyue de gai de'er ye, jian di 97 zhang] jiang shi ta [“gulanjing”], wo yizhi zai jinggao [renlei, fan bu xinyang an la du yi zhe bi zao yancheng].
Zai nage yeli, yiqie zhuding de shi dou yi panding [ru shengsi zainan deng].
Na shi you wo banbu de yi xiang mingling, wo que shi chang paiqian shizhe de;
na shi cong ni de zhu jiang shi de yi xiang enhui. Ta que shi quan wen de, quanzhi de.
[Na shi cong] tiandi wanwu de zhu [an la] jiang shi de, jiaru nimen duxin.
Chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Ta neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si.[Ta shi] nimen de zhu, yeshi nimen zuxian de zhu.
Qishi, tamen shi zai huaiyi zhong qule de.
Ni dang dengdai tiankong chuxian mingxian yanwu [zhu] di na ri,
na yanwu jiang longzhao renlei, zhe shi yi zhong tongku de xingfa.
[Bei yanwu longzhao zhe jiang shuo]:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni wei women jiechu xingfa ba! Women zhen de xinyangle.”
[Xingfa yi jianglin tamen, ci shi] tamen zen neng huode quangao [de yichu] ne? You wei mingbai xuanjiao de shizhe [mu sheng] que yi lailin tamen,
er tamen que beili ta [mu sheng]. Tamen shuo:“[Ta shi] yi wei shouguo chuanshou de fengzi.”
Wo jiang zhanshi jiechu xingfa, er nimen ye jiang yuanxing bilu [huifu panni].
Dang wo jinxing da tuxi di na ri, wo bi jiang yancheng [tamen].
Wo que yi zai tamen zhiqian kaoyanguo falao de renmin, na shi you wei zungui de shizhe [mu sa] yi lailin tamen.
[Mu sa shuo]:“Nimen ba an la de pu renmen [yiselie de houyi] jiao gei wo ba! Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe.
Nimen buyao dui an la gao'ao, wo dique gei nimen dai laile mingzheng.
Wo qiu wo de zhu, yeshi nimen de zhu baohu, mian zao nimen shi ji wo [zhu].
Jiaru nimen bu xiangxin wo, nimen ke likai wo.”
[Dan tamen tiaoxin ta], yushi ta [mu sa] qiqiu ta de zhu [shuo]:“Zhexie ren que shi fanzui de minzhong.”
[An la shuo]:“Ni daizhe wo de pu renmen zai yejian chuzou ba! Yinwei nimen bi jiang bei [falao de jundui] zhuigan.
Ni rang haishui pingjing [fenkai] ba! Tamen kending shi yao bei yan si de jundui.”
Tamen [falao de renmin] liu xiale duoshao guoyuan, quanyuan,
tiandi he haozhai,
yiji tamen xiangshouguo de xingfu shenghuo!
Qi jieguo shi: Wo shi qita minzhong jichengle tamen [zhu][ru an la shi yiselie de houyi jichengle aiji de wangquan].
Tiandi meiyou wei tamen kuqi, tamen ye bu bei huanxing.
Wo que yi zhengjiu yiselie de houyi tuoli falao lingru de xingfa. Ta que shi aoman guofen de.
[Mu sa shidai] wo que yi ping zhenzhi xuanze tamen [yiselie de houyi] you yu shiren.
Wo ceng ciyu tamen xuduo jixiang, qizhong you yici mingxian de kaoyan.
Zhexie ren [gu lai shen ren] bi jiang shuo:
“Women zhiyou di yi ci de siwang, women jue bu hui bei fuhuo.
Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe,[xianzai] nimen jiu ba women [yi gu] de zuxian zhaohui lai [fuhuo] ba!”
Shi tamen geng hao ne? Haishi tu ba de zuren he tamen de qian ren geng hao? Wo huimiele tamen, yinwei tamen que shi fanzui zhe.
Wo chuangzao tiandi wanwu bingfei erxi.
Wo zhi yi zhenli [jianyan shei shi shuncong an la zhe, shei shi weikang an la zhe; baochou shuncong zhe, chengfa weikang zhe] chuangzao tiandi, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Panjue ri que shi wei tamen quanti guiding de shijian.
Zai na ri, qinyou dui qinyou hao wu yichu, tamen ye de bu dao renhe yuanzhu,
wei an la ci min zhe liwai [zhu]. Ta [an la] que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
[Huo yu li] zan gumu shu de guozi,
que shi zuiren de shiwu,
xiang tong shui yiyang zai [tamen de] fu zhong feiteng,
xiang feishui yiyang feiteng.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Nimen zhua zhu ta, ba ta tuo ru huo yu de zhongyang,
ranhou, nimen ba feishui de xingfa jiao zai ta de tou shang.
Ni changshi [zhe zhong xingfa] ba! Ni [zai chenshi shi] shi duome wangzizunda, duome fugui!
Zhe jiushi nimen [zai chenshi shi] suo huaiyi de [xingfa].”
Jingwei zhe bi zhu zai anquan di difang [leyuan]:
Leyuan he quanshui pang,
tamen chuan de shi jinxiu sichou, yingmian er zuo.
Qi jieguo shi: Wo shi baijing mei mu xianshu di meinu zuo tamen de qizi.
Tamen zai leyuan li jiang anquan de suoqu ge zhong shuiguo.
Chu [chenshi] di yi ci de siwang wai, tamen zai leyuan li jiang bu zai changshi siwang. Ta [an la] jiang baohu tamen mian shou huo yu de xingfa [zhu].
Zhe shi cong ni de zhu jiang shi de enhui, zhe que shi weida de chenggong.
Wo dique yi ni de yuyan shi zhe bu “gulanjing” chengwei yi dong de, yibian tamen jieshou quangao.
Ni [mu sheng] dang dengdai, tamen dique ye zai dengdai.
Ha, mi mu [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] shi cong quanneng de, zui ruizhi de an la jiang shi de.
Dui xinshimen, tiandi jian que you xuduo jixiang.
Zai nimen de chuangzao zhong, yiji ta [zai dadishang] sanbu de ge zhong dongwu zhong, dui duxin de minzhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Zhouye de lunliu, an la cong tiankong jiangxia jiyang [yushui], jie ci er shi kusi de da di fusu, yiji fengxiang de gaibian, dui neng mingli de minzhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Zhexie shi an la de jixiang, wo yi zhenli xiang ni [mu sheng] xuandu. Zai [fouren] an la he ta de jixiang hou, tamen yao xinyang shenme yanci ne?
Mei ge zaoyao zhe, fanzui zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!

Dang ta [zaoyao zhe, fanzui zhe] tingjian youren xiang ta songdu an la de qishi shi, ta jiu aoman de guzhi jijian, haoxiang ta meiyou tingjian yiyang, ni dang xiang ta xuanbu [ta bi shou] tongku de xingfa.
Mei dang ta liaojie wo de yixie qishi [“gulanjing”] shi, ta jiu ba ta dang xiaobing. Zhexie ren bi shou lingru de xingfa.

Zai tamen de qianmian [he houmian dou] you huo yu [zhu], tamen suo zuo de yiqie jiang dui tamen hao wu yichu, tamen she an la er xuan bai de baohu zhe dui tamen ye jiang hao wu yichu. Tamen jiang shou zhongda de xingfa.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi zhinan, bu xinyang tamen de zhu de qishi zhe, tamen jiang shou tongku de chengfa.
Shi an la shi dahai wei nimen fuwu, yibian chuanbo feng ta de mingling hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen gan'en.
Shi ta shi tiandi wanwu wei nimen fuwu. Dui neng sikao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

Ni [mu sheng] dang dui xinshimen shuo: Tamen ying raoshu naxie [shanghaiguo tamen er] bu xiwang an la de rizi [ru baoying ri] lailin de renmen, yibian ta [an la] yin youxie minzhong suo zuo de [zui'e] huan bao tamen [ru chengfa shanghai xinshimen de ren].
Shei xingshan, shei zi shou qi yi; shei zuo'e, shei zi shou qi hai. Ranhou, nimen dou jiang gui dao nimen de zhu nali qu.
Wo que yi ci gei yiselie de houyi jingdian, zhihui [lijie jingdian de zhishi] he sheng pin, bing gongji tamen jiamei zhi wu, shi tamen [zai dangshi] you yu shiren.

Wo [yi jiang shi tamen “tao la te” bing] ci gei tamen guanyu ci shi de mingzheng. Zai zhishi jianglin tamen hou, youyu tamen huxiang jidu [zhu] cai chansheng fenqi. Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu bi jiang panjue tamen suo fenqi de.
Ranhou, wo shi ni [mu sheng] zunxing guanyu ci shi de yige mingdao [yisilan jiao de jiaoyi jiaogui], suoyi, ni dang zunxing ci mingdao, ni buyao shuncong wu zhi zhe de siyu.
[Jiaru an la yu chengfa ni], tamen [wu zhi zhe] jue buneng zhu ni diyu an la de renhe xingfa. Bu yi zhe bi jiang hu wei baohu zhe. An la shi jingwei zhe de baohu zhe.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi ji renlei de mingzheng, shi gei duxin de minzhong de yindao he ci min.
Nandao zuo'e zhe renwei, wo duidai tamen yu duidai xinyang bing xingshan zhe shi yiyang de, ji duidai tamen de shengqian si hou shi yiyang de ma [zhu]? Tamen suo panduan de zhen elie!
An la yi zhenli chuangzao tiandi, yibian mei ren dou yin ziji suo zuo de er shou baochou, tamen jiang bu shou kuidai [zhu].

Ni jianguo ba ziji de siyu dang shenling chongbai de ren ma? An la mingzhi er shi ta mi wu, fengbile ta de tingjue he xin [siwei], bing zai ta de yan shang mengle yi ceng mo. Zai an la zhihou, shei hai neng yindao ta ne? Nandao nimen hai bu juewu ma?
Tamen shuo:“Chule women jinshi de shenghuo wai, zai mei bie dele, women si, women sheng, zhiyou shiguang [zhu] neng huimie women.” Tamen dui ci [fuhuo] hao wuzhishi, tamen zhishi wang cai.
Dang youren xiang tamen songdu wo de mingbai de qishi shi, tamen de zhenglun zhishi shuo:“Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe,[xianzai] nimen jiu ba women [yi gu] de zuxian zhaohui lai [fuhuo] ba!”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“An la shi nimen sheng, ranhou you shi nimen siwang, zuihou, ta jiang zai wuyi de fuhuo ri jihe nimen, dan da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.”
Tiandi de zhuquan dou shi an la de. Fuhuo de shijian lailin zhi ri, zai na ri, zhuisui miuwu zhe bi sunshi.

[Zai na ri] ni jiang kanjian mei ge minzu dou shi quxi de, mei ge minzu dou bei zhao qu kan ziji de gongguo bu.[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Jintian, nimen jiang yin nimen [zai chenshi] suo zuo de er shou baochou.”
Zhe shi wo sheli de gongguo bu, ta jiang ju shi shuo gei nimen, wo [de tianshimen] yi ba nimen suo zuo de jilu xialai.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, tamen de zhujiang shi tamen jinru ta de enhui zhong. Zhe que shi mingxian de chenggong.
Zhiyu bu xinyang zhe,[you hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nandao meiyouren xiang nimen songduguo wo de qishi ma? Dan nimen jiao'ao zi da, nimen shi fanzui de minzhong [zhu].”

Dang you ren [dui nimen] shuo “an la de xunuo que shi zhenshi de, fuhuo de shijian que shi wuyi de” shi, nimen queshuo:“Women bu zhidao fuhuo de shijian shi shenme, women renwei na zhishi caixiang, women bing bu zhenxin.”
Tamen suo zuo de e xingjiang xianlu gei tamen, tamen suo chaoxiao de [xingfa] jiang baowei zhu tamen.
You hua sheng shuo:“Jintian, wo jiang wangji nimen, youru nimen ceng wangji nimen jintian de xiang hui yiyang. Nimen de guisu shi huo yu, nimen jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.

Zhe shi yinwei nimen ceng ba an la de qishi [“gulanjing”] dang xiaobing, jinshi shenghuo qipianle nimen.” Jintian, tamen jiang bu hui bei fangchu huo yu [zhu] qu, ye bude zai qiu zhu en [ru chong fan chenshi, xiang an la huizui, qiu an la kuanshu deng].
Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——zhu tian de zhu, dadi de zhu, zhong shijie de zhu.
Tiandi jian de zuigao quanli quan gui ta. Ta shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.
Ha, mi mu [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] shi cong quanneng de, zui ruizhi de an la jiang shi de.
Wo zhi yi zhenli he dingqi chuangzao tiandi wanwu. Buxinyang zhe beiqile tamen suo bei jinggao de [xingfa].

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen she an la er qiqiu de [ouxiang], nimen zhi gei wo kan ba! Tamen chuangzaole dadi de na yibufen ne? Haishi tamen zeng shen yu zhu tian de chuangzao? Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe, nimen na chu yi bu ci [“gulanjing”] qian yi jiang shi de jingdian lai, huo yixie cancun de zhishi [zhengju] lai [zhichi nimen de wangyan] ba!”
Tamen she an la er qiqiu zhidao fuhuo ri ye buneng yingda tamen, erqie hushi tamen de qidao de ou xiang, shei bi zhe zhong ren geng mi wu ne?
[Fuhuo ri], dang renlei bei jihe qilai shi, tamen [naxie ou xiang] jiang bian cheng tamen de choudi, bing fouren tamen [dui tamen] de chongbai.
Dang youren xiang tamen songdu wo de mingbai de qishi shi, bu xinyang zhe wangyan yi jiang shi tamen de zhenli [“gulanjing”] shi shuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.”

Tamen hai shuo:““Gulanjing” shi ta [mu sheng] weizao de.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Jiaru wo [mu sheng] weizao “gulanjing”, name, nimen jue buneng zhu wo diyu an la de renhe xingfa. Ta zui zhidao nimen ruhe wangyan ta [zhu][“gulanjing”]. Ta [an la] zuyi zuo wo he nimen zhi jian de jianzheng zhe! Ta shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.”

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo bushi yi wei xin yi de shizhe [wo bushi di yi wei bei paiqian de shizhe], wo bu zhidao wo jiang zaoyu shenme, ye bu zhidao nimen jiang zaoyu shenme. Wo zhi zunxing wo suo feng dao de qishi, wo zhishi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Jiaru zhe bu “gulanjing” shi cong an la jiang shi de, nimen fouren ta, eryiselie de houyi zhong you wei zhengren [ru abu du la•ben•se lia mu] keyi zuozheng zhe bu “gulanjing” tong ta [“tao la te”] shi yiyang de [shi cong an la jiang shi de jingdian], bingqie ta [abu du la•ben•se lia mu] yijing xinyangle [ji gui xin yisilan jiao], er nimen que aoman bu xin. An la jue bu yindao bu yi de minzhong.”

Bu xinyang zhe [qiang zhe he fu ren] wang lun xinshimen [ruozhe he qiongren] shi shuo:“Jiaru ta [mu sheng zhaohuan renlei gui xin de yisilan jiao] shi yi jian haoshi, name, tamen [xinshimen] bu keneng zai women zhiqian shouxian xinfeng ta.” Tamen meiyou yinci [“gulanjing”] er zunxing zhengdao. Tamen shuo:“Zhe shi chenjiu de huangyan.”

Zai ci [“gulanjing”] zhiqian, mu sa de jingdian ke zuo [renlei de] zhinan he enhui. Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi yi bu alabo wen de jingdian, neng zhengshi yiqian de jingdian, yibian ta jinggao bu yi zhe, bing xiang xingshan zhe baoxi.
Fan shuoguo “women de zhu shi an la”, ranhou zunxing zhengdao [yisilan jiao] zhe, kongju bu hui jianglin tamen, tamen ye bu youchou.
Zhexie ren shi leyuan de jumin,[tamen jiang] yong ju qizhong,[zhe shi] dui tamen suo zuo shangong de baochou.

Wo yi ming ren dang xiaojing fumu [zhu]. Ta de muqin jiannan de huai ta, tongku di sheng ta. Cong huai ta dao duan ru xuyao sanshi ge yue. Dang ta zhang dao chengnian, dao sishi sui shi, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni ci wo liliang, yibian wo ganxie ni suo shi yu wo he wo fumu de enhui, yibian wo zuo ni suo xiyue de shanxing. Qiu ni shi wo de houyi xingshan. Wo que yi xiang ni huiguo, wo que yi guishun ni.”
Zhexie ren, wo jiang jieshou tamen suo zuo de zui hao shangong, wo jiang shemian tamen de zui'e,[tamen jiang] shi leyuan de jumin. Zhe shi tamen suo bei xunuo de zhenshi nuoyan.

Er youren ze dui ziji de fumu shuo:“Pei! Ni lia hai yao xunuo wo ma? Wo [si hou] hai yao bei fuhuo ma [zhu]? Zai wo zhiqian, you xuduo shidai que yi shiqu,[tamen zenme bu bei fuhuo ne?]” Ta lia [na ren de fumu] qiu an la xiangzhu [bing zhize ta lia de erzi shuo]:“Gaisi de! Ni xinyang [an la] ba! An la de nuoyan que shi zhenshi de.” Dan ta shuo:“Zhe zhishi qian ren de fengsu xiguan er yi.”
Zhexie ren ying shou xingfa de panjue, tamen jiang jinru zai tamen zhiqian shiqu de jingling he renlei de qunti zhong, tamen que shi sunshi zhe.
Mei ren dou jiang yin ziji suo zuo de er huode xuduo pinji, yibian ta [an la] yi tamen de xingwei baochou tamen, tamen jiang bu shou kuidai.

Bu xinyang zhe bei dai wang huo yu shouxing zhi ri,[you hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen zai chenshi shenghuo zhong yi ba nimen de fu fen xiang jin haojie. Jintian, nimen jiang shou lingru de xingfa, yinwei nimen ceng zai da dishang wangzizunda, yinwei nimen ceng beini [weikang an la zhi ming].”

Ni dang laoji a de ren de xiongdi [hu de shengren]. Dangshi, ta zai shaqiu [alabo bandao nanbu wanqu de shaqiu bufen] jinggao ta de zuren——zai ta zhiqian he zhihou, xuduo jinggao zhe que yi shiqu——[shuo]:“Nimen zhi neng chongbai an la [zhu], wo dique pa nimen zaoshou zhongda zhi ri de xingfa.”
Tamen shuo:“Nandao ni lai women zheli, shi weile zuzhi women chongbai women de shenlingmen ma? Jiaru ni shi chengshi zhe, ni ba ni suo neng konghe women de [xingfa] xianshi gei women ba!”
Ta shuo:“Wei an la zhidao zhege [xingfa jianglin de] zhishi, wo zhi neng xiang nimen chuanda wo bei paiqian de shiming, dan wo renwei nimen shi wuzhi de minzhong.”

Dang tamen kanjian xingfa xiang nong yun yiyang chao tamen de shangu piao lai shi, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi yipian yao jiangyu gei women de yun.” Bu, zhe shi nimen yaoqiu zaori shixian de bansui tongku xingfa de kuangfeng,
ta feng ta de zhu de mingling huimie yiqie. Zaochen, chu tamen de fangwu [de feixu] wai, shenme ye kan bujian [quan bei huimiele]. Wo ruci huan bao fanzui de minzhong.

[Gu lai shen ren a!] Wo que yi ba wo meiyou ciyu nimen di diwei ciyu tamen. Wo ciyu tamen er [tingjue] mu [shijue] xin [siwei], dan tamen de ermu xin dui tamen hao wu yichu, yinwei tamen fouren an la de qishi, suoyi, tamen suo chaoxiao de [xingfa] baowei zhu tamenle [zhu].
Wo que yi huimiele nimen zhouwei de chengshi [de renmin]. Wo fanfu zhaoshi [tamen] wo de qishi, yibian tamen fanhui [yisilan jiao].

Tamen she an la er xuan bai qita shenling, yi zuo jiejin [an la] de meijie, weisheme naxie shenling bu yuanzhu tamen ne? Bu, tamen paoqi tamen bujianle. Zhe shi tamen de yaoyan, shi tamen [bei huimie qian] suo niezao de huangyan.

Dangshi, wo ceng pai yi huo [san zhi shi ge] jingling dao ni [mu sheng] nali qingting “gulanjing”. Dang tamen lai dao song jing chu shi, tamen [huxiang] shuo:“Dajia jing ting ba!” Songdu wanbi shi, tamen bian huiqu jinggao tamen de zuren.

Tamen shuo:“Women de zuren a! Women que yi tingjian yi bu zai mu sa zhihou jiang shi de jingdian [zhu][“gulanjing”], ta neng zhengshi ciqian jiang shi de [suoyou] jingdian, ta yindao [renlei] zhi zhenli he zhengdao [yisilan jiao].
Women de zuren a! Nimen dang xiangying an la de haozhao zhe [mu sheng], dang xiangxin [bing zhuisui] ta [mu sheng]. Ta [an la] jiang kuanshu nimen de zuiguo, bing jiejiu nimen tuoli tongku de xingfa.
Shei bu xiangying an la de haozhao zhe [mu sheng], shei zai da dishang jue buneng taotuo [an la de chengfa], chu ta [an la] wai, ta jue meiyou baohu zhe. Zhexie ren shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
Nandao tamen bu zhidao chuangzao tiandi er bu pijuan de an la neng shi sizhe fuhuo ma? Dique neng [shi sizhe fuhuo]. Ta dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.

Bu xinyang zhe bei dai wang huo yu shouxing zhi ri.[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nandao zhe bushi zhenshi de ma?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Shi zhenshi de, yi women de zhu fashi!” Ta jiang shuo:“Nimen changshi xingfa ba! Yinwei nimen [zai chenshi] bu xinyang.”

Ni [mu sheng] dang jianren, youru you juexin de shizhemen yiyang jianren, ni buyao yaoqiu zaori shixian dui tamen [bu xinyang zhe] de xingfa. Dang tamen kanjian tamen suo bei jinggao de xingfa di na ri,[tamen jiang faxian] tamen haoxiang zhi [zai chenshi] tingliule yi ri de pianke.[Renmen a! Zhe bu “gulanjing” zuyi zuo] yi zhong xuangao. Wei beini de minzhong cai hui bei huimie.
Fan bu xinyang bing fang'ai renmen zunxing an la zhi dao [yisilan jiao] zhe, ta [an la] jiang shi tamen de shangong tulao.

Fan xinyang bing xingshan, qie xinyang jiang shi gei muhanmode de jingdian [“gulanjing”] zhe——na bu jingdian shi cong tamen de zhu [an la] jiang shi de zhenli, ta [an la] jiang shemian tamen de zuiguo bing gaishan tamen de zhuangkuang [zhu].
Zhe shi yin wei bu xinyang zhe zhuisui xuwang, er xinshimen ze zunxing cong tamen de zhu jiang shi de zhenli. An la ruci wei renlei shele xuduo biyu.

Dang nimen [zai zhanchang shang] yu dao bu xinyang zhe shi, dang zhan sha tamen de tou bu. Dang nimen shi tamen shangwang can chong shi, nimen dang fulu tamen. Cihou ke shifang tamen, huo rang tamen jiao shujin, zhidao zhanzheng xie xia zhongdan. Shishi jiushi zheyang [an la mingling nimen jixu zhandou, zhidao bu xinyang zhe gui xin yisilan jiao]. Jiaru an la yiyu, ta bi chengfa tamen. Dan [ta rang nimen qu zhandou], wei de shi rang nimen huxiang kaoyan. Fan wei an la zhidao zhenwang zhe, ta [an la] jue bu shi tamen de shangong tulao [zhu].
Ta jiang yindao tamen bing gaishan tamen de zhuangkuang.
Ta jiang shi tamen jinru tamen suo shuzhi de leyuan [tamen dui leyuan de zhuzhai bi dui chenshi de zhuzhai hai shuxi].
Xinshimen a! Jiaru nimen yuanzhu an la zhidao, ta bi xiangzhu nimen, bing shi nimen bufa wending.
Bu xinyang zhe, dengdai tamen de zhiyou huimie, ta bi shi tamen de shangong tulao.
Zhe shi yinwei tamen yanwu an la suo jiang shi de jingdian [“gulanjing”], suoyi, ta bi shi tamen de shangong tulao.
Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing, guancha tamen qian ren de jieju ruhe ma? An la huimiele tamen. Bu xinyang zhe bi you tongyang [zhuding] de jieju.
Zhe shi yin wei an la shi xinshimen de baohu zhe [zhuzai], bu xinyang zhe jue meiyou baohu zhe.
An la bi jiang shi xinyang bing xingshan zhe jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan. Bu xinyang zhe [zai jinshi] suo xiangshou de, tamen chi de rutong shengchu suo chi de. Huo yu jiang shi tamen de guisu.
You xuduo chengshi [de renmin],[tamen de] shili bi quzhu ni [mu sheng] di nage chengshi [mai jia] de geng qiangda, dan wo huimiele tamen, tamen jue meiyou yuanzhu zhe.
Zunxing cong ta de zhu jiang shi de mingzheng zhe, yu bei ziji de e xing mihuo bing shuncong ziji de siyu zhe shi yiyang de ma?

Xunuo gei jingwei zhe de leyuan [zhu] de qingjing shi: Leyuan li you yong bu bianzhi de shui he, you yong bu bianwei de ru he, you yin zhe gandao weimei de xian jiu he, you chunjing de mi he. Tamen zai leyuan li ke huode ge zhong shuiguo he cong tamen de zhu jiang shi de kuanshu. Zhexie yong ju leyuan zhe yu naxie yong ju huo yu bing bei po chang yin duanchang feishui zhe shi yiyang de ma?

Tamen zhong you qingting ni [mu sheng] de, deng tamen likai ni shi, tamen you dui shou ci zhishi zhe shuo:“Ta [mu sheng] gangcai shuole xie shenme?” Zhexie ren, an la yi fengbile tamen de xin, tamen zhi shuncong ziji de siyu.
Zhiyu zunxing zhengdao zhe, ta [an la] jiang zengjia dui tamen de yindao, jiang ba qianjing de baochou ciyu tamen.

Tamen [bu xinyang zhe] zhi dengdai fuhuo de shijian turan jianglin tamen, qishi, fuhuo de yixie zhengzhao que yi lailin. Dang fuhuo de shijian zhen de jianglin tamen shi, na shi tamen de xingwu dui tamen you he yichu ne?

Ni [mu sheng] dang zhidao, chu an la wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu [zhu]. Ni dang qiu zhu kuanshu ni de guoshi, ye ying qiu zhu kuanshu nannu xinshimen [de guoshi]. An la zhidao nimen huodong di difang he jusuo.

Xinshimen shuo:“Weisheme meiyou jiang shi yi zhang [“gulanjing”] jing wen [gei women] ne?” Danshi, dang yi zhang mingshi de jing wen jiang shi, qizhong ti dao shengzhan [ding wei zhuming] shi, ni jiang kanjian xinzhong you bing zhe [wei xinzhe] yi lin si shi hun yun zhe de yanguang kanzhe ni, zhe dui tamen [wei xinzhe] shi zui hao de,[yibian tamen fucong an la].
Fucong [an la] he liangyan,[dui tamen shi zui hao de]. Dang [zhunbei shengzhan de] shiqing yi jueding shi, jiaru tamen zhongcheng yu an la, na dui tamen shi zui hao de.
Jiaru nimen zhizheng, nimen hui bu hui zai da dishang zuo'e, duanjue nimen de qinqi guanxi ne [zhu]?
Zhexie ren shi an la suo qianze de, suoyi, ta shi tamen bian long, shi tamen bian xia.
Nandao tamen meiyou shensi “gulanjing” ma? Haishi tamen de xin shang you suo [bu lijie]?
Fan ren qing zhengdao [yisilan jiao] hou you pan jiao zhe [zhu 1], emo [zhu 2] yi songyong tamen bing dui tamen xuyuan.
Zhe shi yinwei, tamen ceng dui yanwu an la suo jiang shi de jingdian de renmen shuo:“Women jiang zai youxie shiqing shang shuncong nimen.” An la zui zhi dao tamen de mimi.
Dang tianshimen [zai tamen siwang shi] da tamen de lian he bei [zhu] bing shi tamen siwang shi, tamen jiang zenme ban ne?
Zhe shi yinwei, tamen zhuisui an la suo naonu de, yanwu ta [an la] suo xiyue de, suoyi, ta yi shi tamen de shangong tulao.
Nandao xinzhong you bing zhe [wei xinzhe] yiwei an la jue bu hui jielu tamen de yuanhen ma?
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo neng rang ni kanjian tamen, ni bi neng yi tamen de mianrong renshi tamen, ni bi neng yi tamen de yantan renshi tamen. An la zhi dao nimen de xingwei.

Wo bi jiang kaoyan nimen, zhidao wo fenbian chu nimen zhong shei shi [wei an la zhi dao] fendou zhe, shei shi jianren zhe, zhidao wo heding nimen de shiqing [ru shei shi shuohuang zhe, shei shi shuo shihua zhe].

Fan bu xinyang bing fang'ai renmen zunxing an la zhi dao [zhu][yisilan jiao], qie zai ren qing zhengdao [yisilan jiao] hou reng fandui shizhe [mu sheng] de ren, tamen jue buneng shanghai an la sihao, ta [an la] jiang shi tamen de shangong tulao.
Xinshimen a! Nimen dang fucong an la, dang fucong shizhe [zhu][mu sheng]; nimen buyao shi nimen de shangong tulao.
Fan bu xinyang bing fang'ai renmen zunxing an la zhi dao [yisilan jiao], qie lin si shi reng bu xinyang zhe, an la jue bu hui kuanshu tamen.
Nimen [musilin] buyao qinei, nimen [dui yisilan jiao de diren] bu yaoqiu he, nimen shi zhan youshi de. An la yu nimen tong zai, ta jue bu hui shi nimen de shangong tulao.
Jinshi shenghuo zhishi yi zhong youxi he yule. Jiaru nimen xinyang bing jingwei, ta [an la] jiang ba nimen ying de de baochou ci gei nimen, ta bu hui xiang nimen suoyao nimen de caichan.
Jiaru ta [an la] xiang nimen suoyao bing qiangpo nimen, nimen bi jiang linse, ta [an la] jiang jielu nimen de yuanhen.

Nimen zhexie ren a! Dang youren zhaohuan nimen wei an la zhi dao shiyong [zhu] shi, nimen zhong youxie ren jiu linse. Shei linse, shei zi shou qi hai. An la shi wu suo qiu de, er nimen ze shi you suo qiu de. Jiaru nimen beili [yisilan jiao], ta jiang yi qita minzhong lai daiti nimen, ranhou, tamen jiang bu hui xiang nimen.
Wo que yi ci gei ni [mu sheng] yici mingxian de shengli,
yibian an la kuanshu ni yiqian he yihou suo fan de guocuo [zhu], bing wancheng ta dui ni de enhui, yindao ni zunxing zhengdao [yisilan jiao];
yibian an la ci gei ni qiangda de yuanzhu.

Shi ta [an la] ba zhenjing jiang zai xinshimen de xinzhong, yibian tamen zai xian you xinyang de jichu shang gengjia qiancheng. Tiandi jian de jundui dou shi an la de. An la shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.
Yibian ta [an la] shi nannu xinshimen jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan, yong ju qizhong; yibian ta shemian tamen de zui'e. Zai an la kan lai, zhe shi yi xiang weida de chenggong.

Yibian ta chengfa wei xin de nannu he bai ouxiang de nannu, yinwei tamen dui an la zuo eyi de caixiang, e yun jiang jianglin tamen. An la naonu tamen, qianze tamen, bing wei tamen zhunbeile huo yu. Guisu zhen elie!
Tiandi de jundui dou shi an la de. An la shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.
Wo que yi paiqian ni [mu sheng] zuo jianzheng zhe, baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe [zhu].
Yibian nimen [renlei] xinyang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], yibian nimen xiezhu ta bing zunjing ta [mu sheng], yibian nimen zhaoxi zansong ta [an la].

Fan xuanshi xiaozhong yu ni [mu sheng] de ren, qishi, tamen shi xuanshi xiaozhong yu an la. An la de shou zai tamen de shou zhi shang. Shei weiyue, shei zi shou qi hai; shei luxing dui an la de xunuo, ta [an la] jiang gei ta zhongda de baochou.

Liu zai houfang de bei dou yin ren [youmu de alabo ren] jiang dui ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Women mangyu zhaoliao women de caichan he jiaren, suoyi, qing ni qiu zhu kuanshu women ba!” Tamen koushixinfei. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Jiaru an la yu jiang huo yu nimen huo yu jiang fu yu nimen, shei neng wei nimen er ganshe an la sihao ne? Qishi, fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.
Bu, nimen caixiang shizhe [mu sheng] he xinshimen jue buneng huilai yu jiaren tuanjule, nimen de xinzhong bei ci suo mihuo, nimen zuo eyi de caixiang, nimen shi gai miewang de minzhong.”
Shei bu xinyang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], wo dique wei bu xinyang zhe zhunbeile liehuo.
Tiandi de zhuquan dou shi an la de. Ta yu kuanshu shei, jiu kuanshu shei; yu chengfa shei, jiu chengfa shei. An la shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Dang nimen wei huoqu zhanlipin [zhu] er chufa shi, liu zai houfang de renmen jiang shuo:“Rang women tong nimen yidao chuzheng ba!” Tamen wangtu gaibian an la de panci. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen jue buneng tong women yidao chuzheng, an la youyanzaixian.” Tamen jiang shuo:“Bu, shi nimen jidu women.” Bu, shi tamen bu tai liaojie.

Ni [mu sheng] dui liu zai houfang de bei dou yin ren [zhu][youmu de alabo ren] shuo:“Nimen jiang bei zhao qu taofa yige feichang yongmeng de minzhong fadong de dazhan, nimen jiang gongda tamen, zhidao tamen touxiang. Jiaru nimen fucong [mingling], an la jiang ci gei nimen youmei de baochou; jiaru nimen xiang yiqian nayang taobi [bu chuzheng], ta jiang yi tongku de xingfa chengzhi nimen.”

Xiazi [bu chuzheng] shi bu shou zebei de, quezi [bu chuzheng] shi bu shou zebei de, bingren [bu chuzheng] shi bu shou zebei de. Shei fucong an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], ta [an la] jiang shi shei jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan. Shei taobi [bu chuzheng], ta [an la] jiang yi tongku de xingfa chengzhi shei.

An la dique xi'ai xinshimen. Dangshi, tamen zai shu xia xuanshi xiaozhong yu ni [mu sheng], ta [an la] zhidao tamen xinzhong suo xiang de, suoyi, ta jiang zhenjing gei tamen, bing ci gei tamen yici linjin de shengli,
yiji tamen jiang huode de xuduo zhanlipin. An la shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.

An la yingxu nimen, nimen jiang huode xuduo zhanlipin, bingqie ta shi nimen xunsu huodele zhexie zhanlipin [zhu], qie wei nimen ezhile diren de gongshi, yibian zhe chengwei xinshimen de yi zhong jixiang, yibian ta [an la] yindao nimen zunxing zhengdao.
[An la yingxu nimen de] hai you qita nimen shangwei huode de liyi [shengli he zhanlipin]. An la dui ci que shi zhouzhi de. An la dui wanshi shi wanneng de.
Jiaru bu xinyang zhe gongda nimen, tamen biding baibei, tamen jue buneng zhaodao renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe.
Zhe shi yiqian shiqu de an la de changdao, ni jue buneng faxian an la de changdao you renhe biangeng.
Shi ta [an la] ezhile tamen jingong nimen, ye ezhile nimen zhansheng tamen hou zai mai jia shangu zhong jingong tamen. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quan shi de.

Tamen bu xinyang bing fang'ai nimen jinru jin si, qie zuzhi bei kouliu de xisheng wu song da zaisheng de. Yao bushi weile bimian nimen wusha nimen suo bu renshi de nan xinshi he nu xinshi, yiji nimen yin wuzhi er gan zui,[name, ta bu hui zhizhi nimen jixu zhandou]. An la jiang shi tasuo yiyu zhe jinru ta de enhui zhong. Jiaru tamen [xinshi he bu xinyang zhe] yuan shi fenkai juzhu de, wo bi yi tongku de xingfa chengzhi tamen zhong de bu xinyang zhe.

Dang bu xinyang zhe xinhuai kuangwang——mengmei shidai de kuangwang shi, an la jiang zhenjing gei ta de shizhe [mu sheng] he xinshimen, bing shi tamen jianchi qianjing ci [chu an la wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu]. Tamen dui qianjing ci shi zui you quan de, shi zui ying de de. An la shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.

An la que yi shi ta de shizhe [mu sheng] shixianle baohan zhenli de mengjing [zhu][mu sheng meng jian shuailing tile fa he jian duanfa de dizimen jinru mai jia]. Jiaru an la yiyu, nimen yiding neng ping'an jinru jin si, nimen youxie ren ti fa, youxie ren jian duanfa. Nimen jiang hao bu weiju. Ta [an la] zhidao nimen suo buzhidao de. Zai zhe jian shi zhi wai, ta hai ci gei [nimen] yici linjin de shengli.
Shi ta [an la] yi zhengdao he zhenli zhi jiao [zhu][yisilan jiao] paiqian ta de shizhe [mu sheng], yibian ta [an la] shi zhenli zhi jiao shengguo yiqie zongjiao. An la zuyi zuo jianzheng zhe!

Muhanmode shi an la de shizhe [zhu]. Naxie gensui ta [mu sheng] de ren, dui bu xinyang zhe shi yanli de, dui xinshi ze shi he'ai de. Ni kanjian tamen [libai shi] jugong koutou, na shi zai xunqiu an la de enhui he xiyue. Tamen de [xinyang] tezheng jiu zai tamen de e shang, na shi [libai shi] koutou [liu xia] de henji. Zhe shi tamen zai “tao la te” zhong de biyu. Tamen zai “yin ji lei” zhong de biyu, youru yi li zhongzi fachu nen ya, zhu ta zhang da, zhujian zhuozhuang, qi jing tingli qilai, shi bozhong zhe kuaile, yibian ta [an la] jie tamen er jinu bu xinyang zhe. An la yingxu tamen zhong xinyang bing xingshan zhe jiang huode kuanshu he zhongda de baochou [leyuan].
Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao zai an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] de qianmian zhengxian [jueding renhe shi]. Nimen dang jingwei an la. An la que shi quan wen de, quanzhi de.

Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao shi nimen de shengyin gaoguo xianzhi [mu sheng] de shengyin, nimen buyao dui ta [mu sheng] gao sheng shuohua, youru nimen bici jian de gao sheng shuohua yiyang, yimian nimen de shangong zai nimen bu zhi bu jue shi tulao.
Fan zai an la de shizhe [mu sheng] mianqian di sheng shuohua de ren, zhexie ren, an la yi wei qianjing shiyanle tamen de xin, tamen jiang huode kuanshu he zhongda de baochou.
Fan zai jusuo hou dasheng hanjiao ni [mu sheng] de ren, tamen da duoshu ren shi buming li de.
Jiaru tamen rennai, deng ni chuqu jian tamen, na dui tamen shi zui hao de. An la shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Xinshimen a! Jiaru yige eren dai gei nimen yige xiaoxi, nimen dang heshi ta, yimian nimen yin wuzhi er shanghai bieren, shihou you huihen ziji suo zuo de.

Nimen dang zhidao, an la de shizhe [mu sheng] jiu zai nimen zhong. Jiaru ta zai xuduo shiqing shang shuncong nimen, nimen bi xianyu kunan zhong, dan an la shi nimen re'ai “yi ma ni [xinyang]”, bing zai nimen de xinzhong meihua ta. Ta shi nimen zengwu buxin, xie'e he weikang [an la yu mu sheng]. Zhexie ren que shi zunxing zhengdao zhe,
[zhe shi] cong an la jiang shi de enhui he enci. An la shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.

Jiaru liang pai xinshi xiang dou, nimen dang zai tamen zhi jian tiaojie [zhu]. Jiaru qizhong yipai qiya ling yipai, nimen dang gongji qiya di na pai, zhidao tamen zhixing an la de mingling. Jiaru tamen zhixing, name, nimen dang zai tamen zhi jian binggong tiaojie, dang zhuchi gongdao. An la dique xihuan zhuchi gongdao zhe.
Xinshi [zai jiaoyi shang] jie xiongdi [zhu][jiemei], suoyi, nimen dang tiaojie nimen xiongdi [jiemei] zhi jian de jiufen. Nimen dang jingwei an la, yibian nimen shou ci min.

Xinshimen a![Nimen] buyao rang [nimen zhong de] yixie nanzi chaoxiao ling yixie nanzi, yexu bei chaoxiao zhe bi chaoxiao zhe geng hao; ye buyao rang yixie nuzi chaoxiao ling yixie nuzi, yexu bei chaoxiao zhe bi chaoxiao zhe geng hao. Nimen buyao huxiang feibang, buyao huxiang yi chuohao xiangchen. Xinyang hou yi eming [chuohao] xiangchen zhen elie! Fan bu huizui zhe, zhexie ren que shi bu yi zhe.

Xinshimen a! Nimen dang yuan bi xuduo caiyi [zhu 1], yinwei youxie caiyi que shi fanzui. Nimen buyao huxiang zhentan, buyao huxiang bei hui [zhu 2]. Nandao nimen zhong youren yuanyi chi ziji yi si de xiongdi [jiao bao] de rou ma? Nimen shi yanwu zhe zhong xingwei [zhentan he bei hui deng] de. Nimen dang jingwei an la. An la que shi jieshou huiguo de, te ci de.

Renmen a! Wo dique cong yinan yi nu chuangzaole nimen, bing shi nimen chengwei xuduo minzu he buluo, yibian nimen huxiang renshi. Zai an la kan lai, nimen zhong zui zungui zhe jiushi nimen zhong zui qianjing zhe. An la que shi quanzhi de, che zhi de.

Bei dou yin ren [youmu de alabo ren] shuo:“Women xinyangle.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen hai meiyou zhenzheng xinyang, nimen zhishi shuo:“Women guishun [yisilan jiao]le”, yin wei xinyang hai meiyou zhenzheng jinru nimen de xinzhong. Jiaru nimen fucong an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], name, ta bu hui jianshao nimen de renhe shangong. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.”
Xinshi zhishi naxie zhenzheng xinyang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], ranhou bu huaiyi, bingyong ziji de caichan he shengming wei an la zhidao fendou de ren. Zhexie ren que shi chengshi zhe.
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nandao nimen yao xiang an la baogao nimen de zongjiao ma? An la zhidao tiandi jian de yiqie. An la shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.”

Tamen yi ziji xinfeng yisilan jiao xiang ni [mu sheng] shi hui, ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen buyao yi nimen xinfeng yisilan jiao xiang wo shi hui. Qishi, shi an la yindao nimen zhi “yi ma ni [xinyang]” er shi en gei nimen de, jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe.”
An la dique zhidao tiandi jian de yiqie wei jian zhi wu. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quan shi de.
Gaofu [alabo yu yige zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhi dao qi yi]. Yi zhe bu guangrong de “gulanjing” fashi!
Bu, tamen dui chuzi tamen ben zu de yi wei jinggao zhe [mu sheng] jianglin tamen gandao jingya. Bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Zhe shi yi jian qi shi!
Nandao women si hou bian cheng chentu shi,[women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo ma?] Zhe shi yi zhong miaomang de huanyuan [fuhuo].”
Wo que zhi dadi shourongle tamen zhong de duoshao ren [siren], wo youyi bu shou baohu de tian jing [“shou baohu de xian pai”].
Bu, dang zhenli jianglin tamen shi, tamen fouren, yin'er tamen xianrule hunluan zhong [buneng bian zhen wei].
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha zai tamen shangmian de tiankong, wo zenyang jianzao ta, zhuangshi ta bing shi ta meiyou quexian [liefeng] ma?
Wo ceng zhankai dadi, zai qizhong wengu de anzhi qun shan, shi ge zhong meili de zhiwu shengzhang qizhong,
gong mei ge gui xin [an la] de puren guancha he lingwu.
Wo cong tiankong jiangxia jixiang de yushui, jie ci er shi guoyuan he wugu shengzhang,
[bing shengzhang chu] gaoda de ye zao shu, jie chu cheng chuan de ye zao,
zuowei [wo de] pu renmen de jiyang. Wo jie ci er shi kusi de dadi fusu.[Siren de] fuhuo jiushi zheyang.
Zai tamen [mai jia de yi jiaotu] zhiqian fouren [shizhemen] de you: Nu ha de zuren [zhu], la si de jumin, sa mu de ren,
a de ren, falao, lu te de tongbaomen,
Conglin de jumin he tu ba de zuren, tamen dou fourenguo [tamen de] shizhemen, suoyi, wo jinggao [tamen] de xingfa shixianle.
Wo yin zuichu de chuangzao er pijuan ma? Bu, tamen reng zai huaiyi xin de chuangzao [fuhuo].
Wo que yi chuangzao ren, wo zhidao ta [ren] xinzhong de yinsi wangxiang, wo bi ta de mingmai hai jiejin ta.
Dang zuo zai [ren] youbian de yi wei [jilu shangong] he zuo zai zuobian de yi wei [jilu e xing] jilu de tianshi jilu [zhu][ren de xingwei] shi,
ta [ren] mei shuo yiju hua, ta pangbian jiu youyi wei jianshi zhe [tianshi] zai jilu [ren dao fayu nianling hou, tianshi fang kaishi jilu qi shan e].
Siwang de hunmi jiang jieshi zhenli,[you hua sheng shuo]:“Zhe jiushi ni chang taobi de.”
Haojiao yi chui xiang, na jiushi jinggao shixian zhi ri [fuhuo ri].
Mei geren daolai shi, jiang youyi wei qugan [ta] de tianshi he yi wei jianzheng [ta] de tianshi peiban er lai.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Ni que yi hushi ci shi,[xianzai] wo yi jie kai ni de zheyan, jinri ni de yanguang shi ruili de.”
Ta de peiban zhe [tianshi] jiang shuo:“Zhe shi wo [wei ta] zuo de jilu.”
[You hua sheng mingling liang wei peiban de tianshi shuo]:“Ni lia ying touru huo yu de shi: Mei ge wang'enfuyi zhe, wangu zhe,
zu'ai xingshan zhe, guofen [chaoyue fadu] zhe, huaiyi zhe,
ji bai an la, you bai qita shenling zhe, ni lia ying ba zhe zhong ren touru yanli de xingfa zhong.”
Ta de [emo] huoban jiang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo meiyou shi ta panni, er shi ta ziji xianrule shenyuan de mi wu zhong.”
Ta [an la] jiang shuo:“Nimen buyao zai wo zheli zhenglun, wo que yi shixian jinggaoguo nimen.
Wo de panci shi jue buneng genggai de, wo jue bu kuidai [wo de] pu renmen.”
Zai na ri, wo [an la] jiang dui huo yu shuo:“Ni tian man [zhu man]le ma?” Huo yu jiang shuo:“Hai you geng duo de ren [yao lai] ma [zhu]?”
Leyuan jiang bei dai dao jingwei zhe fujin, li de bu yuan.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Zhe [leyuan] jiushi nimen suo bei xunuo de, zhe shi ci gei mei ge chang gui xin [an la] zhe he zunshou [yisilan jiao jiaoyi jiaogui] zhe de.
Fan anzhong jingwei pu ci zhi zhu [an la] bing daizhe yi ke gui xin [an la] de xin er lai zhe,
nimen ping'an jinru leyuan ba! Zhe shi yongsheng kaishi zhi ri.”
Fanshi tamen xiang yao de, tamen zai leyuan li dou neng dedao, erqie zai wo zheli hai you geng duo [geng hao] de [dai ci wu].

Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, naxie shidai [de shili] bi tamen de geng qiangda.[Dang wo de xingfa lailin shi], tamen ceng zai gedi luan pao [xunzhao binan suo]. Nandao tamen neng zhaodao renhe binan suo ma?
Dui youxin lingwu zhe, huo zhuanxin qingting zhe, ci zhong que youyi zhong jiaohui.
Wo que yi zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi wanwu, wo sihao bu juede pijuan.
Duiyu tamen suo wangyan de, ni [mu sheng] dang rennai. Ni dang zai ri chu zhiqian [chen li] he riluo zhiqian [bu li] zanmei songyang ni de zhu [zhu][an la],

ni dang zai yejian de yibufen shijian [hun li he xiao li] zansong ta, zhuming bai hou ye ying zansong ta [ru zhuming bai hou li sheng xing bai, fu gong bai, nian “shu bu ha nan la (zanmei an la chaojue), ai lei ha mu du ling la (yiqie zansong, quan gui an la), an la hu ai ke bai er (an la zhi da)”].
Ni dang qingting jiaohan zhe cong jin chu jiaohan zhi ri [fuhuo ri].
Dang tamen tingjian baohan zhenli de haojiao chui xiang zhi ri, na jiushi cong fenmu chulai zhi ri.
Wo dique neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si. Wei wo [an la] zheli shi zuihou de guisu.
Dang dadi polie, tamen congmang [cong fenmu zhong] chulai zhi ri, na jiushi jihe, na dui wo shi rongyi de.
Wo zui zhidao tamen suo wangyan de, ni [mu sheng] buyao qiangpo tamen [xinyang], ni dang yi “gulanjing” jiaohui weiju wo de jinggao zhe.
Yi sanbu de feng,
zaizhe han yu de yun,
ziyou piaoliu [de chuanbo],
feng [an la zhi] ming fen pei [jiyang, yushui he qita enci wu] zhe [tianshi] fashi!
Fan xunuo nimen de [houshi de fuhuo, shan jiang e fa deng] dou shi zhenshi de,
shenpan que shi yao fasheng de.
Yi you guidao de tianti fashi!
Nimen [dui mu sheng he “gulanjing”] que shi ge zhi yi ci de.
[Genju an la de panjue he qian ding] beili [mu sheng he “gulanjing”] zhe beilile.
Gai zao qianze de shuohuang zhe!
Tamen [shuohuang zhe] chang chenni yu yumei de shuohuang zhong.
Tamen chang wen:“Shenpan ri zai shenme shihou?”
Na shi tamen zai huo yu shang shouxing zhi ri.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen changshi nimen [bei shaozhuo] de xingfa ba! Zhe jiushi nimen [shengqian] yaoqiu zaori shixian de xingfa.”
Jingwei zhe bi jiang zhu zai leyuan he quanshui pang,
jieshou tamen de zhu ciyu tamen de, yinwei tamen ciqian que shi xingshan zhe.
Yeli, tamen jingchang shao shui [zhu][yong da bufen shijian qiqiu an la, ru libai];
liming qian, tamen jiu [xiang an la] qiurao.
Zai tamen de caichan zhong, qiqiu zhe he pinmin jun you fen'e.
Dui duxin [an la] zhe, dadishang you xuduo jixiang,
nimen zishen zhong yeyou xuduo jixiang. Nandao nimen meiyou guancha ma?
Tianshang you nimen de jiyang he nimen suo bei xunuo de yiqie.
Yi tiandi de zhu [an la] fashi! Zhe [nimen suo bei xunuo de] que shi zhenshi de, youru nimen jiang shihua yiyang [zhenshi].
Yi bu la xin de guike [ji bu li lei tianshi he lingwai liang wei tianshi] de gushi daoda ni [mu sheng]le ma?
Dangshi, tamen [san wei tianshi] jinqu jian ta [yi bu la xin]. Tamen shuo:“Zhu ni ping'an!” Ta shuo:“[Ye] zhu nimen ping'an!”[Ta hai shuo]:“Nimen shi wo bu renshi de mosheng ren.”
Ranhou, ta qiaoqiao dao ta de jiaren nali, jiezhe bian na lai yi zhi kao niudu [jushuo yi bu la xin shengren de caichan da bufen shi niu].
Ta ba na niudu fang dao tamen mianqian, ta shuo:“Nimen bu hui chi ma?”
[Yinwei tamen bu chi kao niudu] ta gandao youdian haipa tamen. Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao haipa.” Tamen yi yige [dui an la ji qi zongjiao] congmin de erzi xiang ta baoxi.
Ta de qizi jiaorangzhe zou lai, dazhe ta de lian shuo:“Wo shi yige buneng shengyu de lao fule.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni de zhu [an la] shi zheyang shuo de. Ta [an la] que shi zui ruizhi de, quanzhi de.”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Shizhemen [tianshi] a! Nimen de shiming shi shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women fengming qu chengzhi yiqun fanzui de minzhong,
women jiang jiangxia shaoguo de niantu ban de shi kuai chengzhi tamen,
[naxie shi kuai] zai ni de zhu nali shi wei chengfa guofen zhe [chaoyue fadu zhe] er dashang laoyin de.”
Wo jiuchule chengzhong de xinshi,
dan wo zai chengzhong zhi faxian yijia musilin [lu te shengren he ta de liang ge nu'er].
Wo zai nali gei weiju tongku de xingfa zhe liu xiale yi zhong jixiang [sihai].
Zai mu sa de gushi zhong [yeyou yi zhong jixiang]. Dangshi, wo pai ta daizhe yi zhong mingzheng qu jian falao.
Dan ta [falao] yizhang ta de quanshi [jundui] beiqi ta [mu sa]. Ta [falao] shuo:“[Ni shi] yige moshu shi huo fengzi.”
Suoyi, wo chengzhile ta he ta de jundui, wo ba tamen reng jin dahai zhong [yan si], yinwei ta [falao] shi ying shou qianze de.
Zai a de ren de gushi zhong [yeyou yi zhong jixiang]. Dangshi, wo pai huimie xing de kuangfeng chengfa tamen.
Fanshi kuangfeng jingguo zhi chu, quanbu hui wei suipian.
Zai sa mu de ren de gushi zhong [yeyou yi zhong jixiang]. Dangshi, you hua sheng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zhanshi xiangshou ba!”
Dan tamen weikang tamen de zhu de mingling, suoyi, pili sheng zai tamen qinyan mudu xia xijile tamen.
Yinci, tamen zhan bu qilai, ye buneng zijiu.
Zai tamen zhiqian,[wo ceng huimiele] nu ha de zuren. Tamen shi beini de minzhong.
Wo yi wo de quanli jianzaole tian, wo que shi wanwu de chuangzao zhe.
Wo zhankaile da di. Wo shi duome zhuoyue de zhankai zhe a!
Wo ba mei zhong wu dou zaocheng liangxing de, yibian nimen sikao [an la de enhui].
[Ni shuo]:“Nimen gankuai tao gui an la ba [cong jiang zao an la de chengfa tao xiang huoqu an la de kuanshu he ci min——yisilan jiao]! Wo que shi ta paiqian gei nimen de tanshuai de jinggao zhe [zhu].
Nimen buyao ji bai an la, you bai qita shenling, wo que shi ta paiqian gei nimen de tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Tamen de qian ren yeshi zheyang, mei dang you shizhe lailin tamen, tamen bi [dui ta] shuo:“[Ni shi] yige moshu shi huo fengzi.”
Nandao tamen [qian ren] yi ci zhufu zhexie ren [gu lai shen de yi jiaotu] ma? Qishi, tamen shi panni de minzhong.
Ni [mu sheng] dang bi kai tamen [gu lai shen de yi jiaotu], ni shi bu shou zebei de [yinwei ni yi xiang tamen chuandale an la de qishi].
Ni dang [yi “gulanjing”] jiaohui [renlei], yinwei jiaohui dui xinshimen que shi youyi de.
Wo [an la] chuangzao jingling he renlei, mudi shi rang tamen chongbai wo.
Wo buyao tamen de renhe gongyang, wo buyao tamen gong wo yinshi.
An la que shi [wanwu] zui hao de gongji zhe, que shi zui you quanli de, que shi zui qiang da de [zhu].
Bu yi zhe bi jiang zaoshou tamen xiri de huobanmen suo zaoshou de xingfa, suoyi, jiao tamen buyao cuicu wo zaori shixian xingfa.
Bu xinyang zhe bei jinggao de rizi lailin shi, tamen [bu xinyang zhe] jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Yi shan fashi!
Yi jilu zai zhankai de yangpi zhi shang de jingdian [“gulanjing”] fashi!
Yi renlei chaojin de tian fang fashi!
Yi gaosong de tianqiong fashi!
Yi wangyang dahai fashi [huo yi fuhuo ri bei dian shao de dahai fashi]!
Ni de zhu de xingfa kending shi yao lailin de,
renhe ren dou buneng dikang ta.
Dangtian ti [kongbu de] zhendong zhi ri,
qun shan jiang bei yi hui.
Zai na ri, fouren zhenli zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Yinwei tamen zai wang tan zhong qule.
Dang tamen bei qiangxing tui ru huo yu zhi ri,
[you hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Zhe jiushi nimen [shengqian] suo fouren de huo yu.
Zhe shi moshu ne? Haishi nimen kan bujian?
Nimen changshi huoxing ba! Wulun nimen neng renshou, haishi buneng renshou, dui nimen dou shi yiyang de. Nimen zhi shou nimen suo fanzui e de huan bao.”
Jingwei zhe bi zai leyuan he enze zhong,
[tamen] xinxi yu tamen de zhu ciyu tamen de [enhui]. Tamen de zhu yi zhengjiu tamen tuoli huo yu de xingfa.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen yin nimen suo zuo de shangong yukuai di chihe ba!”
[Tamen] kao zai cheng pai de bao yi shang, wo jiang baijing mei mu xianshu di meinu zuo tamen de qizi.

Fan ziji xinyang, qi zisun ye tong tamen yiqi xinyang zhe, wo jiang shi tamen de zisun [zai leyuan li] yu tamen tuanju [zhu 1], wo bu hui jianshao tamen de renhe shangong [zhu 2]. Mei ren dou yingdui ziji suo zuo de shi fuze.
Wo jiang ba tamen xiang yao de shuiguo he roushi ci gei tamen.
Tamen jiang zai leyuan li huxiang chuandi jiubei [jingjiu],[tamen] bu hui yinci [yinjiu] kou chu hui yan, ye bu hui yinci [yinjiu] er fanzui [zai leyuan li yinjiu shi hefa de].
Tamen de [nan] tongpu zai pangbian fushi tamen, naxie tongpu youru bang ke li de zhenzhu.
Tamen bici zou lai, huxiang xunwen.
Tamen shuo:“Yiqian, women dique wei women de jiaren weiju [an la de xingfa],
dan [xianzai] an la yi shi en gei women, bing zhengjiu women tuolile huo yu de xingfa.
Yiqian, women dique chang qiqiu ta. Ta que shi ren'ai de, te ci de.”
Ni [mu sheng] dang [yi yisilan jiao] jiaohui [renlei]. Ping ni de zhu de enhui, ni ji bushi zhanbu zhe, ye bushi fengzi.
Huoxu tamen yao shuo:“[Ta] shige shiren, women dengdai ta [mu sheng] zao buxing.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen dengdai ba! Wo dique ye tong nimen yiqi dengdai.”
Shi tamen de lizhi jiao tamen ruci wangyan ne? Haishi tamen shi panni de minzhong?
Nandao tamen yao shuo:“Ta [mu sheng] weizao ta [“gulanjing”]?” Bu, shi tamen bu xinyang.
Jiaru tamen shi chengshi zhe, jiao tamen zuochu [yu “gulanjing”] tongyang de jing wen lai!
Shi tamen cong wu dao you bei chuangzao ne? Haishi tamen jiushi chuangzao zhe?
Nandao tamen chuangzaole tiandi ma? Bu, shi tamen bu duxin [an la].
Shi tamen yongyou ni de zhu de baozang ne? Haishi tamen you quan weisuoyuwei?
Nandao tamen youyi ba ti zi neng [deng tian] qieting [tianshimen de tanhua] ma?[Yaoshi zheyang], rang tamen de qieting zhe na chu mingzheng lai ba!
Nandao nuhai gui ta [an la] er nanhai gui nimen ma?
Nandao ni [mu sheng] xiang tamen suoquguo [chuanjiao de] baochou, yin'er tamen wei nashui fudan tai zhong ma?
Nandao tamen zhidao wei jian zhi wu, yin'er tamen neng ba ta jilu xialai ma?
Nandao tamen xiang yinmou pohai [ni] ma? Bu xinyang zhe bi zi zhong qi ji.
Chu an la wai, nandao tamen hai you ying shou chongbai de zhu ma? Zanmei an la chaojue! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de [ouxiang].
Jiaru tamen neng kanjian yikuai tian diao xialai, tamen bi shuo:“[Zhe zhishi] yipian nong yun.”
Ni bie li tamen! Zhidao tamen zaoyu tamen bei zhen yun de rizi.
Zai na ri, tamen de jimou dui tamen jiang hao wu yichu, tamen ye de bu dao renhe yuanzhu.
Ciqian, bu yi zhe hai yao shou ling yi zhong xingfa [zhu][zai chenshi suo zaoshou de zainan he fenmu zhong shenwen shi de xingfa], dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Ni [mu sheng] dang naixin dengdai ni de zhu de panjue, yinwei ni que shi zai wo de juangu zhi xia de. Ni qichuang shi ying zanmei songyang ni de zhu;
zai yejian he xingchen moluo shi, ni ye ying zansong ta.
Yi moluo shi de xingchen fashi!
Nimen de tongban [mu sheng] ji meiyou mi wu, ye meiyou fancuo.
Ta wei ping siyu er yan.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] zhishi tasuo feng dao de qishi.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi [an la tongguo] qiang youli zhe [ji bu li lei tianshi] jiaoshou ta de.
[Ji bu li lei tianshi] shi chunjie de, da dao liao jinhu wanmei.
Ta [ji bu li lei tianshi] zai dipingxian de zuigao chu,
ranhou, ta xiajiang bing zhujian jiejin.
Ta xiangju liang gong zhi chang, huo geng jin.
Ta [an la] ba ta yao qishi de [tongguo ji bu li lei tianshi] qishi ta de puren [mu sheng].
Ta [mu sheng] de xin meiyou fouren ziji suo jian de.
Nandao nimen yao tong ta [mu sheng] zhenglun ta [sheng xiao] suo jian de ma?
Ta [mu sheng] que yi kanjian ta [ji bu li lei tianshi] di er ci xiajiang [zhi ling yici, bingfei sheng xiao na yici],
zai wujin [wu ren neng tongguo] de suanzao shu pang,
suanzao shu pang you yong ju de leyuan.
Dang suanzao shu zhegaile ying zhegai zhi wu shi,
[na shi mu sheng] mu wei xie shi, ye wei guofen [kan bu gai kan de].
Ta [mu sheng] que yi kanjian ta de zhu [an la] de yixie zuida de jixiang.
Nimen xiangguo ma? La te he ou zai [zhu][a wei bo ren ceng chongbaiguo de liang ge ouxiang],
yiji di san ge——ma na [a wei bo ren ceng chongbaiguo de ling yige ouxiang].
Nandao nanxing gui nimen, er nuxing gui ta [an la] ma?
Ruguo zheyang, zhe que shi zui bu gongping de fenpei.

Zhexie ouxiang zhishi nimen he nimen de zuxian suo qu de mingcheng eryi, an la bing wei dui ci jiang shi renhe zhengju. Tamen zhi shuncong caixiang he siyu, jinguan zhengdao que yi cong tamen de zhu jianglin tamen.
Nandao ren xiang yao shenme jiu you she me ma?
Houshi he jinshi dou shi an la de.
Tianshang you xuduo tianshi, tamen de qiuqing hao wu yichu, chufei an la yunxu tamen wei tasuo yiyu zhe he xiyue zhe qiuqing zhihou.
Bu xinyang houshi zhe, tamen dique yi nuxing de mingzichenghu tianshimen.
Tamen dui ci hao wu zhishi, tamen zhi shuncong caixiang, er caixiang jue buneng tidai zhenli.
Fan beiqi wo de jiaohui [“gulanjing”] er zhi zhuiqiu jinshi shenghuo zhe, ni dang bi kai tamen.
Zhe shi tamen zhishi de zuigao xiandu. Ni de zhu dique zui zhidao shei shi mishi zhengdao zhe, ye zui zhidao shei shi zunxing zhengdao zhe.

Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi an la de.[Fuhuo ri], ta jiang yi zuo'e zhe suo zuo de zui'e huan bao zuo'e zhe [ru zai huo yu li chengfa tamen], jiang yi xingshan zhe suo zuo de zui hao shangong baochou xingshan zhe [ru rang tamen zai leyuan li xiangle].

Fan yuan bi dazui [jian 6:152-153] He jianyin [zhu], zhi fan xiao zui zhe, ni de zhu que shi zui kuanrong de. Dang ta cong dadi chuangzao nimen [ru a dan shengren] shi, dang nimen haishi tai'er zai nimen de mu fu zhong shi, ta shi zui zhidao nimen de. Suoyi, nimen buyao zi cheng chunjie, ta zui zhidao shei shi jingwei zhe.
Ni [mu sheng] zhuyi dao nage beili [yisilan jiao] de ren ma?
Ta shaowei shishe jiu linse [zhu].
Nandao ta zhidao wei jian zhi wu, yin'er ta neng kanjian [zhenli he jieju] ma?
Nandao mei ren gaosuguo ta mu sa de jingdian zhong suo jizai de ma?
Yiji zunxing suoyou zhuming de yi bu la xin de jingdian zhong suo jizai de ma?
Yige fu zui zhe bu fudan bieren de zui'e.
Mei ren dou jiang huode ziji suo fendou de baochou [zhong gua de gua, zhong dou de dou].
[Fuhuo ri] ta fendou de jieguo jiang bei kanjian,
ranhou, ta jiang huode zui wanquan de baochou.
Ni de zhu [an la] que shi [wanwu] zuizhong de guisu.
Ta [an la] dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren xiao, ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren ku.
Ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren si, ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] rensheng.
Ta dique yong shechu de yidi jingye chuangzaole pei'ou——nanxing he nuxing.
[Fuhuo ri] ta dique yi zaizao wei jiren.
Ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren fuyu, ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren manyi.
Ta dique shi tianlangxing [a wei bo ren ceng chongbaiguo de xing] de zhu.
Ta [an la] dique huimiele yiqian de a de ren,
yiji sa mu de ren, yige ye meiyou liu xia.
Yiqian,[ta ceng huimiele] nu ha de zuren. Tamen que shi zui bu yi de, que shi zui panni de [tamen bu fucong an la ji qi shizhe nu ha].
Ta ceng huimiele bei dianfu de chengshi [ru lu te shengren fengming shenghuoguo de balesitan suo duo ma cheng].
Na fugai zhi wu [ru shi yu de xingfa] fugaile bei dianfu de chengshi.
[Ren a!] Ni yao huaiyi ni de zhu de na xiang enhui ne?
Zhe [mu sheng] shi yiqian naxie jinggao zhe zhong de yi wei jinggao zhe.
Fuhuo ri linjinle.
Chu an la wai, jue meiyou ren neng jiechu ta.
Nandao nimen dui zhe xun ci [“gulanjing”] gandao jingqi ma?
Nimen zenme wei ci xiao er bu wei ci ku ne?
Nimen [zhengzai langfei baogui de shijian] xiaoqian he yule [ru changge tiaowu].
Nimen dang xiang an la koutou, dang chongbai ta. Koutou chu
fuhuo de shijian linjinle, yueliang poliele [zhu].
